I have just completed this game as Kassandra and I plan on playing it again as Alexios. When playing the game I felt like the controls were nice and smooth and the character had a great personality.      I have loved the AC series since the first game and I will admit like alot of other people I was worried this wouldnt be/feel like an AC game.    But I am happy that I was wrong, it has been an amazing game (in my opinion one of the best AC games to date) I love the story of the mercenary character, I love how open the map is and I really do like how they added choices into the game.

While in my playthough I tried to complete as much as I could like the cult, atlantis etc. One thing I respect from those missions is while they are technically part of the main story you dont need to complete them to finish the game only becuase of how hard they were to complete, the atlantis missions were hard to complete because while there was only 4 enemies to beat they were hard and with the cult there is something like 44 cultist scattered all over the place which would have been extreamly annoying to complete if you wanted to complete the game.

While this game is amazing it does have some slight downsides which are 
   the modern day story felt kind of weak 
   I completed the atlantis story quite early which kind of felt like i completed the mordern day stuff quickly 
 The ubisoft store, this is an issue because odyssey is a solo player game and yet if you want a nice looking armour you need to pay £5-10, or you could buy a small temporary xp booster which again if for a solo player game, its not hard to change difficulty if your struggling with enemies that are a higher level 

Overall I would recommend playing this game especially to AC fans or RPG fans, I would suggest getting a good computer for this if you want the game to run smoothly and if you want to enjoy every inch of the zeus statue peen XD

Assassin's Creed: Odyssey efsane bir oyun olmuş. Oyunun görsellik, animasyon, oynanış vs. gibi şeyleri zaten her zaman olduğu gibi oldukça başarılı. Lakin esas efsane kısımlar oyunun artık bir RPG'ye dönmesiyle başlıyor.

Her görev (yan görevler de dahil) içerisinde bulunan diyalog seçenekleri ve bu seçeneklerin oyunun başından itibaren sürekli olarak oyuna etki etmesi muazzam bir şey. Örneğin ana görevlerden bir tanesinde bir tane adamı öldürdüm ve sonrasında rastgele beliren bir yan görevde ise bu adamın kardeşine denk geldim ve abisinin ölümünden sonra hayatının bok sardığını anlatmaya başladı. Baya baya adama acıyıp, abisini benim öldürdüğümü söylemeyip haydutlardan kurtulmasına yardım ettim. Eğer abisini benim öldürdüğümü söylesem muhtemelen bana saldıracaktı ya da görev başarısız olacaktı. Tabi bu sadece spoil vermeden anlatmak istediğim ve çok basit bir seçim olayıydı (tabi ki abisini öldürmem de benim seçeneğimdi).

Diyalog sistemi dışında; dolu dolu devasa bir oyun dünyası, hikaye, binlerce ekipman, yetenek sistemi, Middle-earth oyunlarında olana benzer bir Bounty Hunter sistemi, gemi savaşları vs. vs. her şey oyuna mükemmel birer artı olarak dönüyor. Ubisoft resmen bu zamana kadar olan serinin tüm oyunlarının en iyi yönlerini geliştirerek bir araya getirmiş ve sonuç çok başarılı olmuş. AC: Origins de çok kaliteli bir oyundu ama AC: Odyssey tam olarak onun bitmiş hali diyebilirim.

Kısacası AC: Odyssey'i oynayın, oynattırın.

在山上搜集资源时不小心惹到了一只高等级野兽，好不容易打到残血，身边突然冒出一个路人莫名其妙给了我一拳....；

海战的时候提示登陆敌船，操作失误一个信仰跳进水里，被一艘不知名的船只带出几百米，最后死亡黑屏；

在古墓里探索的时候被蛇啃了一嘴，刚开始没什么，我还纳闷怎么不掉血，结果等拿到物品的时候莫名其妙中毒死亡，只能从头再来....；

千辛万苦找到了某个邪教成员，高高兴兴的到达指定据点，结果里面4个高等级佣兵在巡逻¿¿¿....；

所以，我觉得我应该时买了个“小心癫痫警告”。

- HITBOX, MUITO, MUITO RUIM. DE VEZ ENQUANDO NEM ADIANTA ESQUIVAR, MAIS FÁCIL FICAR PARADO DO QUE ESQUIVAR PQ O HIT PEGA MSM ASSIM.

- SISTEMA DE SAVE DO JOGO HORRÍVEL. FIQUEI 20 MINUTOS ENFRENTANDO A PORRA DE UM BOSS, DEIXEI ELE COM ISSO - AQUI DE VIDA PRA MORRER E PEGAR ELE FULL LIFE DPS.

- EXPRESSÕES FACIAIS DOS PERSONAGENS MAL FEITAS.

- MUITOS BUGS, MUITOS, MUITOS BUGS...

- FIZERAM O JOGO COM TANTA PRESSA QUE ELES NEM FIZERAM QUESTÃO DE FAZER ROSTOS DIFERENTES PROS PERSONAGENS, ESTOU ANDANDO NUMA CIDADE NO JOGO E ENCONTRO 50 NPCS COM A MESMA CARA. ISSO INCLUINDO OS PERSONAGENS IMPORTANTES, QUE A MAIORIA TAMBÉM TEM A MESMA CARA.

- JOGO REPETITIVO DEMAIS. VC VAI FAZER UMA MISSÃO PRINCIPAL, DPS VC ACHA UM NPC E ELE TE PASSA OUTRA MISSÃO PRA VC PODER FAZER A MISSÃO PRINCIPAL, ALÉM DISSO, N TEM NADA DIFERENTE. VC SÓ TEM QUE FICAR FAZENDO MISSÃO ATRÁS DE MISSÃO E FICAR MATANDO GENTE DO ''CULTO DO COSMO'', BASICAMENTE TUDO O QUE VOCÊ FAZ NO JOGO É SÓ ISSO.

- HISTÓRIA CHATA. 

ISSO SEM CONTAR OS OUTROS PROBLEMAS DO JOGO.

FIZ BASTANTE HORAS, JOGUEI NO FÁCIL, SÓ PRO JOGO ACABAR LOGO MESMO, JÁ QUE EU N PODIA MAIS PEDIR REEMBOLSO. SÓ QUE CHEGOU NUM PONTO QUE O JOGO FICOU TÃO CHATO, MONÓTOMO, REPETITIVO, QUE EU SIMPLESMENTE FIQUEI TÃO PUTO QUE EU DESINSTALEI O JOGO.  A ÚNICA COISA QUE EU GOSTEI NO JOGO FORAM OS GRÁFICOS.

NÃO RECOMENDO :) (OBS: ESSA É MINHA OPINIÃO).

Game is very fun.  Improves a lot on Origins, which I found very boring and clunky.  While some may find Odyssey's grind boring, I find it very atypical of many RPG's such as Skyrim, and increasing enemy levels to match your level just makes the game more challenging.  You can definitely play the game without having to buy the XP boosters, although that is a negative in my opinion (no single player game should have microtransactions).  However, these do not make the game less fun for me, and the content is definitely worth the price.  If anything, for the next Assassin's Creed game, if they improve on the combat and add some more features, that game will definitely be a home run.  This game is more like a triple: very, very good, but still has some negatives.  
TL;DR: Improves upon Origins a lot, content definitely worth the price, combat is slightly clunky, only major negative is microtransactions, but they are unneeded to finish the game

First of all, I really like this game. I like the story in the beginning, the different abilities, conquest battles especially. What upsets me about this game is how they ruin the story a bit around episodes 4 and 5. There the story goes from being in depth and forcing me to continue because of suspense to the main story is identical to the side quests where you do pointless and menial tasks for npcs. Also with the sheer size of this map a lot of exploration is allowed, which is a large plus for me, but the fast travel spots require you climbing to spots that just waste time. If there was a more efficient way to travel this game would be much better. Overall I would recommend this game to people who like to play rpgs because this one is definitely good, however it does have flaws that can be really annoying at some points.

Короче, рассказываю! Сейчас я под впечатлением этой игры. На данный момент я 38 лвл, т.е. прохожу игру полностью, зачищая все локации. Я один из уникальных игроков, который может позитивно отразить мнение об этой игре. Сразу скажу, что если Вы "самый сильный игрок на планете", то, конечно, можете поставить самый высокий уровень игры, никто Вам не мешает. Тогда вкушайте эту игру часов на 200! А может быть и больше, поверьте. Мои ассоциации об этой игре: сюжет - исключительно, для этой компании, первенец в роде Ведьмаков и подобных игр. Лучше ставьте сложный уровень игры, пробуйте все виды оружия, лук - просто замаксил все его способности и ты Афина этой игры или тот самый Арес, если выбрал вначале игры мужской пол. Получение сэтов с атрибутами не затрудняет Вашу игру, просто играйте и у вас всё будет :) Красивый мир, реально графика на уровне, уж поверьте графодрочеру! История и кат сцены весьма внушительные для эпохи V века до  н.э. 
Лошадь - когда хочет тогда и бежит, я в ярости!!! Диалоги побочных квестов абсолютно идентичные, но некоторые реально интересные, их стоит проходить. Словил много багов уже и реально было смешно, были чувства как в PUBG в первый раз. Никогда не бейте животных со способностью поджигания оружия***** Загоришься сам и умрешь от одного удара того же зверя. 
Если подитожить, то игра сложна в том, что враги могут иметь до 500000 хп, а я на 38 лвле наношу по 2800! Но если ты реально скиловый паря, то катка для тебя, братан))
Splendide !!!,  je ne m'attendais pas à un tel monument, juste peut être à  quelque chose d'équivalent à A.C Origins qui est déjà exellent, mais là, de mon avis ça surpasse tout, et de loin !!.

I'm new to the Assassin's Creed series. However, I recently bought and played AC: Origins and enjoyed it despite the late-game grind, for the wonderfully detailed setting with remarkable verisimilitude, a relatable main character, and well-written quests that fleshed out the setting and the story. This set high expectations for Odyssey, which it regrettably failed to meet.

Where Origins did a remarkable job of crafting a believable Ptolemaic Egypt, Odyssey is lazy pulp. Here, mythological characters are real, the landscape is littered with twisted monumental statues, giant monstrous skeletons, and "precursor civilisation" ruins, Spartans have more in common with "300" than who they really were, and unpleasant characteristics of the Greek civilisations -- such as ubiquitous slavery and utterly oppressive patriarchy -- have been edited away. Instead of the warm and personable Bayek with his complex relationship to Aya we get tough-guy/gal Alexios/Kassandra, as clichéd action-heroes as things get. And the story gets weirder and weirder, dumber and dumber from the start.

The gameplay is somewhat improved from Origins -- where brawling was merely passable in the previous instalment, it's much more varied and satisfying in Odyssey. However, this gets old around the "you have killed 100 enemies with a spear" point, however you slice (or stab) it. Moreover, the MMO-style leveling completely neuters any sense of progression, as fighting on level 5 is much the same as fighting on level 50, since you'll be fighting enemies of the same level. Instead, it imposes continuous busywork, swapping and upgrading gear and grinding cookie-cutter quests (procedurally generated or otherwise) for XP.

I was expecting a step up from Origins. Instead, I got a small step forward in one limited area (brawling) and many steps back in the areas that made Origins fun. I could only take less than 20 hours of playing this before giving up: at the point where Origins was picking up speed, Odyssey already feels like a chore. Regrettably, I'm going to have to give Odyssey a thumbs-down. It's just lazy, grindy, repetitive, and frankly boring; the only thing it has going for it is an addictive core gameplay loop with frequent rewards, but then so does Tetris and that takes up a lot less disk space.

I dont typically write reviews, not unless a game is exceptionally good, or extremely bad. This review actually falls in the middle.

Story: I find the story enjoyable thus far, I was expecting something bare bones, but there is actual story here. The player is able to make choices that can alter a story in some way shape or form, some larger than others. I havent completed the game yet, however its probably the only reason I am playing. The only complaint is now that the game plays more like an RPG/Adventure game, story missions called be level gated, forcing you to do "skyrim level" quests. By that, the quests usually are little more than "go to this fort and find this item in a chest" or "Go over here and kill something". This just bogs down the game substancially. I am only level 33 and played almost 40 hours.

Combat: This is the games achillies heel (pun intended). You see, the games combat system relies on getting better equipment from varying weapons (spears, two handed bladed, swords, daggers ect) to armor sets. As you level up you gain ability points which can be fun to use. You can get abilities such: the ability add poison/fire to your weapon, charge forward, sparten kick (like 300), rip an opponents shield from them and throw it at their head like a destruco disk, heal for a percentage of health, or unleash a large flurry of blows that depend on weapon type (daggers will strike a single target several times while hammers allow you to target a single opponent while being able to chain to 2 others). This is well appreciated and I enjoy the fact that you can choose a weapon prefference, though most of the time the damage difference is negligable.

So you get into a fight with some Spartan soldiers, one guy is duel wielding maces, another has a spear and shield, the other guy has just the spear. Combat usually revolves around you being able to attack when available and watching your opponents attempt to strike you, in which you can do one of two things. If their weapon glints like a sun striking metal at the right angle, you can perform a parry, allowing you to stun everyone in a short radius and open up those enemies. If the enemy glows red while attacking, the attack is unblockable and you can dodge, if you dodge at the right time, you can go into slow motion which allows you to get in a few attack or just get some distance.

Here we get to the part that has driven me to make this review, because it was absolutely rage inducing. You see, besides the average grunts you can fight, there are harder enemies (akin to mini/bosses) called mercenaries. Now these mercenaries will follow you to Hades and back. You gain a sort of "wanted meter" as you go about the world doing bad things, such as killing civilians, guards, soldiers, stealing, ect. These mercenaries are just like grunts, but have a bit of the nemesis system built into it, meaning they may be able to bring a pet bear with them to fight along side them, but may be weak to assassination attacks. Other than that, they are honest to god damage sponges, think of a boss that is reletively easy single handed, that you can easily fight one on one, but for some reason the developers decided to give him enough health to last 100 attacks for no reason. The good news is that they can drop some sweet loot, but you have to kill them and whatever buddies they decide to take along.

Here is what drove me to make this review. As I said I am level 33 by the time this mission is around. I am tasked with killing a man in a fort, this man is a cultist and a side objective. This fort has around 30 guards roaming around. I dont want to start a fight immediately and instead attempt to assassinate my way to a brazzier (which the guards can use to call for reinforcements, which you dont want). I have a bounty on me as the game forces one on me for this mission. In my head I am thinking "there are no bounty hunters here, so as long as I am not seen no bounty hunters will show up" my train of though being they would only appear if there were rumors I was at this for. Makes logical sense right? 

So I am killing EVERYONE in this fort silently and quickly. To make sure the bodies of the dead are not found, I carry their bodies and throw them off the edge of the tower to the forest below, where NOBODY will find them and summon bounty hunters here. I get about 80% through killing everyone when I see not one, not two, but THREE bounty hunters walk through the gate.

At this point, my plan to silently kill this cultist and complete my mission is screwed, because as soon as I would try to fight him, these guys would show up and screw me over. So I attempt to ambush them and kill them as quickly as I can (as quickly as you can kill a sack of health taking of as little as 3% of their health with an entire combo).

 I do just that, I get a sneak attack on one of them and then realize the odds are stacked agains me. Not only am I facing 3 people at one time, but I notice they all have different weapons. One guy has duel daggers with poison applied (daggers are extremely quick and hard to tell when its save to parry), a girl has the same sets of daggers with poison, and another is duel wielding maces (reletively easy). Now if that wasnt bad enough, they are all at 2-3 levels higher than me, meaning they soak up even more damage and deal more damage.

I down the woman carrying poison daggers and the duel mace wielder, and focus on the last enemy and I am more than ready to get this fight over with. Then I see on my map not one, not two, not even three, but 6 more fucking bounty hunters with varying weapons, attributes, and levels. I am beyond pissed off.

The fight continues, I somehow down two more, but now im not really fighting, im just dodging praying to mighty zues I dont get hit by anything. So while im fighting anywhere from 2-4 bounty hunters in melee combat (some of which decided to bring animals like bears and wolves) while the remaining enemies are chucking fire/poison grenades, shooting fire/poison arrows, or otherwise being a pain in the ass. As im fighting those in melee I cant even attack anyone because im constantly attempting to parry light attacks, dodge heavy attack, dodge arrows, dodge bombs, avoid poison melee attacks, avoid basically anything and everything.

On top of that someone has called for reinforcements and I am probably fighting 15 enemies at one fucking time, half of these people I am doing so little damage to, its like I am doing more damage to my controller by repeatedly hammering either the light attack or dodge buttons, and even when I do connect its the equivelent of throwing a satin pillow at a concrete wall, halariously ineffective. 

I end up dying, of course, taking out only about two more people. In total, assassinating everyone in the fort probably takes 10 minutes and the rest tas around 30-40 (I shit you not) and I had to do it, not once, not twice, but four fucking times because every time after I got in the fort, at least 3 bounty hunters show up, with even more backup on the way.

I eventually did beat it, but this huge fault in the game shows that the difficulty isnt in the enemies styles or weaponry or tactics, its sheer numbers. Games like dark souls usually have few enemies which are unique in their attacks, openings, or general strategies. Odyssey just fucking throw everything in the kitchen sink, the fridge, and the master bedroom at you and expects you to just be ok with it. I for one am not a fan of wasting nearly 2 hours on a single  MANDATORY mission, which is relatively easy but enjoyable, but arbitrarily made difficult by damage sponges.

Game is fun, but keep this type of stuff in mind, youll be seeing a whole lot of it.

这是刺客信条还是闪退信条？？？？  1.02版本各种闪退，简直不能忍受， 奇葩闪退 ，期间试过开窗口化 关抗锯齿 升级驱动 回退驱动等等一系列办法，然而然并卵，该闪退还是闪退..... 这闪退是毫无征兆，比如我在现在在进行奥林匹克任务 刚杀完奥林匹克那个裁判还是啥的神教成员就闪退了， 早前去一个海岛杀一个神教成员，刚接近200的距离就闪退了，奇葩， 本人配置I7 6700 16G内存  1080显卡 完全无所谓优化问题，奇葩各种闪退，简直不能忍，你可能目前一个任务做到一半闪退了，要重启游戏然后去做其他任务，做完其他任务回来继续前个任务可能不会闪退了，反正我是这么跳着玩的，本以为1.03会修复，然而结果还是这样，貌似就修复了 1.02的主线任务消失BUG， 还入的终极版，我看上闪退信条，建议各位晚点入手，等补丁更新完善了再入.........因为闪退问题毫无疑问我会给差评......

Took assassins creed in a good new direction but then ruined it with awful monetization schemes. A lot of people are on the fence about this game and rightly so. I would at this point recommend the game, with a few warnings.

If you liked Origins, you will like Odyssey. A comparison made about this game is that it's essentially Witcher's Creed: The Wild Odyssey. The dialogue system is built the same way, and the story is improved upon- it's not "Witcher 3" quality, but it's better than Origins, and allows the player to make their own story based on the desicions they make. Personally I'm pretty gripped by the story and exploring Greece on foot or by ship has yet to get old- the map is beautiful and I still find myself excited everytime I discover a viewpoint. Graphically the game is amazing, I'm running an i7 6700k with a GTX 1080 and 16GB of ram, and I average about 55 FPS at 2560x1440 resolution. 

The on foot combat is just like Origins, although target tracking and hit detection is improved upon. You still have the same system for weapons and gear from Origins (including the P2W time savers and 'add-ons'), although the armor/outfits/weapon designs are much improved over Origins IMO. The combat tiself is... usually okay, but tends to become unstable in certain situations. The AI has aboslutley no issue goon swarming you, the lack of invincibility frames while dodging is going to have you running around a lot to try and get breathing room, and the camera has a tendancy to get jacked up in tight spaces like forts, ruins, or huge battles. The sea combat is right out of III/Black Flag/Rogue, with more stream lining and less loading screens during ship boarding animations. Sailings songs are back, in Greek, and will be sung by a male or female chorus depending on what kind of crew you pick for you ship. (My only complaint on this is that I wish the singing volume was a little bit louder.)

The biggest issue I have right now is with the Mercenary system. It's akin to Shadow of Mordor/Shadow of War, and while it's an interesting direction to go in, ultimatley it becomes annoying because I find myself having to pause my big scrambling fights to pay off a bounty every few minutes because the AI characters will just drop 3-4 figure bounties on you to try and get the Merc system to push you out of the fight. I don't like having to pay 3k ingame credits just to be able to finish clearing a fort without an equal level merc (or 3) showing up and spamming elemental/power atacks on me.

tl;dr- If you played Origins, but thought to yourself "gee I wish I cared about this story" or "gee I wish the setting was a little more lively/colorful" or "gee I wish the combat was more refined" or "gee I wish Bayek wasn't such a flat, static bore", you'll like Odyssey for what it improves upon. If you remain unconvinced, wait for a sale, but there's defnitley enough content to justify the $60- I've put 50+ hours into it without completeting the main story and I've maybe explored just over half of the map. There's plenty to do, but unlike Origins I don't find myself forgetting half of what I've done before I even finish the game.

If you love Assassins Creed Origins this is the game for you but still if you love the Assassins Creed franchise you will love the game.

優

1.希臘式建築很漂亮的 地圖很大 類似黑旗的海戰系統回歸

2.支線很多 雖然是RPG 可是不會覺得特別需要農等級 因為支線解一解 等級就莫名超過主線需求的等級了 而且有些支線故事性不錯

3.有斯巴達雅典征服戰系統 

4.多核心優化我覺得比起源更加友善的 

5.金裝更好取得 不必特別去刷奧利哈鋼需求箱子 任務解一解 網路上地圖傳奇寶箱位子找一找 一樣全身金裝

6.主角有神器 各種神威技能有夠帥

7.有男女主角供玩家選擇 "注意 選了之後無法改變性別" 

8.全新對話選擇功能 聽說會影響結局!

9.新的賞金獵人系統 舊通緝系統回歸! 只要被通緝就會有賞金獵人來挑戰玩家 打死會噴裝備 可以利用來刷裝 
"注意 挑戰者會來越來越強大" 玩家可以也可以選擇給錢消通緝 和以前一樣

10.可以隨心所欲亂殺你看到的任何人了 但當然會增加通緝度

11.有傳奇動物可以打 好像在野外打BOSS

12.海陸無接縫

13.敵人有男有女 不過大多數城鎮希臘兵都是男的 
野外部落或強盜女戰士比例就蠻多的 來挑戰的賞金獵人也是有男有女


缺

1.希臘多山地 經常發現趕路 要爬上山 在爬下山 會不爽.

2.地圖上很多 " ? " 眼花撩亂 強迫症玩家請退散

3.斯巴達雅典征服戰系統 意義不大 你可以當作刷等級用 但是 這個遊戲等級並不難升級 這個玩一次 兩次 就會感到無聊了 然後你就不會想再參加。 
而且你幫助斯巴達或雅典兩勢力任何一方取得勝利 也只是有了經驗值跟紫裝備 打完仗以後 六親不認。

4.這我不知道算缺點還優點 我自己歸在缺點 總之主角很難摔死...

5.動物沒有起源那樣物種豐富了 畢竟希臘跟非洲還是有差別的吧

6.跟黑旗一樣 船要農素材升級 好廢時間 以前當學生刷很爽 現在上班沒時間刷直接修改器改素材.



我覺得還是好玩大過不好玩的 我的標準很簡單 只要讓我覺得好玩 就是正評 BUG是少 30小時目前 只遇到一次砍人人飛走

滿分10/給7

My grandmother could optimize a game better than this.  Now that we got the obvious out of the way, Assassin's Creed Odyssey is one of, if not the worst Assassin's Creed game I have played since I first fell in love with the original Assassin's Creed some ten years ago.  This game's development started at around the time The Witcher 3 released, and boy does it show, because Ubisoft has gone full Zeus and ravaged this series' identity and charm and replaced it with a soulless cash grab.  Almost every facet of this game is taken from some other game. The dialogue choices and the corresponding camera angle are taken directly from The Witcher 3.  The story beats and and pacing of the narrative are taken directly from The Witcher 3 (that woman you're looking for is in another castle, now here are some flashbacks of that person you're looking for).  The bounty hunter system is shamelessly ripped from the Lord of the Rings games.  
 
If that wasn't bad enough, Odyssey isn't even that good when compared to its predecessor, Origins.  Suddenly, enemis are super tanky, it takes forever to level up a single time, and upgrading gear now costs an arm and a soul.  Reflecting on why this game is suddenly a chore to progress through for even a nanosecond, it becomes clear that Ubisoft is turning AC into a F2P with a premium model.  Hope you enjoy doing those merc quests, because it's pretty much the only way to get legendary gear now, unless you're lucky enough to stumble upon a legendary chest (that isn't marked on the map) among the vertiable question marks littered throughout the game.  

Speaking of quantity over quality, Ubisoft apparently learned nothing from previous mistakes, such as turning this map into an arduous chore of checklists and completing sidequests simply for the sake of gaining XP to break through Ubisoft's hilarious notion of character progression and leveling requirements.  Enemies not only scale with your level, but any enemy that's three or more levels above you will be impossible to kill.  This creates a very restrictive barrier around the player that prevents any sort of real freedom, because no matter how much you level up, you'll always need to level up one more time to meet the game's stringent requirements.  Which again, is done to incentivize players to spend real cash on "time-savers."  This could have easily been remedied by stretching out the buffer between an enemy that is able to be killed and "You're dead faster than you can blink" enemies.  

I am level 19, and so far I have only come across three legendary weapons. This may not seem that bad, but when compared to Origins, Odyssey's loot system is terribly boring.  There is no real motivation to explore and open chests when that feeling of "it will just be another blue or purple item" is always there.  Ubisoft expects you to do all these merc quests that involve killing a bunch of people, taking over a bunch of camps, or destroying supplies.  Each of these quests gives out an average of 10 Orichalcum.  Considering you need 100 Orichalcum just to buy a legendary weapon from Sargon, it becomes plain to see that the grind in this game is depressingly overwrought. 

Game's writing is terrible too.  Characters like Socrates are shallow caricatures of historical figures.  Ubisoft apparently thinks intellectuals actually talk like this in everyday conversation.   

"Thank you Alexios for doing this errand for me  By the way, what do you think of man's seemingly innate inhumanity to man?"

This is just one of many examples of shoddy writing that I have come across.   The story so far is also terribly paced, and for the past two hours, I feel like I've been doing nothing but busy work for people when all I'm trying to do is track down someone.  One main quest involves talking with Hippocrates.  I got his location, come across another NPC who tells me that Hippocrates isn't here, I need to go over THERE.  I grab the horse over to the new location, and then Hippocrates tells me he's too busy, so he sends me ons ome errands of his own.  I then have to talk to three different people, each of whom have their OWN errand I have to perform.  When you're playing this game it almost feels like you've died and gone to some gamer-equivalent hell where you're forced to do fetch quests in this never-ending torture of "just one more thing and then you can get some catharsis."  

Ubisoft has completely forgotten what made Assassin's Creed fun and intersting.  First they took out the modern segments, and then they replaced the protagonist with Layla Hassan, who is one of the most insufferably written female leads since Aya (yes she supplanted Bayek as far as I'm concerned). They have reverted to putting a metric ton of markers on the map and forcing the player to completel all of them just to get through the dumb level requirements. Very little story, too many fetch quests, grindy gameplay, atrocious writing, and is almost worse in some instances when compared to Syndicate.  

If you're new to AC, you may enjoy this purely because you have no idea how bad things have gotten.  But if you're a longtime AC fan, I Advise you to stay away.  This is Assassins Who Shamelessly Stole Their Creed From Other Games.

听说我买了这游戏全村都震惊了，村长跑到我家对我爸说我疯了！媳妇跟我闹离婚，说这日子没法过了!面对重重压力，我坚持买，终于游戏下载好了，我怀揣着激动的心情，颤抖的打开游戏，那一霎那,感觉我的眼都要亮瞎了，啊..这画质、这剧情！只怪我读书少，无法用华丽的语言来形容它。我骄傲的把电脑搬在村口，霎时，村民们都惊呆了，瞬间时间凝固了，大家眼睛一个个一动不动盯着屏幕，如同夜晚的狼的绿眼睛，泛发着可怕的凶光！几分钟后，整个村都沸腾了，说太好了，太好玩了，说太值了，更有人拼命的喊叫，不给他们看，他们就跳井，吓得我赶紧搬起机箱落荒而逃。

Si has jugado al Origins este juego guarda un gran número de similitudes, hasta el punto en el que puede parecer un DLC. Sin  embargo combina varios elementos de la saga que funcionan sorprendentemente bien, como la navegación y batallas navales, la exploración, un mapa increiblemente grande y abrumador, un estilo rpg y complejo en cierta medida (recuerda mucho al sistema empleado en The Witcher 3), etc.
No diré que sea el mejor juego de la saga, personalmente tiene cosas que no me gustan, pero como he dicho, es algo personal y subjetivo. Es un juego entretenido, complejo y con un argumento que engancha bastante. Si no tuviese el título de Assassin's Creed sería mil veces mejor. Además sirve para ir abriendo apetito hasta que salga Red Dead Redemption 2.

I have died numurus times to a spear guy stabing me THROUGH his friend as they cant hit eachother or geting stuck in a stun lock of stumbling from being hit with large wepons from several targets back to back untill I died with no way to break it. 卡珊德拉一到店，所有开赠礼的人便都看着他笑，有的叫道：‘卡珊德拉，你悬赏又高了！“她不回答，对萨尔贡说，”要两份众神赠礼，再来一把传奇武器。”便排出140奥利哈钢。他们又故意高声嚷道，‘你一定又跑图捡矿了！’卡珊德拉瞪大眼睛说，“你们怎么这样凭空污人清白······”“什么清白？我前天亲眼看见你捡矿偶遇佣兵刺杀不成，吊着打。”卡珊德拉便涨红了脸，额上的青筋条条绽出，争辩道：“背后袭击不能算刺杀······暗杀！······狂战士的事，能算刺杀么？”接连便是难懂的话，什么”高难度分分钟失去同步“、什么“一狂战就被悬赏”之类，引得众人都哄笑起来：店内外充满了快活的空气。

Update: Da ich nicht anders konnte hab ich es mal auf C installiert und siehe da es geht. Für einen AAA-Titel ein No-Go daher bleibe ich bei dem Daumen nach unten. Wenn sich rausstellt, dass das Game so genial ist, dass sich der "Stress" lohnt pass ich es an. Nach dem Intro kann man da noch nicht viel sagen, außer....es sieht echt Hammer aus!


Schade, kann das Spiel nicht empfehlen da es einfach nicht läuft.
Alle Treiber auf dem neuesten Stand, Mein System übererfüllt alle empfohlenen Voraussetzungen, Win 10 auf dem aktuellsten Stand und bis zum Logo und nicht weiter. Habe in einem Forum gefunden, dass alles (Steam, uPlay, AC) auf C installiert sein muss (kann ich mir zwar nicht vorstellen aber naja..) 
Da ich keinen Weg gefunden habe einen Daumen runter.. Schade hatte Bock auf das Game!

Heavily inspired by Witcher 3, taking a number of good elements to enhance the Assssins Creed model. A new Assassins creed experience, that still retains the identity of the series. Definitely the best release since Black Flag, possibly one of the best in the franchise.

I see a lot of complaints on microtransactions, first thing that comes to mind is the xp boost. From my 100-hour experience of the game so far, I have never had an issue with being overly underleveled to the point where the game becomes unfun playing on hard difficulty. With so many non-bounty side quests available to suit your current level, it is nearly impossible to not progress the game naturally even if you simply play the game like how you normally would. Heck people this is an RPG game, you can't expect to finish the game without first experiencing the relevant stories. 
And as for paid equipments, those are completely optional. This is not an online game where you can get an advantage just by paying. You can get a decent amount of fancy equipments just from the main game alone, so it is totally unnecessary to pay. I really want to laugh to the face of the people giving bad reviews purely because of microtransactions.
Finally, needless to say, this game is awesome, being the successor of Origins, it really lived up to its expectations.

TLDR: microtransaction is completely optional and not needed.

Ну що ж ось підбігла черга написати огляд на таку епатажну гру як Assassin's Creed Odyssey
Але давайте розберем чи таки той ассассин крід якого ми заслужили чи ні? 

Cюжет:  Події в грі відбуваються в 431 році до н. е., за чотириста років до подій Assassin's Creed Origins. У центрі сюжету розігруються події Пелопоннеської війни, що відбувалася між давньогрецькими полісами. Гравцеві доведеться узяти на себе роль найманця Алексіос або Кассандри й битися на боці Афін, які керують Афінським морським союзом, або ж Спарти, яка очолює Пелопоннеський союз. В теперішньому часі триває сюжетна лінія Лейли Гассан, героїні, яка вже раніше була в Origins.

Ігровий процес:  В Assassin's Creed Odyssey робиться ще більший акцент на рольову складову, ніж в попередніх іграх серії. У відеогрі будуть присутні: інтерактивна система діалогів, нелінійні квести, різні кінцівки та можливість завести роман з персонажами будь-якої статі, незалежно від статі гравця. Гравець зможе вибрати стать свого персонажа. На відміну від Assassin's Creed Syndicate перемикатися між персонажами буде не можливо, вибір робиться лише раз на початку гри.
Головні герої — Алексіос і Кассандра, є найманцями й нащадками спартанського царя Леоніда. В сутичках вони використовують клинок списа свого предка, який наділяє їх в бою особливими здібностями. У системі розвитку персонажа є три гілки здібностей: асасина з навичками непомітності, воїна з акцентом на бойові вміння та мисливця, що дозволяє краще стріляти з лука. Доступні різні елементи спорядження — нагрудники, шоломи, щити та поручі, які можна покращувати. Функцію орлиного зору у головних героїв подібно Байеку з Assassin's Creed Origins виконує орел Ікар. Рівень ворогів тепер буде збільшуватися разом з рівнем персонажа. Повернеться шкала популярності — при скоєнні злочинів на очах в інших, вона буде рости, і гравця можуть оголосити в розшук.
Ігровий світ складається з 27 зон і є найбільшим в серії, а також географічно різноманітним — в ньому присутні снігові гори, ліси, піщані пляжі тощо. Значну частину карти займають моря. У гру повернуться морські битви. У гравця буде можливість покращувати свій корабель, а також найняти практично будь-якого персонажа до себе в команду. Деякі рекрути можуть давати бонуси до корабля, на кшталт поліпшення здоров'я або підвищення урону. Також з'являться масштабні наземні бої, участь в яких будуть брати до трьохсот персонажів. У кожній ігровій зоні є свій лідер, який може нападати на противника, звертатися за допомогою до гравця-найманця або загинути від його руки.
У відеогрі з'являться нові подробиці, що стосуються Першої Цивілізації. В теперішньому часі Лейла Гассан знаходиться в пошуках артефактів та інформації про неї. Одного разу вона виявляє втрачену книгу першого історика Геродота, що містить відомості про спартанського найманця, який міг контактувати з артефактами Першої Цивілізації. Спис Леоніда, успадкований Алексіосом або Кассандрою, є тим самим артефактом, а сам цар — носій ДНК Першої Цивілізації.

Графічна складова: Тут все на висоті. Дуже гарні пейзажі, неперевершені, просто не передати словами. Картинка шикарна

Музична складова: Тут все теж на висоті, саундтреки підібрані дуже вдало для цієї епохи. Особливо одна композиція, яка пройме на сльозу ностальгії, хто грав у попередні частини асасина поймуть мене. 

Бойовою системою я задоволений. Наче граєш Dark Souls та водночас якусь РПГ, треба добре підбирати тактику до суперників. Морські бої теж сподобались. Можна набирати людей у свою команду, кастомізація корабля і так дальше, з тим все тут круто. Також кастомізація головного героя чи героїні, шмотки, зброя різний лут тут все чудово.


А тепер перейдемо до мінусів. Гра не ідеальна, має недоліки. Одним з них є те, щоб швидше прокачатись треба доплатити реальні гроші (Привіт мікро платежі, вашу матір). Ніхто і не заставляє донарити, перса можна і так прокачати, хоча це буде довго, але я вважаю у цьому великому світі є чим зайнятись і без донату. Хоч у мене вже комп старе відро, мало що буде тягнути, але вибачте, з оптимізацією тут є проблеми. Я розумію світ великий, всякі смаколики і так дальше, але можна було б краще оптимізувати, надіюсь це лише на момент написання огляду. Також є проблема, дикий дисбаланс. Дратує коли який NPC чи тварина може тебе легко завалити, легше ніж якийсь солдат. Це дико дратує. Тварини тут теж скажені (Привіт Far Cry 5).

Плюси: 
Великий та красивий світ
Графічна складова
Музична складова
Морські та сухопутні бої
Цікаві, харизматичні персонажі та квести

Мінуси: 
Це вже не асасин крід
Оптимізація
Дикий дисбаланс та мікро платежі

Висновок: Моя одісея по сюжету закінчилась, але ще чекає безліч пригод. Давайте будемо чесні, асасинами тут і не пахне. Так гра дуже крута, тут не посперечаєшся, для мене найкраща гра 2018 року. Просто на мою думку юбікам треба було забрати слова Assassin's Creed, вона сюди ну ніяк не підходить. І перестаньте її порівнювати з Відьмаком 3. Це зовсім різні ігри, так дещо вони скопіювали, але не все. Я розумію юбіки вдосконалюються і роблять різні експерименти, в них це дійсно виходить, але я б так на 3-4 роки зупинив цю серію і дав її відпочити. Все ж таки люди ще не встигли скучили за асасином після оріджинс. Якби там не було, асасини лишиться завжди у моєму серці.

ASSASSIN's CREED ODYSSEY REVIEW 
เปิดตำนาญนักรบผู้กล้า นักฆ่า assassin's และ จิตวิญญานนักรักของทั้ง alexios และ kassandra อีกด้วย 
สำหรับภาคนี้ เราจะได้เลือกเล่นเป็นตัวละครระหว่าง alexios หรือ kassandra ซึ่งสำหรับผม จะเลือกเล่นเป็น alexios เพราะรู้ศึกอินกว่า เหมือนได้อารมแบบนักรบ สปาร์ต้า มากๆ ถ้าเล่นเป็น kassandra จะไม่ค่อยอินเท่าไหร่นัก สำหรับเรื่องเกมส์ จะเป็นแนว รอบเร้น เอ้ย แนวนักรบ เออ มันก็ได้หมดแหละ จะ stealth หรือ action ก็ได้ ไม่มีปัญหา เพราะ ตัวเกมส์ได้ออกแบบทั้ง 2 ระบบนี้ มาได้เป็นอย่างดี และ ลงตัวมากๆ คุณจะเล่นแบบไหนก็ได้ ไม่ผิดกติกาไดๆทั้งนั้น เล่นแบบ ลอบฆ่า ก็สนุก และ ตื่นเต้นดี เล่นแบบ บู๊ล้างผลาญ ก็เพลินๆดี แถมมีทั้ง กลุ่มทหารรับจ้าง มาให้ฆ่าเล่น หรรือ มาฆ่าเราก็ไม่รู้ เพราะ บางทีมากัน 2 3 4 ตัว ถ้าเราโดนหมายหัวถึงระดับรุนแรง เหมือนกับ การที่มี 5 ดาว แบบ GTA อะไรประมาณนั้น แต่ อันนี้เปลี่ยนเป็น จะมีคน หรือ นักฆ่า หรือ ทหารตามล่าเราแทน ไหนจะพวก บ้าลัทธิ อีก ที่ให้เราได้ตามล่า แล้วเก็บ สามเหลี่ยม พินกีต้า หรือ อาทิแฟค เพื่อมาอัพเกรต หอกแห่ง ลีโีไนดาส อีกด้วย มันส์สาสๆ แค่ได้ท่องเที่ยวไปทั่วแมพ ที่กว้างใหญ่กว่าภาค origin ซะอีก ก็คุ้มแล้ว เดินทำเควสตามกระดาน ตามหาคน หาของ สำรวจโลก ไล่ค้า บ้าผู้หญิง แม้แต่ จะเป็นเก ก็ได้นะ 555 ลองมาแล้ว สยิวกิ้วสุดๆ อิอิ ถ้าเล่นเป็นผู้หญิง ตีฉิ่งก็ได้นะ อิอิ สำหรับเกมส์การเล่นต่างๆ อาจจะดูไม่ต่างจาก origin มากนัก รวมถึง interface และ การต่อสู้ ก็คล้ายๆกัน แต่ ภาคนี้ จะมี สกิล เข้ามา บอกตรงๆ เกมส์จะไปในแนว the witcher อีกด้วย ไหนจะนำระบบ ร่องเรือแบบภาค black flag อีกต่างหากซึ่งผมชอบมากๆๆ แต่ ไม่มีปืนใหญ่นะ จะใช้ผลธนู สู้กัน และ พวกปาหอก และก็บุกยึดเรือได้ เย่ๆ มีระบบ อัพสกิล อัพเกรตอาวุธ ชุดเกาะ ซึ่งไม่ได้เป็นแค่ costume อีกต่อไป จะมีผลกับ stat ต่างๆในเกมส์ด้วย ไหนจะต้องหา ลูกเรือ อัพเกรตเรืออีก ซึ่ง เยอะแยะ มากมาย อีลุงตุงนังไปหมด 555 แต่เล่นๆไป แมร่งเพลินหวะ เนื้อเรื่องผมสามารถไม่เดินได้เลย เพราะผมชอบเดินเล่น ขี่เรือ ขี่ม้าเล่น ทำเควสกะเรียกะราด ไล่ฆ่าพวกทหารรับจ้าง แค่นี้ก็หมดๆไป 20 30 ชั่วโมงแล้ว สำหรับเสียง และ ภาพ ทำออกมาได้เยอดเยี่ยมเหมือนภาค oriigin เลย เกมส์เพล์สนุกสุดๆ แต่ อาจจะมีบัคเสียงบ้าง แบบ เหมือนเสียงเยอะๆ แล้ว เสียงบางอย่างไม่ออก ก็รอแก้กันไป เนื้อเรื่องพอใช้ได้ ตามหาพ่อแม่ หาความจริงของครอบครัว สปอยนิดๆนะ ขออภัย 

GAMEPLAY 10/10
PERFORMANCE 9.0/10
SOUND AND MUSIC 10/10
GRAPHIC 10/10
STORY 9.0/10
FINAL SCORE 9.6/10 

แม้จะไม่ใช่เกมส์ assassin's ที่เราเคยรู้จัก อาจจะมีความเป็น ACTION RPG เข้ามาเต็มรูบแบบ และ ในตัวเกมส์ ยังมีฉากจบ และ บทสนทนาต่างๆ ก็มีทางเลือกให้เราตอบ ซึ่งเกมส์ซีรี่นี้ ไม่เคยทำมาก่อน แต่ ก็เป็นการ ผสมผสานที่ สุดยอด และ ลงตัวสุดๆ ในภาคที่แล้ว ว่า ยอดเยี่ยม สุดยอดแล้ว ภาคนี้ ทำได้ดีขึ้นไปอีก มีทุกอย่างที่ภาคที่แล้วมี และ ได้ต่อยอดความสำเร็จ มีระบบต่างๆเพิ่มเข้ามาอีกมากมาย และ ทำให้ตัวเกมส์ คือที่สุด ของเกมส์ในซีรี่นี้แล้วครับ เงินที่ผมเสียไป 3,300 บาท ไม่มีเสียดายซักแดงเดียว ซื้อความสุข มาเสพ ดีกว่า ซื้อ ยาบ้า มาเสพ เยอะครับ

AC Odyssey is a really fun game to play. That'll be the first thing I tell people when they ask how my experience is with it. 

Unfortunately, it falls prey to the same things recent AC games have, but to a lesser degree. It lacks a lot of polish. The graphics aren't up to the standards of say Kingdom Come: Deliverance, Spider-Man, or [insert fairly new game here]. The story is cool, but very, very predictable. I found myself not surprised by literally every plot twist, every character's actions, and every big scene. What the game does well is deliver a beautiful atmosphere that makes you feel a part of the Greek world, and takes you on an interesting (but again, predictable) journey through it.


Pros: Great atmosphere/immersion, beautiful music, fun characters, a 'choices matter' system with fair concequences, memorable villains, few glitches.

Cons: a frustrating combat system featuring unblockable/undodgeable hits, inprecise timing, slow player to difficulty scaling, poor keyboard mapping that cannot be customized, and a lot of "really, I survived all that just to be killed by this" moments. Again, a very, very, very, VERY predictable story. Like wow. It's still interesting to see the character's develope through the game's events and the player's guidance, but it refuses to throw anything new at you. Lackluster romance options, an ungodly amount of grinding required to keep your armor and weapons on par with your level due to the game's terribly balanced crafting system, and of course, microtransactions that boil down to "pay more money so you don't have to grind for five hours to upgrade your ship, weapon, or armor".


Overall, the game is fun, the atmosphere is cool, the characters are delightful, but it's all stuff we've seen before. the storytelling was done better in Dishonored and Horizon: Zero Dawn, the choice making was done better in the Mass Effect series and Fallout series, the combat was done better in Batman: Arkham City and Middle Earth: Shadow of War, and the crafting was done better in The Witcher 3, and The Legend of Zelda: Breath of The Wild. Heck, even the sailing and ship to ship combat was done better in a previous installment of the series with AC 4: Black Flag.  Everything AC:Odyssey has to offer has been done better by other games that came out before it, and everything new it brings to the AC series is either poorly implemented, or kinda' meh. 
(What I really did like was the ability to scan an area with your eagle in order to locate points of interest, enemies, eliete enemies, and treasures in order to form a plan of attack. It was okay in Origins, and made better in Odyssey.)

But still! It's a fun game that as an AC fan I loved, and as a video game fan, I thought was solid, if not a bit unoriginal and unpolished.

For the poopy part of the review, I have to say that the microtransactions are a joke, they pull the same garbage that EA and mobile devs pull, and it's blatantly obvious. It's a purely single player game, Ubisoft, why are there in game transactions? They use these 'time savers' packs to get you to buy meager amounts of resources for not-so-meager amounts of money. It can save you six hours of grinding, but at the cost of $11.99. It's dumb, it's predatory, and the gaming community has made it clear that we hate it.

The microtransactions, the abysmal crafting/grinding system, the unpolished, lacking combat, the subpar graphics, and the unoriginality get this game a thumbs down from me. Wait a while until it's on sale, then have fun roaming the Greek world. It's not worth it at $60 right now. 

7/10, maybe 7.5 considering a lot of the side quests you can find have a lot of cool storylines and characters.

Otherwise it's pretty good but the arrow issue makes certain areas almost impossible to get through.

Odyssey = Origins in Ancient Greece + Black Flag sailing.  It seems fairly obvious that Ubisoft took the most popular features from past AC games and put them all into one, and it actually works pretty well.  It still has its flaws, of course, but 41 hours into the game, I'm still having a blast and there's still so much to do in the main story.  I would say that if you enjoyed Origins, you'll like Odyssey whether or not you played Black Flag.  If you liked Black Flag but did not like Origins, then I'd probably stay away from Odyssey, since the vast majority of Odyssey's gameplay is on land and is therefore nearly identical to Origins.

Since Odyssey borrows so much from Origins and Black Flag, I'm not going to go into detail about those game systems as they aren't new.  As for what IS new, well, the combat is different, you use a broken spear for assassinations instead of a hidden blade (it's actually more involved than that), and there's a cultist tracking/hunting system.

I find the combat to be harder than Origins, and not in a good way.  Most of that really boils down to enemies having too much health (or maybe it's just that there's no insta-kill abilities in combat:  I seriously miss counter kills from previous AC games).  Your abilities mostly require adrenaline to use and most have cooldown timers, which is lame, especially considering that some enemies appear to be able to spam their special attacks with reckless abandon.  My other major gripe with the combat is that enemies can attack at any time they wish while you're hitting them (apparently, they can work through the pain), but you can't do the same:  standard enemy attacks will always override your standard attacks (to be fair, though, your special attacks will always override an enemy's special attacks).  All of this put together makes combat feel kinda clunky, honestly.  It's not bad by any means, but it's not as good as it was in Origins, either.

The broken spear is your hidden blade substitute in Odyssey, and in terms of use, it functions pretty much identically to the hidden blade in Origins, with the notable exception that you can't assassinate while hanging underneath a target from a ledge.  On the flipside, because it's held like a dagger, if your character is wielding a one-handed weapon like a sword, he/she will use the spear in combat as an offhand weapon.  It looks cool, but has no function in combat.  The other big exception to the spear is that it can be upgraded, which affects your overall combat prowess.  It also serves as a gate for your skills:  most skills can't be upgraded to their final level until your spear is at level 5 (out of 6).  Spear upgrades are tied directly to the cultist system:  each cultist you kill has an item that you collect, and when you collect enough of those items, you can upgrade your spear.

Speaking of the cultist system, it has been completely redesigned from the one in Origins.  There are many more targets than in Origins, and the design of the cult tracking menu lets you see just how many cult members you have to kill from the moment you first see it.  Most cult members start off unknown:  you have to track down clues to identify them.  Once you identify them, you can "unmask" them in the cult tracking menu, and once they are unmasked, you can attempt to assassinate them.  Assassinating a cult member is a free-form thing:  it is usually not tied to a quest (though some are), which means that you're more or less free to go after cult members in whatever order you wish, assuming that your level is high enough to take on a particular cult member.  Just by playing the story, you will unmask a few cult members that will be much too difficult for you to handle until you level up (similar to Origins, small level gaps = big difficulty spikes, so it's best to wait to take on enemies until you're within only one or two levels of their level).  If you try to take on a cult member that is three or more levels higher than you, you'll get destroyed in a straight up fight.  You might be able to assassinate them stealthily, but it will involve multiple assassination attempts followed by panicked running/hiding when you see how little damage each assassination does.  Still, if you're patient (i.e. insane) enough to assassinate and run/hide from a single target 20 times, it's possible to get away with it.

Now, some of the bad stuff:
1. The game is grindy.  In order to keep up with enemy levels and not get shredded in combat, you have to do every single mission you can find.  Every.  Single.  One.  Naturally, for $10 real money (on top of the $60 you already paid for the game itself), Ubisoft is willing to sell you a permanent XP boost that smooths that leveling out and allows you to pick and choose which side quests are worth your time, which, ahem, isn't a shady, despicable business practice at all. /sarcasm
2. Upgrading your gear is too expensive.  I loved the concept of this system when it was introduced in Origins, but I don't remember it being this expensive.  The drachme (gold/in-game currency) costs are fine, but the resource costs to upgrade gear are pretty ridiculous, and only get more ridiculous the higher you go.  It's the same with your ship's upgrades, which just adds more grinding time to an already grindy single player game.  Or...you could pay some more real money for one of Ubisoft's resource packs, which, again, isn't a deplorable business tactic at all.
3. Restricted areas are sometimes too big and give insufficient warning that you are tresspassing.  You can be walking along a public street, minding your own business when suddenly, you see your compass background turn yellow or red and the guards attack because you were "tresspassing" at that building across the street.  It doesn't happen a lot, but often enough that it's annoying.
4. If there are witnesses to a fight, killing in self-defense counts as a murder towards the bounty system.  What's more, your "crimes" are reported immediately, and can even be reported by other people already involved in the fight.

全球股市振荡，结果育碧股票涨了。

出之前一个个喊育碧换皮，迟早药丸
出了后一个个沉迷旅游，无法自拔

出之前说奥德赛是起源的大型DLC
出了后发现起源是奥德赛的付费DEMO（包括我）

不过讲真，这一代支线依然有点欠打磨，有的支线挺有意思，但依然是跑路杀人搜东西，征服战和主线多结局也没太深挖。希望育碧用这两年加点劲，把这几个系统改一改，把玩法再丰富一点

优点
1.[h1]小兵能力及战斗革命性优化[/h1].再也不是前几代无脑架盾或防反，主角是狂战士，但小兵也是狂战士，还是一群！个体不如主角，但胜在人多，一人给你一脚斯巴达踢，三四个人同时砍你，弓箭手还会放毒放火，打个野猪都会被顶翻，不会及时闪避放技能就只能开简单然后靠等级压。

2.[h1]有趣的主动技能[/h1]。育碧这几年游戏的主动技能都特别有意思，看门狗(标记后看戏，美滋滋)，彩六围观[strike](用小马哥花dick)[/strike]，还有这一代奥德赛。虽然这些技能单个来看不算太有创意，但可玩性和手感极佳，组合在一起更是趣味无穷。
给我一个斯巴达踢，我能踢翻全希腊
给我一个标记，我能杀光旧金山
给我一个夹子和蛊，谁进来谁死
[spoiler]给我一个小马哥，我要画dxxk恶心对面(雾，还有，别问我干嘛一个梗玩两遍，我刚看完死侍2)[/spoiler]

3.[h1]富有挑战性的收集要素[/h1]。这一代有四个大的收集要素（当然，依然有刺客信条祖传的清地点和宝箱），神教成员，巨兽，佣兵和亚特兰蒂斯，每一个都有各自的特点。
虽然依然可能有人对此厌烦，但至少这样少而精的收集比满世界找五十个碎片或者是追到处乱跑的船歌好多了。

缺点：
1.育碧毕竟还是一个偏向工业流水线的游戏公司，所以虽然时常想出特别棒的创意，却总不愿意深挖打磨。
就像刚才所说，[h1]征服战太鸡肋了[/h1]，第一次玩挺新鲜，像是黑魂版真割草无双，但对主线没帮助，也和收集要素以及成就没有必然关系，所以我现在都懒得特意去开征服战了，除非一个地方无意中被我开出来了（比如慢慢地杀光了一个要塞。。。）然后我快升级了，才会去打。

2.[h1]佣兵有点迷[/h1]。后来才明白，佣兵会更新，然后要杀掉高阶的才能进阶。虽然这可能是我玩游戏时不带脑子所以明白得太晚，但这个系统的指引还是有点过于简单。

3.我们俩国开战呢，你特么居然认为我是犯罪然后喊佣兵？？！火盆召来几个佣兵能理解，可是直接给我加悬赏也太操蛋了吧，你干嘛不直接花一大笔钱屠光对面营地算了！

4.[h1]BUG[/h1]。。。虽然我没遇到任何人物BUG，40小时左右也只遇到过一次，但看许多人截图，任务消失或者任务目标遁入里世界。。。果然是个做BUG的公司。有的BUG其实挺好玩的，但涉及存档和任务的BUG一个比一个闹心。

总体而言是十分推荐的，六万的在线，极佳的销量，上涨的股价和收钱n9.2的评分足以证明游戏的可玩性了，而那些技能的有趣之处看视频是体会不到的。
只不过这在不支持什么鬼指令集的cpu上运行时会直接崩溃，而且游戏本身也贼特么吃U，建议u比较久的玩家们忍一忍，换了电脑等打折再买吧。

黄金版408抢钱么，不如等几个月打五折等几年免费送。
真香！
=================================
推荐黄金版，季票加两个dlc。
先说说优点：
自由度很高，地图很大，感觉有黑旗的地图那么大。
剧情也很有意思，可以跟npc通过不同的选项达到不同的目的。
战斗强度也很高，身为斯巴达却再也不能当狂战士了，遇到小兵可以打几个，遇到雇佣兵，对不起，两个以上就可以直接跑了。
战斗难度主要体现在伤害较低，护甲也很低，大家等级都一样，你被对面砍三刀就差不多 了，对面你可能要摸30刀才行，你倒地了对面可以插你一刀，对面倒地了你并不能在地上插他。
还有就是可能之前潜行游戏玩的多，感觉猎人技能很鸡肋，偷袭打不死，战斗也没输出。
然后就是缺点
支线任务虽然多但是基本上就是重复的杀人或者找东西。
bug依旧多，加载存档黑屏，游戏关不掉，游戏内任务穿模。
这游戏太肝了，资源获取太少了，我偷一个国家宝藏才1000块，船升级最低等级都要1400，不是很懂国家怎么造的起船的。

I listened to a whole ancient greek history podcast to refresh myself on Greece and to of hype myself for the game (its a free yale podcast lecture on the apple podcast store). While there are many factual liberties made this is the closest thing we'll get to a solid RPG based in Classical Ancient Greece. I still really enjoy playing it and I'm around 50 hours in. The leveling can feel grindy (lvl 24 atm), but I have found plenty to do and explore that makes it feel at a solid pace most of the time.
Thank you Ubi for the AVX patch, running a 1050ti and im glad i can finally play!

Apesar da história ser um tanto melhor que no Origin e os gráficos serem melhores, não consigo recomendar pela quantidade de mudanças na jogabilidade, movimentação e na forma de combate.

A coisa ficou muito superficial, uns poderes bem sem noção, é fácil lidar com um grupo de inimigos... A dificuldade se dá mais pela quantidade de danos recebida que pela melhora na estratégia de combate dos inimigos. Combate, este, que ficou muito mais voltado ao esmagamento de botões do controle do que se desenrolar de uma forma mais natural, como sempre havia sido.

Quem gostou de Origin certamente irá gostar deste. Quem gostou dos anteriores terá que ter muita paciência e cabeça aberta pra lidar com a nova mecânica. Veja por você mesmo, portanto. 

Somando esses pesos à Ubisoft enchendo o jogo com microtransações, sendo que já é um jogo caro, na minha humilde opinião, deixa tudo ainda mais sem sal.

Como disse: veja por você. Mas ao menos espere uma temporada de descontos no Steam pra comprá-lo mais barato ou ganhá-lo de presente, caso fique na dúvida. Eu não gostei a ponto de querer pedir reembolso do dinheiro.
什么垃圾游戏~~~~~~真香！

There really needs to be a better review system on here like a numerical rating or a neutral thumbs up/down. I'm kinda in between with this one so I guess I'll put a thumbs down so more people will see it. A lot of the positive reviews here come from peopple very early off in the game and it's understandable since it starts off very strong. If I were rate the first 10 or so hours spent playing, I'd give it at least a 9/10. The story and RPG elements are awesome and even though a lot of people say Odyssey is a copy and paste of past Assassin's Creed games, I think they definitely stepped it up with Odyssey. The choice makin, gameplay, and story are a huge step up. But after the first 10 or so hours, the game comes to almost an instant stop. The story begins to go beyond slow and it starts to become filled with filler missions and things to just extend the game. The main story quests start to require a level limit so you need to do a bunch of side stuff just to continue the story UNLESS you purchase Ubisoft's XP micro transactions to speed up the game basically allowing you to pay Ubisoft to beat the game for you. This game is just WAY too long. I don't know why Ubisoft makes these way longer than they need to be other than to just sell their micro transactions. It'd be a 10/10 in my book if they focused less on the length and more on the quality that was seen at the beginning of Odyssey.

Обзор написан после прохождения  2-х первых эпизодов игры.

Почти 30 часов запоем и это не предел (хотя за это время проходились Ларка 2013 и Фар Край 3). Хочется идти вперед и вперед.

В игре есть чем заняться, есть центральная ветка и куча побочных. Некоторые из квестов спорные, к ним хотелось бы что-то добавить, но разработчики об этом не позаботились, из-за этого впечатления чуть хуже, чем могли быть.

Относительно платных дополнений, да они есть. Но с другой стороны, тут плотно забиты локации - есть поиск предметов (некоторые не очень приятны и продуманы). А инвентарь героя бесконечн (если на высших сложностях это не так, то поправьте, в комментариях).

Умения героя - впрочем ничего необычного из мира РПГ, если не брать в счёт то, что не обязательно качать всю ветку, а можно отложить отчки умений и получить то, что хочется, когда возьмете уровень. Неоторые умения привязаны к дополнительным заданиям. 

Оружие можно улучшать по идее бесконечно, но пока для этого нет смысла, оно падает, падает и падает. Поэтому может быть потом, выбрать то, что с эстетической точки зрения зацепит.

Не все НПС вызывают какие-то чувства, даже с оригинальной английской озвучкой. Кстати на этот раз можно выбрать другую озвучку, оставив интерфейс и субтитры на русском языке (главное запомните где выбор языка в меню). На немецком звучит вроде без греческого акцента. А еще нет простейших разговоров с людьми, что странно, после того же Скайрима.

Обязательно нужны свежие дрова на видеокарту, на старых может вообще не запуститься. Очень долго может загружать автосейв в случае смерти ГГ. На корабле один раз получилось упасть в текстуры. Ну и часть вторичных героев могут убить звери или вы сами - тем самым загубив себе квест. 

По ощущениям это смесь Лары Крофт, Хитамана Абсолюшиун, может Ведьмака и даже каких -нибудь ММО.  Ощущение, что Юбисофт и правда отправился в поиски новых горизонтов, а также поиска того, как охватить аудиторию побольше.

По мере прохождения, либо заруинивания игры обзор будет дополняться. 
 А пока палец вверх и 83 наемника из 100.

You will see alot of people complaining about microtransactions. Ignore them. The game doesn't push it on you at all. You can play this game and never open up that tab. 

Instead, focus on how beautiful the game is. The map is huge and it is incredible. The most beautiful game I have ever played. I find the combat to be pretty fluid as well, which is something ive also seen people complain about. Greek lore is something I have always loved and this game does a great job with it.  Overall 10/10 and well worth the price tag in my opinion.
刺客信条历史最佳毫无疑问，剧情直逼巫师三，战斗系统甚至优于巫师三，缺点在于过于严格的等级系统限制了玩家的自由度，让剧情不连续，还有就是育碧游戏模式僵化的毛病（偷某物，杀某人）但这也是系列作品的必然后果

من الاجمل الاجزاء اسسن 
ممتعه بشكل خرافي 
100/100
首先，我买游戏的时候清清楚楚看到10.5号能玩，然后就不说了。游戏内容也很一般，就拿传奇野兽来说，起源是大象，这里石头野猪。本质上没什么区别，更令我费解的是，装备还有属性划分那么明显！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！E叔一把袖剑就够了，为什么这里要搞那么多莫名其妙的东西，我是来玩刺客的，不是来这里算收益的。真要怎么玩，我还不如去玩毒奶粉···············

奥德赛相对于起源：
1. 画面感官上好像并没什么不同，给我带来的只有景色风格的不同。
2. 战斗上我更喜欢奥德赛的1234技能机制，给了我更多还手的余地。但是刺杀上我更喜欢起源，即便是游戏初期我也能够通过观察地形敌人走向，神不知鬼不觉的给对方来一下让其毙命，而奥德赛中初期即便我跟敌人同等级，即便我的武器升过级，但我依然无法完全通过刺杀解锁一个地点，简单讲就是伤害不够。
3. 船只在奥德赛中已然成为玩家探索世界的载具，但是海战中缺少了起源的战鼓声，所以感觉没有起源海战时激情。
4. 奥德赛存在这一些BUG，有一次我在爬山时候莫名钻进了游戏里世界，一直掉落到游戏世界下方。每次死亡后点击空格加载最新存档有大概率会黑屏卡死，只能通过手动选档才可避免。有些时候进入游戏是有低概率也会黑频卡死。而起源无非就是偶尔掉下帧。

不懂为什么奥德赛作为一款无论从剧情深度、战斗系统全面优于起源的作品，好评率竟然还要低于起源。看着评论区乱七八糟的差评理由真的很生气，cpu优化、闪退、任务剧情bug这些给差评当然没问题，但是下面这些理由感觉真的很可笑，更可怕的是这些理由反而带起了节奏引起很多人跟风成为主流。

[h1]材料稀缺、氪金问题[/h1]
“不氪金没法玩”、“育婊逼着玩家氪金”，这些说法完全不知道立足点是什么。
[u]从目前自己的游戏旅程来看[/u]，材料不够、装备升不上去这个说法根本就是胡扯淡。
游戏中除了木材确实是稀缺资源（船只升级），武器升级所需要的材料，各个商人都有出售，养一套橙装来讲绝对是够用了。说材料不够的亲是不是从来不卖/拆蓝装？还是强迫症玩奇迹暖暖，每一套装备都要满级呢？
船只的升级确实需要很多资源，但是，亲，您在30级的时候就想把所有部件升满，如果这样的话您到后期升级什么？游戏策划肯定是要把升级过程设计平滑，一开始就想神装，那亲您怎么不去和古天乐做兄弟？看着那些游戏时间十来个小时就抱怨游戏材料稀缺，船只升不满，请您到满级的时候再看看您的船是不是满级。人物等级不满就想开满级战舰怕不是活在梦里。
最后关于奥利哈钢，这作很多橙装可以通过神教主线任务、探索获得，而且词条相对合理（属性加成）。反观开箱、直接购买的橙装则大多为垃圾装备，装备词条智障概率很大。亲放着白给的不要沉迷开箱，开了半天没得到好装备奥利哈钢却用完了，于是便甩出一句”这游戏设计就是为了让我们氪金，不氪金都没能用的装备“。亲喜欢抽奖出门左转FGO不好吗，那里是能抽出老婆的呦，体验比这个好多了。

[h1]战斗难度[/h1]
其实战斗难度衍生出来的也是氪金问题，差评的逻辑：刺客一刀捅不死=难度太大=装备不够好=我没有氪金所以我垃圾。
只能说现在育碧游戏因为其知名度，导致轻度玩家越来越多，很多亲都没有稍微花个哪怕10分钟去研究这个游戏的战斗机制，就在评论区抱怨游戏垃圾。
亲开个普通难度都过不去，大概亲从来没有洗过天赋吧。或者亲一身刺客加成然后掏出大锤子刚正面，只能说勇气真的是可嘉呢。这代装备系统相对于起源，不是简单的攻防数值大小，人物需要合理的装备支撑自己的流派才会变得强力。我自己玩的噩梦难度，刺杀秒不掉的情况确实有，但真的不算多，况且接个英雄一击基本都能死，和秒杀没区别。
另外还有人吐槽佣兵追着自己满世界跑，首先亲，佣兵交了赏金就不追你了教程有写，杀了赞助者就不追你了教程也有写。赏金不贵，赞助者也好杀，亲要是真觉得烦交点儿钱或者花个3分钟杀了赞助者就行了。何况，亲，赏金条的增长是因为亲杀人各种被目击，这是刺客信条不是刺客无双，亲从大门杀进兵营能不被通缉么？喜欢正面刚有款游戏叫GTA5我猜亲一定喜欢。

[h1]支线剧情 任务公式化[/h1]
发出这种言论的亲，应该是把随机的公式化任务当成支线任务来做了。这代支线、主线的任务叹号都是黄色的，那种刷材料、刷钱的任务是黑色银边的图标，上面还有诸如沙漏、箭头的记号来表示该任务的类型。奥德赛的主线、支线剧情质量还是看的过去的，支线大多是与历史名人、名胜相关，这也能被说同质化真的很费解。

[h1]奥德赛是起源2[/h1]
许多评论认为奥德赛是起源升级版，没有太多创新，所以给出差评。
奥德赛在起源的基础上进行改良，追加新要素，完善战斗系统，确实没有太多创新。但是因为”没有创新“就给差评，亲到底是冲着“好玩”去玩游戏，还是冲着单纯的”创新“、”新鲜感“去玩游戏的？
有创新并不等于好作品，奥德赛将一个已经有的模式做的很优秀，然而因为这个模式是先前存在的，亲就去给它扣上一顶”垃圾游戏“帽子吗？亲吃火锅会因为“涮锅这种吃法别家早就用烂了，没创新”去评价一家火锅店垃圾吗？

最后吐槽一下现在玩家真的是难伺候，刺客信条这种年货作品要求画面好自由度高战斗系统有趣且富有创新，这种玩家真的不适合玩年货。没有一款年货游戏是每作都大改，能带给玩家无尽的新鲜感的（请参考NBA 2K，古墓丽影，全面战争）。玩年货请抱着玩年货的心态去玩，要求太多只会给自己添堵。

Game is like a personal fantasy of mine. I love ancient greece and greek mythology. I've always wanted to see greece in it's hay day. I also love the idea of being a spartan killing mythological creatures. The game itself is just damn fantastic. Love every minute of it.

Game is huge, looks great, is fun and it runs better than expected on my aging PC.

这作和刺客没有关系。三个可操控人物里面唯一的刺客是蕾拉。

一开始宣传片和截图给我的感觉就好像是起源换了个皮改了个背景就放上来了。实际上手之后，发现区别还是很大。最重要的一点就是，虽然起源的支线任务已经开始带着剧情故事而不是单纯的杀几个人，但玩家并不能对巴耶克的言行做出控制。这其实可能也和巴耶克守护者的背景身份有关系。在奥德赛里，主人公（甚至）不是一名刺客，而是一个没有所属势力的雇佣兵。

这一作里，玩家可以肆无忌惮地屠杀平民而不怕失去同步，惩罚机制则变成了从上一代发展而来的佣兵系统。也是第一次，玩家可以决定主人公对事物的看法和态度，甚至能够影响剧情的走向。一开始我以为育碧只是照猫画虎地弄了一套按钮，选择的结果无非是或战或打。直到发展到剧情的后半，我才发现我当初一个随手的选择对目前的状况造成了多大的影响。在这一点上，育碧刚刚起步，却已经做得不错了。毕竟，伟大如巫师三也不过是在任务里重复接取-完成-分支-接取的循环而已，只是奥德赛在脚本的细节和前后对话的连贯性上还有很长的路要走。

（这里说一句，育碧发售前说的选择不会惩罚玩家其实并不准确。这一作依然有着支线和主线相互孤立的老毛病。育碧的解决办法是让游戏的等级壁垒变得异常之高，强迫你去完成一些支线来得以完成主线要求的任务。在支线里，玩家做出的错误选择除了良心谴责外并不会造成实质影响，比如我就因为同意让村民去反抗当地的神教势力而害死了许多人，却并没有受到惩罚。在主线里，你的选择会影响到后续的剧情分支，也会对结局产生影响。错误的选择会受到一定意义上的惩罚。）

关于游戏性上，其实对我个人来说这一作的战斗系统要比起源好一些。奥德赛的弹反难度要比起源更低，战斗流畅性也更好一些。战技更加丰富也更有选择的余地，在挖墓之前有限的技能点数也要让玩家选出最合理化的路线进行升级。游戏里一共有三个流派，其中猎人毋庸置疑最强，战士相对最弱。自从起源开始有了伤害数值的刺杀在这一作进一步被削弱，在多数情况下平级别甚至低级别的精英怪都需要用技能刺杀才能致命。经过我实地测试，有些敌人甚至在全套刺杀装备加上奥林帕斯矛的百分百增伤下也需要用技能才可以保证一招秒杀，在前中期基本上只能把小怪摸掉之后与精英怪进单挑。不过有意思的一个设计是，这一作的刺杀场景几本集中在要塞和堡垒之类有高台的地方，很多敌人都喜欢在悬崖前思考人生。这时你可以在他身后来一个斯巴达踢，他就会滚落悬崖摔得粉身碎骨。总体来说，这一作的战斗可圈可点，潜入差强人意，猎人天下无敌。

（装备系统的话，由于铭刻的存在，即便是拿到了几套史诗装也需要持续不断地肝才能弄到好的铭刻字条。而且猎人和刺客的套装都比较丑，战士的相对还好。如果不想肝又想要好看的，建议1500点数天马套装了解一下。）

剧情的话，为了不剧透，就不涉及具体的情节了。这一作剧情主要分三个方面，一个是神教，一个是家庭，一个是第一文明。其中神教结局和第一文明的神器结局都是固定的，家庭的结局存在选择上的分支。整体来说，这一作对系列近几代以来现代线的回收还算可以，古代部分只能说是中规中矩，还要看后续dlc的情况。这里不得不提一下这位从b社挖来的编剧。他的水平其实在主线里面体现不多，反而是在和苏格拉底有关的支线里表现得淋漓尽致。他很好地把控了脚本的内容和深度，既没有把玩家全部拖入到朴素哲学的大讨论，又让这位大名鼎鼎的古希腊哲人的每句话都充满深意。其实这就是在游戏脚本设计里的一些小细节；你不可能长篇累牍地去描述一个观点或者叙述一个枯燥的理论而让玩家觉得厌烦。恰到好处的小问题会引起玩家的思考，从而很大程度上的提升整个游戏叙事的深度。说到底，玩家是来玩游戏的，不是来上历史课和哲学课的。很多游戏不是干脆没有，就是过犹不及。

关于画面和游戏素质本身的话，嗯……画面本身还是可以的。可能比起源有点提升？区别不算是很大。细节阉割就很厉害了。火炬烧蜘蛛网的细节没了，走进草丛里用手拨草的细节没了，从水里爬上来的湿身效果没了，下小雨地面上还是干巴巴的……而且，几乎所有的凹凸面都是贴图。起源的山也是贴图山，但下面好歹做了不少多边形。这一作的山明显就是个大平面，还老是爬不上去卡在某些奇怪的地方。动作模组和人物模型和起源一模一样，但脸部模组太少了。记忆力稍好的人就能看出后面有好几个npc都和主人公的爹长得很像，极大地影响了剧情的代入感。

bug我拿出来单独说了。我运气比较好，没有患上癫痫的毛病。其他的小bug可太多了。带史诗的敌人刺杀之后不能确认击杀，需要手动补一箭才行。在洞口外面看到有箱子，进去发现没有，出来发现还在，重复几次之后才发现这个箱子早已经挖过了。山和房子都比较容易别腿卡住。臭名昭著的佐伊斯梅。（这个我还没遇到过。）最恶性的bug就是第二个档到雅典主线任务少接一个的毛病。我连开了四五次新档都是这个问题，严重打击游戏积极性。其他比如瞬间的贴图错误，传送到鸟瞰点天色会奇怪地发红等等，都是能自动恢复的事，就不多谈了。

总结的话，奥德赛以目前的状态，也就是bug没修复、dlc也还没发售的状态来评价的话，我觉得它依然是一款不比起源差的作品。育碧一直把这个系列定位为arpg，但直到这一作开始玩家才真正意义上可以去扮演这个角色，选择她/他对事物的态度，并因此改变主人公的遭遇和结局。核心的刺杀体验依然还在，上一作受到好评的战斗系统得到了很好的保留和提升。但是这一作里依然有着典型育碧式的缺点，比如刻意设计的跑路时间，仍是略有些重复的任务体验，强迫支线完成的经验壁垒，还有过于简单的boss战等等。我通关之后的感受，和我在一年前通关起源之后的感受差不多；这已经和最初的刺客信条完全不同了，却也无疑变成了整个系列里最好的游戏。

（最后发现自己忘记提战场了。战场也是这一作的新特色，但我并没觉得这个模式有多少新意。本质上来说战场和竞技场的区别其实并没多大。但是育碧把环境渲染的很好，战场上喊杀声四起尘土飞扬，还是很有那个意思的。如果终结动画做得更多一些，触发得更频繁一些的话，其实还是非常不错的设计。）

首先我没玩过起源，起源的满天黄沙有啥玩的，希腊才是风景圣地。一看背景我就决定这作买爆，这类游戏我觉得最适合拿来对比的就是巫师了，作为风景党，巫师3的血与酒风景是真的漂亮，而奥德赛丝毫不差，骑着马在比巫师更宽广的天地间驰骋别说多惬意了，骑马的感觉比巫师舒服，马能上坡的角度非常大，能去很多地方，还没有精力条。重新加入的海战也很有意思。这次加入对话选项也是很大的进步，动画演示真的大幅增加，动画党表示爽到。光景色我就能给它打9分，战斗的话比中土手感还是差些(毕竟中土手感强无敌)，跑步的时候主角姿势感觉很奇怪，读档黑屏过一次，自己选存档可以解决，闪退过一次，bug遇到过一次。

Dans la bonne continuité de AC Origin, une belle époque à visité, un système de choix agréable, une VF acceptable, un gameplay excellent et un grind qui est correct et les sidekick sont géniaux ! :D
Le système de culte et de mercenaire est grave cool, et les bataille navale sont de retour et on plus de punch. Le coté mystique est grave bien amené, maaaaiiis on parle pas assez des dieux a mon gout..

En revanche, à quoi sert le "Assassin creed" dans ce assassin creed odyssey, il est complétement absent au bataillon ce qui est un peu dommage au fond. 

Egalement une blinde de bug que ce soit visuel ou même simple bug de quête qui force a reload la game.
Aussi, une telle optimisation c'est du foutage de gueule, de même pour les graphisme c'est pas très beau hein les arbre et feuillage + texture rocher sont pas tip top... 

Hormis ca je passe un moment sympas, assassin creed revient au coté mystique mais a oublié les assassin en chemin et c'est dommage.

刺客信条系列的野心之作，绝对不是所谓的起源大型DLC，有很好的RPG体验。既然时间线上是比刺客组织诞生的起源早上四百多年的作品，我们的着眼点就不应该死抓着刺客不放，如果说刺客信条起源讲述的是刺客组织的诞生，那么刺客信条奥德赛传达的就是信条的萌芽。
“万事皆虚，诸行皆允，我们躬耕于黑暗，却侍奉光明。”
Very enjoyable and loving every minute of it so far, only small complaint from me is the player not getting a shield or choice to have one but hardly a big deal.
Forced level scaling is the single worst idea to hit this series.
没找到不好玩的理由，棒棒哒~~~~~~~我可以玩一年
I'm rarely impressed with Ubisoft but this game is truly a must have, very in depth game and amazing setting.

Pros:
+ เนื้อเรื่อง+คอนเทนเยอะมาก ตอน Origin รวม DLC ใช้เวลารวมๆ 100 ชั่วโมงในการเคลียร์เนื้อเรื่อง,เควสย่อย,สถานที่ แต่ของ Odyssey แค่ตัวเกมหลักอย่างเดียวแต่กว่าจะจบเนื้อเรื่อง+เคลียร์เควสย่อยกับสถานที่ทั้งหมด ก็รวม 100 ชั่วโมงกว่าๆแล้ว
+ เกมเพลย์ส่วนใหญ่ยกเครื่องมาจาก Origin แต่พัฒนาปรับปรุงให้ดีขึ้น ลื่นไหลมากขึ้น
+ ไม่มี พื้นที่โล่งสนิทแบบตอน Origin แล้ว พื้นที่บางส่วนใน Odyssey ถึงจะน้อยแต่ก็มีสถานที่ให้เคลียร์อยู่ (ต่างจาก Origin ส่วนที่เป็นทะเลทรายกับทะเลนี่คือโล่งไปเลย แถมไม่มีอะไรให้น่าค้นหาด้วย)
+ ตอนแรกเข้าใจว่ามีแค่ตัวเลือกที่มีผลกับเนื้อหา แต่วิธีการเล่นก็ดันมีผลกับเนื้อหาด้วย เช่นบางภารกิจที่ต้องลอบเข้าไปเอาของ NPC อาจจะขอไม่ให้เราฆ่าหรือทำร้ายทหารยาม ถ้าเราเลือกที่จะลอบเข้าไปเงียบๆ บทสนทนาจะแตกต่างจากลอบเข้าไปแล้วฆ่า

Cons:
- สารพัดบั๊ก ทั้งบั๊กจบมิชชั่นไม่ได้ถ้าไปเครียล์สถานที่ก่อน , Glith เป้าศัตรูในบางครั้ง

Mixs:
- ถึงจะบอกว่าเป็น RPG มีตัวเลือกตอบได้ แต่เอาจริงๆแล้วหลังจากเล่นจบก็รู้สึกว่า เกมมันยังมีแกนเนื้อเรื่องเป็นเส้นตรงอยู่ บางเควสเองตอบอะไรไปผลลัพท์มันก็เท่าเดิม ถ้าใครคาดหวังว่ามันจะเป็น RPG เต็มรูปแบบนี้อาจจะผิดหวังเล็กน้อย เพราะมันเหมือน AC ภาคเก่าๆ ที่มีองค์ประกอบ RPG เพิ่มเข้ามามากกว่า
- ถ้าเล่น Origin แล้วเบื่อป้อมช่วงพื้นที่เลเวลท้ายๆที่มีเยอะแยะ Odyssey นี่ป้อมมากกว่า Origin 3-4 เท่าได้ (แต่ก็เข้าใจว่าเป็นช่วงสงครามตามเนื้อเรื่อง)
- Cultists เป้าหมายที่ให้ฆ่าในภาคนี้มีให้ตามล่าเยอะสะใจ ถึง 40 กว่าคน แต่ก็ต้องแลกมากับ รายละเอียดแต่ละคนที่โดนลดทอนลง มีเด่นๆตามเนื้อเรื่องไม่กี่คน นอกนั้น เป็นตัวประกอบ

สรุป:
ถ้าชอบซี่รี่ย์ AC ไม่มีเหตุผลอะไรที่จะไม่เล่นภาคนี้ นี่คือ AC ที่พัฒนาขึ้น เล่นสนุกขึ่น ลื่นไหลขึ้นกว่าภาคเดิมมากๆ ถ้าชอบเกมมีคอนเทนเยอะๆภาคนี้ตอบโจทย์ได้แน่นอน

ป.ล - Review หลายๆคนมีบอกเรื่อง Gilding หนัก เอาจริงๆไม่จริงครับ คือต้องเข้าใจว่าเกมมันใส่ความ RPG ลงไป ค่าสเตตัสการเลเวลอัพมีผล ทำให้ไปสู้กับศัตรูที่เลเวลเยอะกว่าจะลำบาก แต่การเลเวลอัพเกมนี้หลักๆมาจากทำเควสต่างๆ+เคลียร์สถานที่ คือถ้านั่งเล่นไล่เคลียร์สถานที่ตามเขตที่เราเลเวลพอสู้ได้ไปเรื่อยๆช่วงต้นๆ เชื่อเถอะ สักพักก็เลเวลเกินเขตส่วนใหญ่แล้ว ถึงตอนนั้นจะเล่นสบายขึ้นโขเลย + ซี่รี่ย์ AC นี่เน้นการเคลียร์สถานที่มาหลายภาคแล้ว แทบจะเป็นคอร์เกมเลย ถ้าไม่อยากทำไม่ควรแตะเกมนี้เด่นขาด เพราะภาคนี่ไม่ใช่ภาคแบบจะวิ่งเล่นเฉพาะเควสเนื้อเรื่องอย่างเดียวได้

I played this game for about an hour and I had to refund it. However, I think you should buy it. Heres why:
1. Everytime you change any of the video settings, you need to restart the game. Even window to fullscreen. So I spent 20+ minutes trying to find the best settings for my computer. So by the time I started playing I was already pretty frustrated.
2. I love to play shadow of mordor, and shadow of war. So when I played this game I couldn't help but feel like it was the same similar process. Everything this game did, shadow of mordor/war did better and I felt like I wasted my money. 
3. It really didnt feel like an assasins creed game. I played Brotherhood to black flag and I loved the whole feel of having a hood and being a true assassin. Playing a greek demigod person does not feel like an assassin at all for me. This is similar to reason number 2 in that if I wanted to play a game where I am a super powerful god-like character, I would play shadow of mordor. Obvously the mechanics are the same with the parkour and assassinations, but i feel more like a warrior. 

I feel like everyone thinks this game is good because they probably never played a game like shadow of mordor, but since I have its really hard for me to like this game. WIth that personal flaw out of the way, I think this game is very good and is worth the purchase. Just don't go in thinking you are going to be an assasin. 

Also if theres any gramatical errors in this or spelling im sorry i rushed through this.

It's a good game if in your universe you like dishing out a lot of money. Some people have that much money.  It's a bad game overall because the game is designed around you getting money or resources until you puke (they sell "anti-puke medicine" in the form of resources, gold and gear in the cash-shop).

Ruined by greed.

https://www.pcgamer.com/assassins-creed-odyssey-orichalcum/?ns_campaign=article-feed&ns_mchannel=ref&ns_source=steam&ns_linkname=0&ns_fee=0

If you want to punish such dastardly behaviour don't buy the game. If you don't care, buy the game but you'll have to know in what sequence you have to do stuff and you WILL be paying hundreds of extra dollars unless you comb every square inch of the game world. If you like combing every square inch of what is the game world once you see it then you have "issues".

Is it fun? Yes
Is it worth $60? Yes, there is a pretty massive amount of content present in the game at launch.
8/10

The main issue with this game is progression. This game wants players to do the side content it offers, and the side content that is in the game is worth doing. There is only one problem though, I don't want to be forced to do side content everytime I complete a story mission. The game almost forces it's side content on you, a good example of this is when you need to retrieve an artifact from the Labyrinth so you can seal away a first civ temple. The game makes you help some people out around Crete and all of the "support missions" in this sequence are meant for level 30ish characters. The actual fight with the Minotaur is a level 40 Mission. So you did a whole bunch of work for more or less nothing because you have to grind out quests on the other side of the map, it butchers the narrative progression of the minotaur story arc for no other reason then "muh side content". Either lock the first civ arc off until the late/end game or lower the levels of the beast fights.

Other then the progression issues this game is really good.

It's hard to make everyone happy. We complain when a game is too short or limited. We complain when it's a grind. We complain if it's too easy or too hard. We complain over micro tranactions we don't have to participate in. And we complain just because we can and like to. You get my drift.
This is an Assassin's Creed game. There is some grinding to be done here. If you don't like the series I suggest you don't buy it. If you like the series I doubt you will be disatisfied. Is it too big as some suggest. Aboslutely not. I like open world games with plenty to do. And if you do to, you will like this. It's similar to Origin's with some improvements. The graghics are stellar. The story line is good. The mechanics are good (could use minor improvemets, but still pretty good). 
My only complaint would be my build is starting to show its age a bit.
intel i7 6900k @ 4.1 ghz
2x Gtx 1080s in sli
32gb ddr4 @ 2667mhz
This was never the perfect gaming build and was never intended to be. But since this game has no sli profile I can't keep a steady 60 fps with everything maxed out at 1440p. But with a little tweaking I can hit 60 to 80 fps which is good enough and very playable. I've run into this in a few of the latest AAA games. It's just the way it is. I'd like an sli profile, but I can live without it. Odessey certainly dosen't have some of the performance issues Origins started with and were fixed along the way.
So my opinion is this: if you like the Assassin's Creed franchise, I doubt you will be unhappy with this. Certainly if you like Origins. And I like both. Don't participate in micro-transactions if you don't want too, I don't. Is it a perfect experience? No. I can only think of a very few games that are. But it's good and in my book worth the cash for the entertainment. I think Ubisoft did a fine job here. Ah, except they need to dump the anti pirate software, they don't need it.

lit

I love this game, took me a bit to get used to the new combat system since I haven't really played AC since AC 3 and a bit of black flag. There is a ton to do and explore but TO ME at least it doesn't seem tedious and useless. Your choices in situations DO have effects on the game (no spoilers but I found out a negative effect the hard way), but it makes you feel more involved and immersed in the world. Always fun finding new gear.  The game looks beautiful but it will stress your pc to the max (I'm guessing more due to poor optimization/drivers). I'm running it on 1080p 60hz refresh rate monitor, maximum settings for everything, not using supersampling though. 115% (i think thats the max) field of view. I have adaptive v sync to help with tearing and I haven't dropped below 52fps I think was the lowest I saw.  My hardware: i7 8700k @ 4.7ghz on all cores, 16gb 2400mhz ddr4 RAM, MSI Duke Gtx 1080ti, samsung 970 evo 500gb nvme ssd.  

A personal dislike though not major is that I don't truly feel like im playing an actual assassin anymore so much as just a warrior; though the stealth is satisfying and I do like that you cant just instant assassinate everyone, you actually need to be strong enough to do it.  

My biggest complaint is the microtransactions, THEY REALLYYYYYYY want you to buy them, and most of the stuff is on the pricey side.  There is a permanent account boost for +50% exp and gold in game, which you don't NEED but it does help level up a bit faster. I personally think they need to patch an increase in to aquiring gold because its a pain to build up unless you sell blue and higher tier gear BUT that takes away from getting the crafting materials you need a TON of, especially for your ship.  I don't mind having sections of the map tiered off based on your level, since I'm an MMO player and i think it helps you build more of a sense of gaining stregth and skill as you progress and not just mopping the floor with every enemy you encounter like you could in older AC games.

I haven't found the game to be really glitchy or anything, only crashed on me once but thankfully my save file was ok and I didn't really lose any progress. 

overall I'd recommend buying it. 
definitely seems like there will be some replayability with the choices you can make and the outcomes.

Totally bored of the franchise but this game is epic and everything you wished for an Assassin Creed game. It takes all the good stuff from previous titles and adds some more cool mechanics too. Let me start by saying that just like you, I used to hate unacceptable implementations in games such as Denuvo, microtransactions and whatnot, but [b]this[/b]...[b]THIS[/b] game has made me forget and forgive.
[i](TL;DR at the bottom)[/i]

You know why? Well, simply because, among many other things that I won't mention and let you discover for yourselves, the game has:

- awesome mechanics
- fascinating characters
- astonishing graphics
- breathtaking landscapes
- an intriguing story
- an unbelievably big map to explore
- epic battles on both land and sea
- [b]A LOT[/b] of interesting new features
- good optimization from "Day 1" [i](a very big pro in my book)[/i]
- an impressive soundtrack

[b]AND THEN SOME![/b] 20 hours in, and I almost lost touch with reality, so the above list can and should go on, but this review is already getting too big.

Oh, and to all of you saying "This is blasphemy...this is MADNESS!", my reply to you is not "THIS IS SPARTA!", but [b]"THIS - IS - A - MASTERPIECE!"[/b]

Honestly, this is the ultimate "Creed" compilation with everything we've ever wanted from the series, and more! At this point, I could care less about Altaïr, Ezio, Connor, Aveline, Kenway, Shay, Arno, the Frye twins, Bayek and the three characters from "Chronicles", and I've been a huge fan of them all since the original launch in 2007, but not anymore.
[b]Now there is only Alexios in "Assassin's Creed: Odyssey"![/b]

[b]100/10[/b] - Also, it's a big plus for me considering that I've been a big fan and admirer of anything Spartan/Ancient Greece related for quite some time now. So yeah, being able to perform the legendary "Spartan Kick" while exploring Ancient Greece in all its glory and splendor? [b]SIGN ME UP![/b]

[h1][b]TL;DR?[/b][/h1]

[b]STOP reading reviews![/b] Just buy it already and thank me later! Also quit your job/school/whatever. You'll need time...[b]A LOT[/b] of time. I'm not kidding. Check my review in a few weeks for "hours played" and you'll understand.

Scéptique en l'ayant vu à l'E3 en pensant que ça allait être une copie pur d'AC Origins, alors que pas vraiment, le système de combat a été revu, qui est du coup plus complet et complexe, les ennemis sont encore plus redoutables. La grande avancée est bien sûr le côté RPG qui est beaucoup plus poussé que dans le précédent opus, les choix que nous faisons auront réellement un impact sur les interractions avec les autres personnages. L'histoire ça reste de l'Assassin's Creed, on a l'habitude des phases d'actions qui se présente et les moments d'infiltration qui sont ressemblants à Origins.

原以为奥德赛只是个起源的小老弟，现在看来起源是奥德赛的垫脚石。
刺客信条RPG化的道路不会停止，因为所谓“纯粹刺客”的敌人不是RPG，是单一的游戏要素，是充斥着重复收集的阿育式开放世界。而奥德赛突破了这一桎梏，完善了承接自起源的战斗要素，用镜头特写代替简单的对白来填充支线任务，用开放的剧情流程代替“完美同步”，色香味俱全。

While i can agree it can becomes a grind if you go story mission to story mission. where you need to do a bunch of side missions or mercenary work to get to the level that u need to progress. That only happens if you dont explore. i have not felt the grind once because i play on the exploration mode where i need to explore to find quests and other things. And because of this and i like to 100% the location im in till i leave im actually ahead in the levels so ill never need to wait to do the main story. And the game scales with you so even if you were going to a place that ur supposed to be level 16 in but im 24 so all the enemies are anywhere from level 22 to 25. Otherwise i love where AC is headed for and man is the world beautiful. The only thing i ask is to flush out the stealth mechanics more and create a better stealth game.

很多人说是起源换皮，但是实际上：

1.刺杀变得更加合理，强壮、精英、重盔甲士兵很难秒杀了，但是又加入了双倍刺杀伤害技能来平衡。这样配合一对多时极高的战斗难度，事实上是鼓励玩家刺杀的。

2.加入了美洲三部曲的海战系统，爱琴海很漂亮

3.起源的rpg养成系统，又加入了对话&人物关系系统（可以恋爱，哈哈哈）。同时出现了多结局。支线做的也比起源出色，主要得益于对话系统的改进，让玩家至少能明明白白自己为什么要去做任务，起源那样子实在是太平淡了

不足：

1. 战役时己方小兵会莫名其妙走开留下玩家局部一打二，而且你只要攻击了一个小兵另一个就会靠上来，永远一打二。这样又陷入黑魂一样的闪弹砍三部曲。说实在的战场做的很无聊。

2.一般而言，如果一个地区为某势力占领，你不断削弱当地其势力后，最后发动征服战役居然还可以帮助那个势力。既然一般NPC都加入关系系统了，为啥国家势力就不能接入呢？

3.太肝了……
So much to do, Origins was great and all, but this.. This is even greater. Story and combat is enjoyable. Highly recommend this game.

my favourite AC so far, Origins being number 2. Granted the genre has shifted into something different with the release of the last 2 titles so the original/die hard AC fans might not like the new direction but as an RPG junkie I really enjoy Odyssey and the sense of true open world, freedom it provides. I preferred the talent tree of Origins and I don't like the Mercenary tree where they keep resetting, I would have preferred a more logical design approach to that but overall very pleased with the experience so far!
