ok boys n girls.. time for a chat!   THIS GAME may very easily become the best game of all time, for several reasons. In one single punch, assassin's creed odissey has given us so much content and creativity, that it competes not with one game, but at least four at the very same time: number one, FOR HONOR, yes what this other game has not been able to give us in terms of freedom of movement exploration etc., odissey brings us with ease, two, TOMB RAIDER, not all life is made of tomb raiding as such is the case with that game, but odissey has given us this peculiar mini series of tomb explorations that is just ADDICTIVE!, number three: SKULL AND BONES, i think this upcoming game developers may be SUPER AFRAID of releasing it because the open seas gameplay of odissey is simply beyond EPIC, i have not seen yet any other game with such magnicficent ocean simulation, the beauty of the vessels, the way they handle like in real life wooden boats (the physics engine involved.) Beware if you start to hit n ram on enemy ships because poseidons rage will rain upon you and the ocean will become a tormentous ordeal along with the fights, and to keep your adrenaline levels way up the scales, the superb background music will be right there backing it all up.

Number four: ASSASINS CREED itself! yes, if you are the kind of player that was in awe of a.c. up until the xbox 360 assassins creed 2, but never quite liked it afterwards, not even origins, then fear not cause this is a fresh start, a path that I URGE UBISOFT to reamin on and EXPAND UPON four times it sheer size over! you will have exploration for free, you will have tomb raiding and legendary equipment exploiting let alone solving the tomb puzzles, you will have endless epic ocean pirating, you will be granted the chance to deviate from being a boring assasing and face the enemhy head on, become a warrior or a devastating hunter, you will have a ton of mini quests that make you feel that you are really helping dudes around, you will take your NIKKON camera around and take those wonderful sunrises all over the place, hell yeah. you will hunt down legendary beasts in awesome settings, heck you dont wanna do nothing? this is the game for you! fly the got dam eagle at will! you will seek forgotten places that the BLIND KING will request upon you, or you will solve ancient language meanings as a totally separate taskt from it all. need I go on?

IN FIVE HOURS you will become a master of arms, i recomend large axe and bow all over, with little extra real money you will get a jumpstart into motion that is zero expense compared to games of the likes of GUILD WARS 2, my personal favourite as well. my level scaling has been efficient and balanced, im just as strong as my enemy perhaps a bit more in case i am outnumbered, a good challenge in normal mode. I am at level 36 now, but guess what? i dont want to go up fast yet, cause it is so fun to face those higher leveled enemies for one. makes you feel like you are fighting against some epic hercules or something, I have found the ocean sailing inmensely fun, it grabs you so deep into pirating ships that you can spend hours just there! oh, the grand ARENA, here comes UFC!!!!! 

bugs: yes some, some orichalcum ore areas dont work on a small island the ore is just floating in air, i cannot take it, took photo of it. on another area it is below a wooden bridge, cannot obtain it either. i had this odd experience that my health remained locked at 1/4th or my total for some reason, after several reload tries that did not work, my solution was to remove all my equipment and install it back again on my toon! so beware ok if that happens.

UBISOFT, when i say stay the course here i mean BRING ME A LARGE PERSIAN INVASION in the future, A TURK invasion, or viceversa, take us further yet to explore and conquer, expand and open these maps, keep on bringing those quests. go deep into the stories that were never told, whatever pleases your imagination will do so long as it is set up in this kind of platform. For me to review a game is like a no go! So when I review one, it is only because i have been deeply impacted by it, ASSASSINs CREED ODISSEY is an admirable piece or art and work, worth receiving the highest of ranks! If I ever consider making a new city or town, I better hire these guys from UBISOFT to do the planing and design for me!!! xD

Геймплей мегазалипательный! Одна из тех игр, от которых получаешь наибольший кайф при игре на максимальном уровне сложности. Интересно изучать мир, интересно сражаться с врагами, сюжет пока тоже интересный (за 30 часов я не очень далеко прошел, хочется полазить по миру, прокачать абилки, найти шмотки поприкольнее и тд). 

Игра вознаграждает за исследование мира. Ты не просто убираешь значки с карты как в старых частях серии, ты постоянно что-то находишь, что-то улучшаешь, осваиваешь новые приемы, улучшаешь старые. Карта очень разнообразная, глазам не дает заскучать. Можно сколько угодно придираться к разным деталям игры, но главным остается тот факт, что играть в Odyssey очень увлекательно. Odyssey понравилась гораздо больше чем Origins (при том что Origins мне тоже очень понравилась, неожиданно для меня самого). 

Играть советую на высоких уровнях сложности, лучше всего на Кошмаре. Игра дает массу возможностей для развития, всегда можо собрать билд и найти тактику, которая позволит вам справиться со сложными врагами. Это и интересно, и приятно, когда находишь способ победить (и в большинстве случаев не так уж и сложно).

Assassin's Creed Odyssey is a weird one... On one side i enjoy the game's story, characters, combat, music but on the other i can't deal with the absurd grind this game has. As a college student i don't really have time to put in hundreads of hours toward games anymore and when the game become absolutely grindy (around level 16) that is simply a deal breaker for me. The fact that Ubisoft made this game a GRIND TO LEVEL UP to sell additional MICROTRANSACTIONS is also absurd! I already bought the game for $60 and don't want to spend additional money to be able to complete the game without spending countless amount of hours on grinding side quest and killing things for experience.. Also!! Side quests are generic at best.. Go to Point A, Kill B return to C to get a slap on the bum and XP, they also don't provide you with good enough rewards! It pains me to say it but i won't recommend the game to anyone, if the developer and publisher put this big of an emphasis on "You either grind or pay us more" Witcher 3 Wild Hunt made leveling, questing fun and enjoyable while Assassin's Greed: Odyssey of Microtransactions makes it generic, grindy and boring.

This is definetly the best AC game I have played. I love playing this game because of all of the scenery and whatnot. I only have one problem with this game. Once you hit level 14-15 it gets very hard. It gets very hard to continue the main story of the game because the reccomended levels become 4-5 times higher than what you are. Because of this, you have to complete many side missions to gain xp and it takes a lot of hours. But other than this I DEFINETLY recommend this game to anyone.

Чтобы не рассусоливать, сразу о плюсах и минусах: 
+
Красивая игра
Большая карта, при этом не пустая, лучше, чем в истоках по крайней мере
Боевая система более отзывчивая, чем в истоках, это радует
Юмор в кат сценах. 
Неплохая оптимизация вроде бы
Возможность управлять кораблем
Более менее какие-то элементы рпг
Наемики, ну что то вроде побочного квеста на всю игру
Вроде бы даже неплохой сюжет, по крайней мере завязка точно интригует
-
Мне всегда не нравилось то, что в игре нет нормальных торговцев, чтобы как в других рпг, можно было позависать, посмотреть что купить, посмотреть, что продать. Оно и понятно, ведь Юбисофт алчные негодяи, они ведь продают шмот за деньги. 
Гринд. Ресурсы в игре нужны для корабля, а нормально и достаточно быстро насобирать его невозможно. Покупай, или страдай. 
Экономия времени. Юбисофт вообще потеряли совесть - в одиночной игре за фул прайс предлагать кпить буст. Причем, судя по отзывам, в середине игры будет большой провал по уровню сюжетных квестов. Это стремно.
В игре нет каких-то мини игр, типа гвинта, костей, или чего-то такого. А было бы неплохо ведь, если в такую большую игру интегрировали например карты. 

Я не играл в ассасинов до Истоков, поэтому мне абсолютно параллельно, что многие жалуются, что данная игра еще дальше отошла от канонов серии. Но в принципе, понимаю людей, для кого ассасины - это что-то отдельное, не подлежащее таким изменениям. Это как Хитмана сделать Томом Клейнси например. 

И не нужно сравнивать Одиссею с Ведьмаком. Юбисофт конечно пытается скопировать многое, но если у вас кривые руки и алчность, ничего не выйдет. 

Моя оценка 6,5 из 10. Играть можно, но если есть время и силы на гринд.

看到那些自己配置垃圾就骂优化差的，我真是前列腺液都笑出来了。
毕竟自己带不动=优化差，只能说根本不懂优化到底是什么。
-------------------------------------------
千言万语汇成两个字：真香！
个人评分9/10
-------------------------------------------
游戏时建议打开探索模式增加代入感。
-------------------------------------------
战斗方面：战斗系统和起源比也得到了极大的加强，由于多了主动技能得设定（猎人技能，战士技能，刺客技能），老阴逼狙击流可以打得很猥琐（顺便猎人就是真爸爸！），正面肛可以打的很帅，刺杀也可以杀的很帅。不过无双？对不起，在下做不到（除非你等级压制对面两级），不信的可以弄个三星通缉（都不用五星）然后站街上等赏金猎人来爽爽。
-------------------------------------------
装备系统方面：前期很缺素材升级，建议有啥穿啥，后期洗词条很重要。，实在打不过就走猎人流，秒天秒地。
-------------------------------------------
任务系统：支线系统比前作进步很多，看得出有学巫师3的意思，主线套支线，支线辅助主线。支线任务的剧情和演出的乐趣性也进步了不少。
一个主线的辅助支线也并不需要全都做完，但是一个任务做不做，怎么做，可能会影响后续的任务和NPC对你的态度。
eg。任务完成方式对后续任务的影响：
[spoiler]  俩舰队开战，你这边的说我们的舰队指挥官去和谈被埋伏啦，人没了，没法打啊（丢人，你们投降算了）。主角说那行，我帮你调查调查。摸到对面，发现被关在地方军营里。理论上这就是救人回去的设定了。
但是这里我操作失误（太浪，没清完所有敌军），那指挥官刚从牢里出来就嗝屁了。只能一个人回去，跟他说很遗憾，你们指挥官没能挺过来。对面说啊那咋整啊，舰队没得指望了，只能你上了。
然后我就一条船（还TM是我自己的船）出发把对面舰队灭了（估计救出指挥官能打得轻松点）。[/spoiler]
eg.2 任务探索：
[spoiler]  某个任务里给任务的老头要主角找四件神器，然后告诉主角分别在XXXX等四座岛上，再多的线索他也不知道。

不过呢，他有个助手也在帮他找，应该快找到其中一个了，让你先去问问他的助手。助手大致在什么方位的某个遗迹里做研究（没具体告诉位置）。到了那个地区，用鹰看一圈，找到看起来像遗迹的废墟过去，果然人在那。
找到助手，成功找到神器的位置，不过发现神器被一个希腊神话的神兽守着，一番折腾之后拿到神器。（这一部分其实算给玩家的思路引导）

拿着神器回去找老头，老头说哦你干得漂亮，但是还有三个，接着找去吧。
接下来的三个一点线索没有，怎么找呢，这时候就得靠前面的思路引导了，既然第一个神器被神兽守着，那剩下的是不是也一样呢，先出发去其中一个岛，开船快到岛上的时候领航员果然开始跟你吹逼这个岛上有关神兽的传言，那没跑了，肯定是它了。
到了岛上打开地图一看，其中一个小区域叫：XXXX（神兽名字）遗迹，肯定就在这里了。
走到那，在找到遗迹，果然在旁边找到了任务触发的NPC，于是这个神兽相关的任务就开始了，接着往下做就好了。  [/spoiler]
eg。3 你的选择对NPC的影响：
[spoiler]  1，如果前期某任务选择了公开羞辱的处死一个敌人，后面有一个可以嘴炮招降的NPC就变得必须杀了。
2，你选择比较作的话可以玩死主角全家。  [/spoiler]
----------------------------------------------------------------
你问我好玩不好玩？我当然说好玩啊，甚至可以说是最好玩的一部刺客信条。
위쳐3 이후 다른 rpg게임에 손대지 못했었는데 위쳐3의 장점을 가져와서 그런지 별 부담없이 즐길 수 있음

칙칙한 사막에 모래폭풍불던 오리진에 비해 공기도 좋고 물도 좋고 건물 색감까지 이뻐진 이번 오디세이.

맵뚫고 부가미션깨는데 4~50시간, 메인이랑 서브퀘 깨는데 5~60시간정도걸리며
다해서 진행도 100%, 도전과제 전부 클리어하는데 총 120시간걸림.

스토리는 몰입되게 잘 만들었고 서브퀘도 단순 반복퀘였던 전작들과는 다르게
하나하나 간단하고 재미있는 이야기들로 구성되어있어 지루하지않게 플레이할수있음

그리고 플레이어의 선택과 행동이 게임에 영향을 주며
엔딩은 물론이고 자잘자잘하게 NPC의 대사나 주변 환경이 변하기때문에 선택지를 고르는데있어서 신중해짐
어떠한 서브퀘를 먼저 클리어할시 다른 서브퀘에 추가 대사가 생기기도함

개인적으로 스킬은 사냥꾼>암살>전사 순으로 좋으며 활이 압도적으로 쎔.
전설 동물들이나 신화몹잡을땐 활쏴서 잡는게 정신 건강에 이로움.

이번작에서 단점이라고 생각되는 부분은 쓸데없이 장비 소지 개수에 제한을 걸어놨다는거.
그리고 멧돼지가 혼자서 너무 사기적인 패턴을 가지고있음.

플레이하면서 겪은 버그는 두가지였는데 하나는 조이스메가 땅속깊이 박혀 죽일수없었지만 오늘 패치로 수정됨
다른 하나는 오리칼륨이 제 위치에 존재하지않거나 있지만 먹을수없게되있음
참고로 예판특전 눈먼왕 보상은 퀘스트 클리어전 보상이 들어있는 보물상자를 미리먹게되면 보상이 인벤에 들어가기때문에
클리어후 또 먹을수없음

소소한 단점 몇개 제외하면 게임은 진짜 취향에 맞게 완벽하게 만들었음.

奥德赛！这一款是我继黑旗之后印象最深刻也是最好玩的一部！这一款刺客信条在发售之前我基本是不关注的，毕竟他们家的开放世界都是一个味道（无数的重复支线）所以基本没什么购买的欲望，但是它才发售短短几天的时间，我已经被人推了太多次了，当时的想法就是刺客信条有什么好吹的不都是差不多无聊的开放世界吗？然后忍不住我的好奇心入了这一款刺客信条，刚启动游戏毕竟有我大厂特色嘛，无限崩溃闪退，玩没几分钟就崩溃后来花了我10多分钟（差点想退款）找到解决方法，更新到最新的显卡驱动解决了这个问题，然后终于开始了我的奥德赛之旅，一开始进去第一感觉是风景还是一样漂亮，还多了个选项的功能让支线变的不那么无聊又多了一点代入感，你可以选择救人一命，也可以默默旁观，而且后面也会有一些意料之外的结果，在加上黑旗的海战系统，简直爽爆！

还没通关但是想谈一点看法。
这一作的内容之丰富，剧情之精彩，是此前几部作品无法媲美的。这个开放世界我个人感觉比起源做的好，并不是单纯的刷刷刷，总有惊喜在前方等着。噩梦难度比起源更加恶心，但在数值碾压之余我看到敌人的ai也有了长足的进步，懂得远近战配合，懂得利用倒地没有无敌帧的机制伺机围攻，都体现了土豆的不断革新和进步。
但是问题仍然存在，首先刺客信条整个系列都存在谜一样的攀爬点判定问题，经常面前有个脚腕高的台阶还得按一下shift，高度在腹部的坎因为做出攀爬动作高度不够，经常会卡一下然后掉回去或者双手扶一下墙不动。屁股后面俩队长三个弓箭手追着我却被一个砖头绊倒了，这一点都不刺客。其次掩体刺杀的判定好像出现了问题，我在掩体里提示进入刺杀距离（应该是极限距离），刺杀后整个人从掩体一跃而出，而不是把人拖拽到掩体后，不知道这是故意设计的还是判定问题。最后这一代的跑动无比蛋疼，进入城镇范围减速，进入山洞减速，这么大一地图传送点还那么少，还减速？……你给个加速键也行啊。
总之这一作均分8分很中肯，IGN绝壁是故意给9.2装逼的。

This is a review in progress, currently I'm level 25 and feel that I'm close to the half way point in the story, but on the map I'm not even close to that.
This game is  awesome, it packs in so many activities that it can almost feel overwhelming on what to do next, but in a good way. I loved Origins, but this make origins look like an unfinished beta, it improves on every aspect. This is now a full RPG, unlike older AC titles, if open world questing and exploring are not your thing then dont play this. Tired of seeing all the reviews complaining about questing and grinding, if that's not your thing then move on and let the rest of enjoy this beautiful well done game. There is no "grindwall" Ive seen so many negative comments about being forced into MTs to buy a XP boost, that is not the case. Do not be fooled by these reviews or comments, if you play the whole game and quest and explore you will level up just fine. In fact I'm the opposite, I love to explore everything and do everything (see my Witcher 3 hours) and in doing so I have over leveled most of the areas before I could even get to them. Bottom line I am loving the game and have not bought any MTs as I have no reason to. The only reason i could see buying an XP boost is if you dont want to explore the game and only want the main story, if that's the case then why did you even buy this? Go play a telltale game if that's all you want. Now, on to the pros and cons that I have experienced so far:

Pros:
1. World
Beautiful open world with tons of activities to keep you busy, and the wold actually has different feels in different areas. origins was just hot sand everywhere and that got a bit boring near the end. This game has many different seasonal looks as you go through it which I love, and of course it has a great photo mode for taking pics.
2. Gear overhaul is awesome! 
I love exploring for loot and customizing my look and this game has tons of that, unlike origins that had you just picking cosmetic outfits and the only loot was weapons, Ody opens it all up. You can now loot all of your armor and upgrade it as you go. They removed the need for all the bows and instead put that effort into head, chest, arms, waist, and leg slots that totally change your look with each new piece. The detail on all the armor is top notch, I am continually amazed how great all the armor looks and all the attention to little details. Huge huge improvement over Origins. 
3. Side activities 
ACOd packs in the side content to keep you busy with other things so you can take a break from the main story any time to engage in them. You now have a mercenary side quest to move up the ranks of your fellow mercenaries, and the detail put into this is awesome, all of the mercenaries have strengths and weaknesses and full backstories that you can read before you engage them. You can hunt them down on your own or wait for them to come to you if you have a wanted level (similar to the GTA star system) You now have full control of a naval ship and upgrading its look, armor, weapons and crew. Ship battles are a little simpler than Black Flag, but are a ton of fun nonetheless. While your out taking down targets on land you can now analyze them and see if they are high level and would be an asset to your crew. Once recruited they will be on your ship and look the same as when you got them, they also help you fight in your ship battles. I was expecting them as Lieutenants on your ship to be an invisible entity that just contribute to your stats, but no they are very detailed in that they have names and unique looks that add to the prestige of your crew and you will spend a lot of time fighting along side them. 
There is also a full cult you get to track down with clues you find in the world to uncover their identities so you can find them and take them out, as you do they provide resources to upgrade your spear giving you many different benefits as you do. I wont go into too much detail on this as it can be spoilers for the story, but another well done system and side activity that I have been enjoying a lot.
3. Skills
I love the new skill overhaul and now it feel more like you actually get to play "builds" rather than just unlocking everything eventually. There are many ways to customize how you like to play with the skill builds and your gear. Love sneaking around and doing 1 shot assassinations? Then work on the assassin tree and build your gear toward assassin damage. At the beginning I couldn't one shot people, but now with a few re-specs I have no problem at all. Again this is an RPG, so you wont have all the best ability when you first start, you have to earn it as you go. This game has a great feel of progression and doesn't feel grindy at all. I'm always doing something fun when i'm getting my levels. Also if you choose wrong you can re-spec at anytime in the menu for a small fee.

Will update more later as I go

Cons:
1. Alexios animation and voice acting are not very good. Cassandra seems to have the better voice actor. Sometimes the animations dont match the actions or voice, but nothing game breaking.
2. Too much money and resources to upgrade your legendary items to a current level, the money is fine, but why would I give up 400 wood to upgrade a spear. You need those resources for your ship, I wish they would lower down the mat requirements for these. Again its not a game breaker as you do get a steady stream of new items, but it would be nice to upgrade them more without so much of a penalty.
3. needs more fast travel points. I love exploring but there are times I like to jump to an area and work on things and they only let you travel to sync points now and not all the cities like in Origins, I hope they change this eventually. In the end you will just be doing more walking and horse riding for now, but it forces me to collect my ship mats more often so its not all a bad thing. 
4. Bulletin board quests are a joke, some of them you will literally just hand someone some money for XP and to finish the quests. Ive seen fetch quests more interesting than this. However they are not required to advance, and the main quests and regular side quests make up for it. I just get these quest in case I happen to be near it. If so ill do it, otherwise I dont go out of my way.

Summary
I will update more as I go through the game....
Don't be fooled by troll reviews talking about grind walls and mandatory MT purchases, its all complete crap and lies. If you're into big open world RPGs like Witcher 3 then this is your jam, get it. If you just want to do a main story only and dont like depth in a game that makes you think and manage resources then this probably isn't for you, just move along.

游戏时长46小时，出了一个主线任务丢失的bug，说一下解决办法

背景：20多级时，雅典会瘟疫，之后逃离雅典去找母亲，沙滩战役后，任务《叙旧》无法完成——母亲不跟随角色移动，之后再次载入后主线任务丢失。
我当时没有在意，因为这个游戏可以探索的东西太多了，而且刺杀+猎人+噩梦难度+精英手柄，战斗的快感实在太强烈了，我就没有管它，继续玩了4天来到36级，突然发现不对，没有这个任务了。
然后巧了，奥德赛更新了1.3G，叙旧任务又有了，但是依旧无法完成，之后我折腾一小时碰巧给解决了。

-------解决办法-------
首先，手动存档(非快速存档)，并重启游戏
然后试一下最近几个存档，要有叙旧这个任务，还没丢失，然后再试一下看她跟不跟你走。


如果不跟你走，在有任务的情况下，选择手动存储(不要快速存档)。这一份存档（叫A）之后会再进来。
之后再次重启游戏。


菜单选择加载，拉到最下面，会有一个章节末尾的存档，加载进去，应该是雅典进入瘟疫那一段，之后你速通以下剧情，就又可以来到母亲这里，进入沙滩战之前把赏金付掉，迅速解决沙滩战斗。战斗不要打到母亲。建议选择刺杀。
之后触发剧情，母亲应该跟你走了，叙旧任务完成，点一下手动保存(存档B)。


之后加载之前存的那份存档A，再次试着完成任务。

如果依然无法完成，建议以存档B继续后续游玩。

-------------------

一个好玩的游戏，就是会让人包容她种种Bug，继续赞叹这真是好游戏。


-----


小Tips：近战技能是可以安装8个的，我直到35级才知道。

真香

Si por algo destaca este juego y el resto de la saga assassins creed es por la ambientación, es lo mejor que tiene. El hecho de descubrir nuevas localizaciones e ir explorando por las distintas regiones te da la sensación de estar en la antigua grecia. El juego es hermoso visualmente, asi que si tienes un pc que lo pueda correr en ultra lo vas a gozar.

La historia comienza fuerte, de hecho, te engancha. Sin embargo, el hecho de que tengas que estar continuamente haciendo misiones secundarias repetitivas hasta mas no poder, para llegar al nivel que te exige la siguiente misión principal, te saca totalmente del juego. 
Esto molesta, y mucho, por que parece que Ubisoft quiere que te gastes dinero real en la tienda ingame en comprar objetos que te ayuden a progresar para que no tengas que jugar al juego que acabas de comprar por 60€. Es incomprensible.

El sistema de combate, aun siendo parecido a origins, me parece simple. Pero simple en el buen sentido, apretando 2 botones puedes ejecutar a un malo de forma muy espectacular.

Lo peor del juego es sin duda el sistema de sigilo y la inteligencia artificial. Realmente se dan situaciones muy absurdas y esa barra de "detección" cuando un soldado te ve es horrible y parece que se haya estandarizado en todos los juegos de ubisoft.

En resumen, es mas de origins solo que en otra época pero añadiendo barcos y peleas navales.
Si te gustó origins y black flag e ir con tu barquito descubriendo nuevas regiones sin duda este te va a gustar.

Is it perfect? Hell no, its a damn Ubisoft game so of course its going to have huge glaring issues and obnoxious microtransations... 

But Is it a good game? Is it fun? 
Well, I think if youve never really enjoyed AC, and/or you have a strong disdain against Ubisoft, this game is going to be hard for you to enjoy, even if the experience is medicore, youre probably going to talk yourself into hating it. 
Which is fine, I think everyone does that.

If youre willing to give it a chance I think you will find the best Assassin's Creed experience to date. Whether thats a good or bad thing is up to you.

Génial

Однозначно верный шаг разработчиков в развитии серии игр про ассасинов. Конечно от Assassins Creed осталось только: название, паркур и анимус. В целом игра лучше бы зашла под названием Одиссея, ну или вызвала бы меньше возмущений). Так что Юбисофт молодцы, что решились на подобный шаг.

В игре взято много механик из других игр Юби: наёмники - от Теней Мордора; концепция и структура культа - от Wildlands; групповые бои - Синдикат; морские баталии и подводные исследования - Чёрный флаг. В итоге получился любопытный сборник приправленный духом Древней Греции под соусом РПГ.

По сравнению с другими играми серии даже элементарная боёвка стала лучше: теперь особо не запинаешь толпу сопостатов в одиночку. Подправили ИИ: он не стал идеальным, но противник в крепостях теперь меняет маршруты патрулирования;  при тревоге не разбегаются по одному, а действуют малыми группами.

Мир игры сочный, яркий. Хочется иногда просто включить фоторежим и полюбоваться пейзажем. Хорошая детализация локаций. Здесь постоянно что-то случается: нападения зверей/разбойников на путников; сражения за регион могут запросто начаться и без участия ГГ; мелкие стычки Спарты и Афин. 
Понравилось как происходит погружение тонущего корабля, как акулы слетаются к погибшим противникам. Эту деталь нельзя не отметить)

Зацепило то, что зачастую выбор влияет на мир в целом, Посетив позже локации можно заметить последствия.

В общем в игре не скучно проводить время. Данный жанр и тематика, меня лично, увлекли. 

Игра, конечно, не идеальна: ведь это первые шаги Юби в таком жанре. Кое-где ИИ ещё глуповат, массовые сражения слабо отличаются друг от друга, да и морские сражения не всем понравятся.

Игру рекомендую, если и не за полную цену, то по скидке обязательно)

유비가 만든 오픈월드중에서 제일 괜찮아요. 할수있는것도 많고 파밍할 요소 사냥하고 퀘스트할 요소등도 많습니다. 해상전은 살짝 단순해서 아쉽지만 다양성을 추구했단 점에서 점수를 높게 주고싶네요.

스토리도 자신이 선택해서 할 수 있어 그 결과를 보는 재미도있습니다. 다만 유비가 만든 선택지가있는 진행방식의 게임은 이번이 처음이라 그런지 아직까지 조금 부족한요소가 있네요. 예를들면 퀘스트 후 제가 선택한 그 결과가 다른 NPC를 통해 들려와 가보면 큰 상호작용이없어 2프로 부족한 느낌이고 어떤건 연기가 좀 어색해 몰입도가 떨어질때도 있습니다. 그 밖에도 연출등에서 완성도가 살짝 떨어지는부분..대충만든거같은 부분도 보이고 여러 컨탠츠가 있지만 개연성이나 참여유도가 떨어지는 컨탠츠도 있습니다. (예를들어 점령전 왜 아테네 스파르타중 한쪽을 약화시키고 전쟁에 참여해야하는지 스토리적인 개연성부족함)

하지만 수많은파밍요소와 탐험요소, 자유도등이 있어 이제껏 플레이했는것중 가장맘에 들었습니다.

本测评一切评价，均以《起源》为基准。总体评分：9分（起源10分）

首先对是否入手存在顾虑的人：
1.	如果你是玩过上作，但对《奥德赛》抱有迟疑态度，即觉得整体UI，游戏“看起来”跟上作差别不大，而觉得不值得入手的人。请摒弃你的这种想法。《起源》194小时表示，《奥德赛》绝不相同。 
2.	如果你没有玩过刺客信条系列，看别人直播玩感觉不错，或者上一个玩过的刺客系列追溯到《兄弟会》，《黑旗》，或者《大革命》，那么绝对值得一试。
3.	购买什么版本？如果你很喜欢这个游戏，那么黄金版应该是性价比最高的。如果抱着试试看的心态，那就选标准版。如果你是个穷逼，那就等打折吧。育碧中国成立之后，国内应该不会破解了。

下面进入正题。当我预购了终极版之后，我的内心是忐忑的。种种迹象都表明，这好像是一款《起源》的大型DLC。但一点一点玩下去，就能发现本作大有不同。这一作更强调人物随着等级的提升，各方面能力的一点点提升。从一开始蹩脚的偷袭，笨拙的奔跑，到后期行云流水的潜入刺杀，玩家可以明显感觉到一个角色的成长。而不像以前的一把袖剑杀翻天。奥德赛的自由度，达到了刺客信条系列前所未有的高度。如果你想旅游可以选简单，如果你钟爱黑魂，也可以选择噩梦。如果你不喜欢按部就班，可以选择探索游戏模式；如果你喜欢每一步都被标明怎么做，引导模式就很适合。并且，同时可以接很多任务，喜欢先做哪个就做哪个。总之，在游戏性上，充分适应一切玩家。另外，游戏把背景放在了民主诞生的古希腊。在那里，你甚至可以跟苏格拉底讨论哲学♂，结识医学之父希波克拉底，大文豪希罗多德，斯巴达两位君王等等，侧面加强了游戏内容的深度。总之越往后越精彩。

下面，来吐槽一下本作中觉得不是很爽的一些细节。
1.	习惯了起源里的流畅刺杀，初步上手奥德赛的感觉并不好。因为技能匮乏的初期，刺杀起来非常僵硬，游戏等级压制严重，没有铭刻，技能没点满的时候，基本只有靠莽。记得34级的时候，刺杀不死一个29级的将军，很头疼。
2.	对于女性角色来说，衣服都太丑了！游戏并没有针对性别分类防具，很多时候不得不隐藏头盔。
3.	Bugs.我们熟悉的育碧，又回来了。起源玩了接近200小时，发现的bug屈指可数。奥德赛确实有赶工之嫌。穿模，卡模，音乐乱放，提示延迟，任务目标无效，无法确认击杀，甚至藏宝图地点没有宝物？！可以，这很育碧。
4.	画面很美，控制温度的前提下，1066顶级画质全开，31-89帧。可是CPU占用极高，16G基本全满，并且很热。急需优化。
5.	细节不完美。记得起源里拿火把进洞穴，会烧掉蜘蛛网，奥德赛就不行。并且攀岩的过程中会出现障碍，爬着爬着某块石头上不去了，没有起源操作流畅。并且探索各种古墓时，内部构造大同小异，没有了上一作的惊艳。
6.	任务之间距离跨度太大。本作地图超大，很多岛屿，需要一一开鸟点，每次叫大船很麻烦，游泳又太慢，大部分地方连小船都没有，即使有，小船有损耗，开着开着就沉了...？有时接任务一个地方，做任务跑几公里，交任务又换千里之外了，有强行增加游戏时常之嫌。
7.	升级真的慢，等级压制严重。升级装备船只需要大量材料。可能驱使一些急功近利的玩家开修改器。

总体来看，奥德赛是刺客信条所有作品中，数一数二的精品。但IGN打分9.2，作为一个硬核玩家，我认为高了，不是说分高了，而是并不应该比起源高。双DLC完全体的起源依旧是最接近完美的巅峰。

感谢阅读。

> Assassin's Creed Odyssey

> Can only assassinate low-level guards and donkeys

本来是想给个好评的，毕竟风景不错，育碧的贴图实力没的说；潜行系统大改，上收难度不高，刺杀的娱乐性提高；战斗系统较起源有了一定的改观，技能有了一定的搭配；海战回归，作为一个黑旗玩家表示海战方面还行，毕竟聊胜于无，路上玩腻了还可以去海上溜达溜达；魁北克特色的小弟系统依旧还在，这一向是我比较喜欢的地方；优秀的主线剧情和丰富的支线任务，搭配玩家自己的对话选择，更添加的游戏的自由度与丰富程度，这种做法在刺客信条还是首次，值得赞扬。
但是为什么还是给了差评？
1.优化不如起源。鹰眼视觉刚开始使用时甚至会卡顿，常规状态最大帧数只有30-40范围内，起源的平均帧数都比现在高。一旦进入特殊的天气状态，更是开始掉帧，进入特殊建筑或洞窟古墓什么的，也会有不稳定帧数出现。
2.bug奇多，比起源比知道多到哪里去了。各种跳墙缝隙里，各种石头悬浮在天上，各种材料拿不到，各种目标进入里世界，反正在修复之前，各种问题和bug，有些还好，不是恶性bug，但是有些是涉及到主线剧情的bug让人难以接受，要么删档重来，要么等修复。删档重来可以，但是这就涉及到下一个毛病。
3.巨大的地图，更多的问号，更费力的开荒以及更难受的肝。魁北克的老毛病在枭雄的时候就有了，太过大量而又重复的地图问好支线减脂不能再难受，简直是一种不友好的设定。另外，光是目前开荒地图不做任务就已经保底100小时左右，更何况是做各种乱七八糟的任务呢？育碧你什么什么时候能够明白延长一个游戏的寿命并不是靠这种重复的育碧式沙盒撑起来的，玩家的长时间游戏也不是靠这种方式。如果不解决这种毛病，再多的有趣的直线、再美丽的风景也救不了你。
4.无聊的洞窟与古墓，和外部美丽的野外景色形成了鲜明的对比，又黑又难受，视角极其受限，方向感找不好的话，没个几分钟时跑不出来的，起源地古墓最多是暗一点，你这是完全变黑了。另外，古墓难度基本为0，起源的古墓好歹部分还需要动脑筋，你奥德赛的古墓是无脑乱走都可以找到目标。
5.最重要的一点，将ACT完全转变为RPG我们从第一代就开始玩的老玩家并不反对，而且我们也比较喜欢这样的新玩法，但是请不要连鸟瞰点这种最基础的老玩家的情怀都弄的不伦不类，为了展示一些特殊建筑或者是育碧自以为好看的风景或角度而放弃了最高处的鸟瞰点，故意的放在一些又低又矮的建筑或是所谓景点的地方作为鸟瞰点，简直是故意喂给老玩家们一口屎吃，而玩家为了鹰眼能力增强却又不得不吃下这口屎。希望魁北克能够正视鸟瞰点的定义，而你们在之前的枭雄的时候还不是这种样子的。另外，上次故意给玩家强行喂屎的游戏还是你蒙特利尔的远哭5。
6.神一样的AI判别系统，尽管AI的智商还是负数，但是明显眼神比更好以前好了，但是在暗杀过程中只要是只狼惊动了AI敌人我即使是在草丛中都能被发现、即使不在警戒区也能被AI视为敌人，这种超敏视觉以及强烈的杀人欲望的AI我还是第一次见到，极大的影响暗杀的游戏体验，逼迫玩家向战士无双流方向强行靠拢，基本上又喂了玩家一口屎。

总之，奥德赛游戏性还算不错，质量还算上乘，从RPG来说基本算是合格了。但是作为刺客信条，在小的细节方面是要打负分的，不能因为尝试新鲜的东西就忘了本，也不能犯和蒙特利尔一样的强行给玩家喂屎的臭毛病，这样只会砸了自己的招牌。
快点解决我们的CPU问题！！！！

前作のオリジンズは景色は同じばかりで途中でアンインストールしましたが今回は景色がやばいです
ギリシャの街並みが本当に芸術レベルで感動します
そしてなにより驚いたのが音楽とかが似てるのかウィッチャー3をやっている感覚にも陥ります

今回はオリジンズの上位互換と言われてますが海戦は正直4以下だと思います
望遠鏡がなく敵船を確認するのも鷲を使って敵の物資の確認をするのですがそのたびに船は一時停止してしまいます
スパルタとアテナイと海賊と商船があるのですが何も説明がないので最初はどの勢力かなのか全然わかりません
そして海戦は別にやらなくってもゲームは進むので素材集めと衝角を敵船の横腹に突っ込むのと乗り込みくらいしか楽しみがないですね
正直なところ海戦は同じUBIから出るスカル＆ボーンズを楽しみ待つしかないですね

スキルとか特にデバフが強いかなと思うくらいであとはアサシン特化なので弓は知りません
前回弓が強すぎて言われてたからなのか弓の種類を廃止してスキルだけで砂にも拡散撃ちにもできるって感じです
今回武器に好きなバフ付けれるのでカスタム要素は広がりました武器のLvもアプグレ可能です(ただし材料がががが･･･)
もちろん防具にもつけれます

少し気になったのはサブクエが殺しクエしかねぇところですが話し合いとか脅しで警告とかすればいいのにとりあえず殺してこいです海外怖いですね
こんなのばかりかと思えばゴ〇く〇みたいな奴を何故か殺さず解決してこいとかまったく謎ですね

一応課金もありますけど特にやらないでも進めますUBIのショップってめっちゃ高いですからね(日本が先進国で断トツに賃金低いからそう感じるだけだけど)

The better version of Origins, main storyline is interesting. Level scaling without boosters is slightly bad. The sidequests are pretty neccesary so you can level up, but they do a good job of making them interesting. Some bugs such as control cutoffs and some lighting issues, along with some physics glitches but compared to other assassin's creed games at launch this one is pretty stable. AI is cool and dynamic, if a bit wonky at times. Present time story is again a bit convoluted but at the same time just a bit boring, and I find myself slightly more apathetic to it than how I felt in the beginning. The map is very big but it could be bigger, more to explore is nice (personally). The accents in the voice acting were nice and might be authentic, but they can be pretty inconsistent. However despite all these issues they really do the time period justice and exploring and seeing and living ancient greece and meeting historical characters and getting caught up in historical affairs in true AC fashion is a treat with this game. I would rate it like 9.3/10, I've sunk a lot of time into the game and i expect to sink even more, I thoroughly reccommend the game

As a huge fan of the Assassin's Creed series, Greek Mythology, and RPG, I am quite pleased with this game. The last few Assassin's Creed games have been great in my opinion, but lacking. Odyssey has restored the series to its former glory and beyond in my opinion.

Pros:
- Exploration mode - Gives you more reason to explore and enjoy the world
- Choices that impact the story and relationships
- Combat - Not too easy, not too difficult.. just right
- Ship battles - Never was a fan of ship battles in Black Flag and other games, but I quite like how they work in Odyssey
- Unique Abilities - 4 melee and 4 archery abilities that can be assigned to use. One unlock per level, at least so far
- Amazing graphics - I run the game on ultra settings at 1080p on my 4k monitor, and even being stretched like that, the game is stunningly beautiful
I'm only 15% through the game, so I'm bound to find more things to list as a pro, and I only listed a few major pros here

Cons:
- It does tend to freeze from time to time, not often, and not game impacting (I run a gtx 1080 and i7 7700 with 32 gigs ram)
- Made the mistake of unlocking Evie (the UPlay reward) before I progressed far enough to get a ship in the game, now it seems she is lost forever, hopefully Ubisoft fixes this bug
- Resource heavy - Even with a beast of a computer, if I want to play with ultra settings, I can't play in 4k or 2k, unless I wanted to settle for less than 60fps

In summary - I never thought an Assassin's Creed game would come around that I'd like as well or better than AC 2 or Brotherhood.... But now I can safely say that Odyssey has bumped Brotherhood down a notch

嗯，真香，我还要。

If you liked playing Origins you will like this, Odyssey is more of the same but better, eh, slightly better.

Voice acting, the sense of freedom, the script and quest structures are a major step up from Origin, BUT the leveling stuff is still very annoying to deal with as sometimes you are just stuck in an area where you just can't do anything but leave since none of the given approachs work if you are 2 or 3 levels behind, imo I hate this. Alot.

Playing on Hard mode + Exploration mode is highly recommended.

Microtransactions are there but I don't think they are forced upon the player or anything... maybe it's just I enjoy playing the game enough that the time-savers aren't relevant or appealing to me.

Not too shabby Ubisoft, maybe you will become a decent game publisher once again.












*Assassin's Creed is a good franchise*

Best Assasin in the series although the bad performance even on high end PC, the dipping FPS mainly on a city but still can't cover what's the game has offer.
The good:
Intersting story with freedom of chose dialog should be keep forever on AC series, it is making the game play varied.
Side quests most of them were very intersting.
Stealth/Infiltration are fun to play because of improved A.I and more well builded enemies bases, many of tactics works too, like using arrows shot a place to lure enemy walk specified direction. or using dead body as a attraction, whistle works on vertical too.
Improved combat gives more style to play.
Huge, pretty and varied world to explore.
Great graphcis and music.

Cons:
Run quite bad on above average PC.
Stealth game play still not as deep as other stealth games.
Although there are many bases to Infiltrate some of them were using same struture design blueprint, i wish there are more realized enemies bases, for example big interior with wellplaced obstacles to hide.

Overall is great and best AC for me

Amazing game, great gameplay, amazing world. Play as Kassandra though, so much better than Alexios.
育碧是我爸爸！

三条线都通关了。后期主线和神教线相比神器线略显平庸。
几个神话怪物的boss设计都非常赞，氛围也很足。唯一美中不足的可能是这几个boss难度低了点，开噩梦难度都能一两次过，不浪基本死不了。（感觉boss难度都不高，包括几个传奇野兽，都是噩梦难度过的。狮子提前用弓箭清掉小狮子就会很好打。野猪除外，野猪是真的难，特别是后面那个会放屁的野猪）
不过噩梦难度过据点是挺难的，经常小兵刺杀不死，除非蓄力刺。如果刚正面清人速度不够又会出现一群佣兵追着砍。这样死过好多次。前作我可能刺杀不死赶紧跑个视野盲区然后再刺杀多来几次就死了，这作有佣兵增援这样做风险还是挺高的。
当你觉得游戏很难的时候多去做支线提升等级，能有效降低难度。如果你选高难度，前期将是难度最高的时候。

支线故事性比前作好很多，这作我还是挺乐意去做支线的（带感叹号“！”的支线）。
森林的感觉确实比沙漠好多了。而且地貌变化还是很丰富的。当成旅游模拟器也不错。玩不动了可以在城市里逛逛，看一看希腊的神庙，老早就学过雅典卫城，完整的风貌比现实中残缺的神庙要好很多（像阿波罗神庙现实中只剩下几根柱子了）。在路边听路人说话，看他们拜神，祭典，祈祷，感受时代的氛围，也是蛮有意思的。

[h1]概述[/h1]

《刺客信条》系列是育碧旗下的一个经久不衰的超级大IP，历代续作几乎覆盖了整个西方历史的重要时期。在 Anvil Engine 的生动演绎下，一个个生动鲜活的刺客形象展现在玩家的眼前。伴随着刺客信条系列的成功，育碧也迎来了企业的辉煌发展时期。而随之而来的却不是《刺客信条》系列新作的更高水平续作，而是为了迎合市场的一次次年货化的“新刺客”。在这种情况影响下，刺客信条的口碑一落千丈，玩家也一再对育碧表示失望。终于，育碧痛定思痛，为保证《刺客信条》系列的一贯口碑，在2016年育碧并未发售系列新作，而是集合了所有力量，为《刺客信条：起源》这一部缘起新作做足了功课。

市场表现证实了育碧的开发能力，《刺客信条：起源》经受住了市场的考验，一经发售就受到了各大游戏媒体、广大玩家的一致好评。育碧再一次用事实告诉了世人谁才是单机游戏领域第一强。时隔一年，《刺客信条》系列新作《刺客信条：奥德赛》再一次进入了玩家的视线（钱包要飞走了），那么这一次的系列新作到底是年货呢？还是经典呢？让我们拭目以待。

[h1]游戏剧情[/h1]

《刺客信条：奥德赛》的故事发生在古希腊最辉煌的城邦时期，此时距离巴耶克出生还有好几百年的时间，刺客兄弟会更是连一根毛都还看不见。此时希波战争正打得如火如荼，而《刺客信条：奥德赛》的故事就是发生在这样一个历史时期，玩家将会跟随着战争的脚步到这段遥远的过去中去追寻深埋于人心中的刺客精神。

《刺客信条：奥德赛》的故事发生于伯罗奔尼撒战争史的重要阶段，即第一次希波战争的后十年，温泉关战役打响，斯巴达三百勇士力冠三军，誓死保卫家园。在游戏的开场，玩家将操控斯巴达国王“列奥尼达斯”在温泉关战役的战场上抵抗波斯庞大联军的进攻，在战役中英勇杀敌，驱逐敌人。最后，敌人暂时被打退了。

但是，暂时的平静不能换回真正的和平。温泉关战役后波斯人重新卷土重来，斯巴达精神虽然顽强，但是终敌不过万千的波斯猛士。此战凶险万分，国王的子女中将会有一人葬身于大海（这为之后刺客兄弟会和圣殿对立埋下了伏笔），而剩余的一人则在世上艰难求生，最终成长为一代刺客大师。

众所周知，《刺客信条》系列的剧情故事优秀，但是育碧始终不是很会讲故事。育碧式开放世界中最著名的清点玩法直接把整个游戏世界的剧情部分搅得支离破碎。到最后玩家也始终不能最好的体会到游戏剧情部分的精髓。而到了《刺客信条：奥德赛》这一代，笔者经过游玩体验后发现本作终于能好好讲一个故事了。

游戏的剧情部分，相较于之前的历代作品，本作加入了类似于CRPG玩法的对话选择系统，玩家在游戏中所作出的任何选择都会直接影响到游戏的后续剧情走向，这让游戏的故事发展更加的不可捉摸，也更加的富有真实性。也让玩家在游戏过程中必须谨慎考虑清楚你要做个什么样的人，是欺压良善、偷鸡摸狗的恶棍还是锄强扶弱、助人为乐的善者，不同的形象直接影响到城市NPC对自己的印象，这对于玩家后期所走的路有着很大的影响。

虽然这一代的《刺客信条：奥德赛》是最不像《刺客信条》的一部作品。光是在剧情一方面，就能够看出育碧的突破。这一次，育碧终于学会了怎么讲好一个动人的传奇故事。相较于前面的系列作品，在《刺客信条：奥德赛》的游戏中，玩家对话时摄像机镜头会和NPC靠得更加接近，这样看起来更加的自然，也更加接近自然生活中人和人交流的视角与距离。同时，拉近了摄像机的视角更加有助于玩家看清NPC的面部细节和表情变化，有助于玩家体会NPC的心情并找出更加符合预期的答案。再配合上本作中如此之多的对话道德选择，玩家终于可以在育碧沙盒下的世界中认真体会一次《刺客信条》的故事。

举一个小例子，在游戏的初期，玩家清理众神任务线的时候，会在福伯那里接到一个拯救黑死病家庭的支线任务。笔者按照提示前往了被烧毁的村庄，发现那里只剩下一家人存活，而且希腊的秩序神教（圣殿雏形）牧师正在准备烧死这一家人。玩家可以选择杀死牧师然后拯救这家人，但是可能会导致整个岛上黑死病蔓延；而不救这一家人却要眼睁睁看着他们被抹杀。在这里笔者遇到了一个简单却难以立刻下决断的选择，是选择一时的良善还是保全大局。其实不管选择哪个选项，笔者都觉得不完美，看着他们死笔者会感到内疚，而救了他们笔者也没有办法治好他们。这种深深的无力感触动了笔者的心。

[h1]游戏战斗[/h1]

从《刺客信条：起源》开始，《刺客信条》就有了改变游戏战斗模式的苗头，以至于部分玩家把这一作戏称为”狂战士信条“。而到了《刺客信条：奥德赛》这一作，ARPG的苗头已经非常明显了。游戏中升级系统、装备系统、技能树等ARPG游戏的标志性元素在本作中一应俱全。而游戏的打击手感也一改前作的AVA模式，而是变得更加的灵活多变，更加的讲求操作。这一切的改变都是《刺客信条》系列在新时期为了适应时代而做出的改变。这些改变让《刺客信条》系列能够更加符合玩家的期待，也更加的适应时代需求而不被淘汰。

1.等级系统：相比于前作，《刺客信条：奥德赛》要更加的RPG化。在本作中战斗刺杀要考虑到等级的判定，如果敌人对玩家形成等级压制，那么玩家将不能直接把敌人刺杀致死，而只是适当减血。另一方面，等级提升会全面提升玩家各方面的属性，大大提高战斗力。但是，请千万不要认为这样就可以靠提升等级在游戏中横着走。游戏中的等级提升不仅是玩家，还有NPC。当玩家以为可以升高等级的再去打某个点时，就会惊奇的发现NPC也升级了。之前打不过现在也有可能打不过。所以还需要玩家保持一定的战斗水平。

2.装备系统：有道是”好马配好鞍“，本作中装备系统变得更加重要，精良的装备会让玩家在战斗中更加得心应手。游戏中通过战斗和搜刮可以获得新装备，而更高等级的装备能够提供给玩家更多的属性加成，表现在战斗上就是DPS更高、防御更硬。这些都突显出了装备系统的重要性，让玩家在战斗过程中不忘DIY装备，充满了RPG的味道。

3.技能系统：技能系统是本作的战斗系统中的一个重要组成部分，玩家升级可以获得技能点，而通过消耗技能点玩家可以学习各系技能。在《刺客信条：奥德赛》中，玩家共有3个分支的技能可供选择，分别是：猎手、战士和刺客。猎手重弓箭系技能，学习后可百步穿杨，威力惊人；战士重改造身体，学习后可化身刑天，所向披靡；刺客重隐匿行踪，学习后杀敌于无形。因此，在玩家战斗升级后，就必须要合理规划自己的技能树，防止技能树点歪，做不了强大的战士。

4.雇佣兵系统：雇佣兵系统是本作一个非常有趣的游戏系统。在游戏中随着玩家的探索（偷东西或者做阵营任务），都会触发通缉。这时玩家就成了吸引蜜蜂的花朵。之后玩家会遇到很多前来猎杀自己赚取佣金的敌方阵营雇佣兵。而随着玩家等级的提升，玩家的雇佣兵等级也会随之提升。也将会遇到更加强大的猎杀者。这也促进了玩家的进步。而玩家该怎么解决猎杀呢？杀死来犯之敌？这只是其中一个方案。除此之外，玩家还可以像捕捉精灵宝可梦一样，把猎杀者制服然后收进自己的后宫。咳咳，是船队。带领一大群厉害的手下可是很有趣的。

5.航海系统：在本作中航海系统再一次回归，毕竟是美丽的爱琴海风光，怎么能不让玩家去海上浪呢。而本作的航海系统又不同于《黑旗》中的航海系统，本作中的航海变的更加的纯粹，战斗变得不再重要。航海成为了玩家往返于两地的工具，而并非是战船。所以玩家可以自由的在大海上闲逛，而不用担心什么时候自己的船被搞沉。

以上几点都充分展示了《刺客信条》正在像动作冒险类游戏靠拢的决心。希望育碧能保持自己优势，为《刺客信条》系列游戏创造出更加辉煌的明天。

[h1]开放世界[/h1]

”公式化沙盒游戏“向来是育碧沙盒游戏的代称，而自从《刺客信条》系列大火之后，育碧式沙盒开始被各大厂商竞相模仿，而育碧式沙盒也因为公式化的套路让人诟病。育碧该是时候做出一些改变了，这是每一个育碧粉丝的心声。终于，在《刺客信条：奥德赛》中，笔者似乎发现了育碧对自家沙盒式玩法的尝试性改变。在游戏开始时，多出了一个选项，这一项着重让玩家选择游戏中的任务等标记显示方式，分别是”指览模式“和”探索模式“。”指览模式“其实就是原本的公式化沙盒玩法，标准的清点式玩法。而”探索模式“顾名思义，是为了探索而生，玩家在游戏中不会有太多的公式化标记，任务等都需要玩家去自行探索（听起来有一点像塞尔达）。而”探索模式“也是《刺客信条：奥德赛》推荐的游戏玩法。可见，育碧对这种革新所保有的期望之大。

育碧总是走在游戏领域的前列，不断探索着种种新的游戏玩法。这是一次大胆的尝试，表明育碧真的是一家负责任的优秀厂商，而不断地创新也让育碧游戏充满活力和生机。

另外一些细节，也可以向玩家展示出，育碧真的在竭力把奥德赛的开放世界变得真实。比如，游戏中的NPC都有自己的生活，他们都在有条不紊的做着自己的事，再比如夜晚总会有狼袭击村庄等设定。方方面面，育碧的公式化沙盒总该能有很大的改变了吧。

[h1]其他方面[/h1]

1.配音：本作一个良心体现。据说育碧在开发本作的过程中聘用了大量的希腊本地人来进行配音表演，希望最大程度还原出爱琴海风土人情。而且本作中是全程配音，和玩家交流的NPC都有配音，而且配音质量很高（毕竟AAA，没啥好说的）。

2.氪金系统：游戏中包含了氪金系统，但是这里的氪金系统不会影响到游戏的平衡性（废话，一个单人游戏要啥平衡性），只是能提供给玩家经验、货币的加成，全收集地图标记等辅助性氪金选项。在保证了游戏性的同时方便了玩家攻略游戏。当然了，氪一次价格也是不菲的，还是需要很大本钱的。另外，育碧在发售完黄金版后又出了一个季票，这一波操作真是溜得一匹。

3.崩溃，很多人反馈说游戏经常性崩溃，笔者起初挺担心的，但是进入游戏后发现没什么问题。笔者玩了这么久没出现过崩溃。

[h1]总结[/h1]

《刺客信条》系列游戏是育碧旗下的金字招牌，《刺客信条》系列也代表着育碧的游戏制作水平。《刺客信条：奥德赛》是《刺客信条》系列的最新作，在本作中育碧对传统的公式化沙盒玩法做出了很多方面的革新尝试，让开放世界变得更加富有人情味。而游戏战斗模式的改变，也让游戏的战斗部分变的更加的爽快。可以说，顺应了时代，革新后的《刺客信条》保持了游戏经典玩法的同时，最大程度做出了改变，让游戏变得更加好玩。

tl;dr  :  Gutes Spiel für alle, die RPG's und evtl. auch ein bisschen grinden & erkunden mögen, definitiv 60€ wert

+ Viel Content (21 Stunden und noch nicht ansatzweise fertig)
+ Assassin's Creed
+ RPG Style (Skill Tree + Gear)
+ wird nicht langweilig
+ Open World
+ Gute Story (sagen alle, ich skippe nur durch)
+ Sehr hohe Grafik Einstellungen und Reshade Mod - trotzdem meist 60FPS

+/- dieses ganze Schiffsystem fühlt sich komisch an und ich hasse es mit meinem Schiff auf offener See unterwegs zu sein 
+/- normalerweise schreibt jeder "microtransactions" aber mein Spielerlebnis hat das noch nicht verschlechtert

- Wieso sind normale, wilde Raubtiere stärker als so manche menschliche "Elite-Gegner" ?
- Zu meinen gunsten ist die KI der Gegner ziemlich bescheiden. z.B. wenn man Gegner mit den Bogen abschießt, kapieren die oft nicht von wo man schießt und das auch noch nach 40 Pfeilen. Außerdem können die Gegner oft nichts machen wenn man einen Bogen benutzt und eine gute Position hat. Die Gegner schießen höchstens mit Bögen oder Speeren zurück und da reicht ein Schritt nach links und man weicht dem aus.
- 50/50 Chance, dass das Spiel crasht, nachdem man gestorben ist.

Probably the best PC game of 2018. Best for both casuals and hardcore pros. Great storyline. This game gives the feeling of a true RPG. The graphics are awesome too. The scenery, combat system, exploration, movement physics, everything is the best of the best.

-Analisis corto: JUEGAZO! UNA AUTENTICA OBRA DE ARTE. No te lo pienses más, sabes que lo quieres. No te vas a arrepentir. Añadir al carro y a disfrutar!!

-Analisis largo: bueno a todos aquellos que querais saber más en profundidad del juego antes de nada he de daros un par de detalles añadidos para que os hagais una idea de lo bueno que es este juego. Este juego salio el 5 de Octubre, casualmente me ha pillado de vacaciones, aburrido en mi casa pense, "voy a darle una oportunidad", (yo, que soy bastante hater de ubisoft), y asi es como empezo. En 7 dias le he echado 52 horas, es decir, adios gimnasio, adios dormir y alimentarse adecuadamente, hola barba fuera de control. He cambiado mis ropas por simplemente envolverme en la manta con la que duermo. Y aqui estoy escribiendo este analisis, por que no se que sera, quizas llevaba mucho tiempo sin jugar un assasins o que simplemente estoy loco, pero este juego me ha encantado (incluso creo que ha superado la saga de mi querido Ezio Auditore). En definitiva:


  -Sus puntos fuertes:

-Decision total; todo lo que hagas en el juego tiene su repercusion, incluso en la historia principal, pudiendo matar a protagonistas principales si te apetece. Practicamente puedes opinar en todo. Increible.
-Cuidadisimo detalle en todo: esto es una de las cosas que más me ha impresionado. Cargas tu arco con una flecha normal la acercas a un fuego y tienes una flecha de fuego, ya solo con esto lo digo todo, pero es que el juego esta plagado de estos detalles, practicamente te permite hacer todo.
-Modo conquista; lo descubriras pronto.
-Gran cantidad de armas y armaduras; configuralas segun tu modo de juego para obtener la victoria. Asesinato, combate directo, arco, ¿que es lo tuyo?.
-Rendimiento; bueno yo tengo un buen ordenador, asi que no puedo opinar totalmente en este aspecto, pero por lo que he visto en rendimiento va bastante bien.
-Modo Hardcore/realista. Te hara pensarte dos veces como actuar.
-Mucho más.

    -Puntos negativos:

-No los encuento. Necesito otras 50 horas.

Hasta la proxima!

Первый АС, на который я делаю отзыв, хотя в серию поигрываю со времён Альтаира. 

Это пожалуй весьма хорошая игра, но не самая лучшая часть Кредо в целом. 

[b]Плюсы:[/b]
[LIST]
[*]Боевка стала лучше, чем в Истоках, но определенно ещё есть над чем работать. 
[*]Одиссея весьма красива. Исторические места реализованы весьма недурно, левел-дизайнеры определенно поработали на славу. 
[*]Стало больше РПГ нелинейности, чего по сути и требуется игре, если она хочет быть "РПГ".
[*]Возвращение корабельных боев пошло игре на пользу.
[*]Атмосфера Древней Греции передана неплохо, а вот с атмосферой свойственной серии АС - есть проблемы.
[/LIST]
[b]Минусы:[/b]
[LIST]
[*]Та самая атмосфера "первооткрывателя", которая была свойственна первым частям серии - тут к сожалению, всё ещё отсутствует. Хотя те же руины ИСу - реализованы неплохо. 
[*]Скалирование уровня врагов здесь не всегда к месту, поэтому у некоторых игроков возникают проблемы с прокачкой и составлением определенных билдов. 
[*]Сей минус не совсем относится конкретно к Одиссеи. Юбисофт перебарщивают с раскрытием сюжета в "настоящей реальности" в пределах только комиксов, из-за этого не знакомые с событиями из комиксов - могут войти в ступор из-за некоторых описываемых в Одиссеи моментов. 
[*]Как и с Истоками, увы, оптимизация на релизе - так себе. 
[/LIST]

Определенно, те, кто жалуются на "гринд" - всё ещё плохо освоили игру. Есть множество достаточно простых способов получить ресурсы: разбирать предметы, грабить ящики в крепостях и лагерях, топить корабли. 
С прокачкой то же самое: я попал в Афины впервый раз будучи 22 уровня, при этом зачистил только две зоны (где был по сюжету) и сделал там все квесты, включая ежедневные (в духе сходи убей пару солдат). 

Итог: Юбисофт надо работать над ошибками так или иначе. Боевка может быть лучше, последствия выбора в диалогах для второстепенных квестов - продуманнее. 
В целом же Одиссею можно посоветовать, как любителям "Древней Греции", так и любителям игр с элементами в духе Ведьмака. Что касается фанатов АС - каждый решает для себя сам.

画面不错，优化差。巫师的对话系统、魔多的佣兵系统都只学到了皮毛，依旧育碧公式化地图和任务。
       主线剧情高开低走，前期铺垫的身世多么坎坷，要向养父复仇，也不见内心怎么纠结，黑化的妹妹突然态度180度，最后一家5口人其乐融融。神器任务线生父让主角承担保卫人类，拯救世界的重任，what the f**k！
       繁多的任务叫你找A，你找到A然后A说你得先帮我办事，完成后告诉你去找B，找到B又叫你要先帮他杀人越货，mmp。 过了前20个小时的新鲜期，快被地图上一个个的叹号和问号刷吐了。
       简单来说，部分任务可圈可点，大多数任务无趣生厌。
       我给评个7/10分，就看DLC和三代狂战士重置版怎么样了。
优化感人，第一个小时里游戏卡死两回，调不出任务管理器，只能强制关机。然后换了手柄倒是再没出现。刚开始玩，觉得还不错，像巫师3里对话选择、任务墙还是很不错的，还有新的探索模式，真香

I've played quite a few ac games. The franchise itself needed a fresh formula. I think it is quite a fun game, but also some of the mechanics are poorly implemented.
STORY:
Haven't gotten to far into the story, just unlocked the cult system (which is quite cool looking). However the story is immersive and decent.
Sneaky Stabby and Stabby Stabby:
There's a lot of bitching about microtransactions (fuck off ubi), which I haven't hit any of the grindy parts. Playing on hard I have beaten mobs that were higher level than me (but still in the white), it was quite challenging and often took many tries, but it is possible. I honesty like the combat system it's the best part of the game, per the normal assassin's creed. Each weapon are different. I'm not going to into detail on each type of weapon feels, beacuse they feel exactly how you think they would feel. Stealth is not op, but still is good to do. Skills are also game changing, get some skills over others (bow is actually really good, don't forget about them).
THE MECHANICS THAT SUCK:
Overall I like the game quite a lot, however the travel system is pretty ass. Fast traveling is pretty annoying, for an example why can't I teleport to towns? The spotting mechanic is very annoying, the bird isn't fun to use. It takes a few seconds to go back in forth between them, which is the worst when trying to stealth. On top of that it feels inconsistent, either the bird can see through the universe or couldn't see its own closed eyelids. Worse of all, I don't get any infomation from using it. I don't use the bird to scout out ahead, or to be able to (INTERESTLY) track down my targets. I just go into bird mode, and just throw my mouse around until I mark everything. Also using the spotting mechanic for the boats, is pretty much entirely painful.
Boats+Factions+Mercs:
AC4 without the cannons, and being a pirate. Overall honestly I'd say the boating system in Odyssey is just nothing new, I don't feel like they really did anything intresting with it. You deal with actual fucking mythological creatures, is there really no intresting ideas that they had? I think it would be badass to build a fleet (like in AC4) but actually see your ships floating around perhaps joining you in fights, or allowing you to make an actual personal army or navy. This actually ties into my next problem for Odyssey, I don't feel much of an impact for helping a faction take a territory. I just helped you guys take over a territory, and you give me a shoe. Then on top of that, they don't care that I just helped their enemy attack them. Also the mercs are just a minor hinderance, as the march their death. They don't try to sneak up on me or do anything but walk right at me. Also at one point after killing about 10 of mercs in a row, you'd think that perhaps they wouldn't want to take this contract. 

ENDING:
Get it on sale, or not. You already most likely made up your mind. Perhaps I confirmed what your preconceived decision or not. I like but also have a lot of problems with it.
Very very good. I would say its EASILY an improvement over Origins, the combat is improved, the story so far is fantastic. I highly recommend this game to anyone who wants to have fun :).

我认为奥德赛是一款很不错的游戏，但是它根本算不上刺客信条。一丁点儿边儿都沾不上。
我认为将它命名为《斯巴达狂战士寻亲复仇记》可能效果会更好。


没有袖剑，没有兜帽，你告诉我这是刺客信条？
草垛的功能简化到了令人发指的地步，前作的草垛是一方既可以躲猫猫又可以抛尸的乐土，而奥德赛的草垛就是保证你跳下来摔不死，甚至都不能停留，你告诉我这是刺客信条？
看见了第一文明留下的石碑遗迹，主角却一句剧情上的台词都没有[spoiler] 巴耶克都知道感叹一句“哎妈，这是古代文明！俺可瞅不懂”	[/spoiler]，你告诉我这是刺客信条？
杀了神教目标之后再补一刀拿完战利品然后就开始撒丫子，没有前作的那种劝人安息的临别对话[spoiler] 虽然不太懂那是什么原理	[/spoiler]，你告诉我这是刺客信条？
最最操蛋的一点就是居然没有任何正义感的束缚。你可以这边帮雅典烧掉斯巴达的补给，另一边帮斯巴达砍死几个雅典方面的军官。最后美其名曰"我是个向钱看齐的佣兵。"。你可以肆无忌惮的烧杀抢掠，无论乡绅恶霸还是平头百姓，统统一概不顾一视同仁，也不会因此失去同步，你告诉我这是刺客信条？？？这tm跟侠盗飞车有什么区别？


孩子ta姥爷给留下了一把断矛，还得是别人告诉你矛的来历，说这是什么超越现在人类的一种文明遗留下的产物balabala。主角也就挺实在的不细问到底咋回事，就知道屁颠屁颠的拿碎片去神秘遗迹里面升级去了，你不瘆得慌吗？
中文字幕已经成为出厂自带服务了，这点必须感激育碧，要是没有偶尔蹦出来那几句能把人雷傻的翻译，就更好了[spoiler] "我愿意操，请问那些动物一共有几只？"  	[/spoiler]。
同步点都是一些神庙啦，巨型石雕啦，山坡子啦甚至民宅楼顶，可是大部分任务发配点和执行点似乎很巧妙的和同步点避开了一段距离，又恰好是那种骑马犯不着，跑着又有点远的距离。这种“一步娘炮，两步扯着蛋”的感觉居然在这部游戏里也可以体验到。
相对于巫师3辐射4这种爹妈找孩子的老模式，奥德赛大胆创新！现在我们做孩子的也可以体验找妈妈找爸爸[spoiler] 我是说亲的那个	[/spoiler]的快感啦！这是一种颠覆性的全新改革啊！
 

但是游戏剧情方面并没有减分，为了探明真相，找寻亲人，手刃仇敌，你不得不四处奔波在这片神话大地上，航行在这片如画般美丽的大海上。找回失落的宝藏，收服强力的副手，解决贪婪的强盗，讨伐为祸的野兽，消灭寻衅的佣兵，帮助受难的人民，搜索危险的洞窟，探寻海底的遗迹，[strike] 顺便偷偷神庙里的贡品，调戏几个可以共度良宵的美女	 [/strike]。你会发现，即使这款没有戴上兜帽的刺客信条也不失风采。况且奥德赛刚刚发行，后续的dlc或许可以改变大家对这款“不务正业”的游戏的看法。


一款内容丰富，可以让玩家自由探索，[strike] 可以疯狂搞姬	[/strike]，[strike] 可以在上班时间偷偷玩 	[/strike]，可以让人在它身上花钱花时间都不觉得亏的游戏，我认为就是值得好评的。而奥德赛在我眼里，就是这样一款游戏。


88/100

До этого в Ассасины вообще не играл (когда-то давно в первый). И тут, спустя 7 часов игры, Одиссея выдала, что, мол, моя одиссея только началась. Что заставило меня задуматься в целом о проекте, и почему так долго была раскачка до приключений.
То есть, понятно, что ориентир в целом у них ведьмак, но есть же причины, по которым последние Ассасины получились именно такими. Юбики не просто "нешмогли" в ведьмак - они сознательно делали игру именно такой. С гриндом "активностей", "убей бандита", "найди сокровище" и прочего. Не придумывали конкретику, как поляки, а нарочито аркадничали.

И тут я понял, как в нее надо играть в Одиссею - в три раза быстрее. Поэтому и введение затянулось. Я, скажем так, пытался играть в ее как в РПГ - неспешно, выполнил квест там, выполнил здесь, забрался на гору, полюбовался видами. А тут надо было просто ГВОЗДИТЬ.
Не поднимая головы ЛОМИТЬСЯ, выносить бычье, забегать, тяжело дыша, в комнату, моментально сканировать все абилкой, и также моментально собирать лут - я уже научился, просто беспорядочно жмякаешь Y на паде, и тебе падают залежи всякого в закрома. Быстро переключать квест, и также мчаться дальше. Выше сказал, что при таком ритме нет места именам и авторским историям - НЕКОГДА ОБЪЯСНЯТЬ, ПРОСТО УБИВАЙ ВСЕХ ЭТИХ УБЛЮДКОВ!!!

И первый остров я бы зачистил за 1.5 часа. А сценки в квестах были бы нужны просто перевести дух, или по малой нужде сходить.
Тут даже орел ручной нужен просто для того, что на ногах лень бегать и высматривать всякое. Запустил его, и он все нашел. И эти сражения армий нужны просто, чтобы еще раз ГВОЗДИТЬ, только в более нажористой форме.

Учитывая успешные продажи, это все жадно одобряется детьми, и такие и будут игры серии и дальше. Это не плохо и не хорошо, это такая данность. Юби не хотят в РПГ, им не нужны нормальные квесты, им не нужно погружение и нарратив. Лично для меня это печально, потому что команда у них подобралась великолепная. Опенворлд они строгают (даже в таком насыщенном графике) выдающийся. Кто знает, что получилось бы, если бы они сели делать атмосферную РПГ именно в стиле Ведьмака, а не гонзо-экшена.

Так что, если вы просто хотите быстро и весело вырезать селения в игре, быть самым крутым гонзо-наемником, попутно любуясь великолеными (без шуток!) видами и иногда заглядвать в инвентарь - это игра для вас. Если вы ждали атмосферную РПГ с интересными квестами и прочим - проходите мимо.

Я, поскольку до этого не играл в такое, вполне оценил проект на 7 из 10. И даже гринд активностей зашел. Если же вы идете в игру после прошлогоднихИстоков, то может и наскучить.

[i]Sarò un fissato di introduzioni, perchè anche l'intro di Far Cry 5 mi ha stregato, ma anche qui non scherziamo. Io sono abbastanza marmocchio per essere andato al cinema da ragazzino a vedere 300 (ndr - il primo e unico 300, il secondo è fuffa) e risentire (CON IMMENSO PIACERE) la voce di Roberto Pedicini che grida "SPARTANI" è stato qualcosa che è valso e varrà per sempre l'acquisto di questo gioco solo per un puro tuffo emozionale! [/i]


[b]Che cos'è AC:Odissey ?[/b]
Qualcosa di diverso a quello che ci ha abituato la saga AC negli ultimi anni, ma non necessariamente qualcosa di negativo. Potremmo interpretarlo, a partire dal capitolo precedente, Origins, una svolta nel modo di intendere questo gioco, forse, per avvicinarsi di più ad una sempre più vasta fetta di player amanti del GDR Open - World. 

Ma questo è posito o negativo ? A mio avviso si, per quanto abbia AMATO l'Ezio nazionale e le meccaniche di gioco, devo essere onesto, anche queste non mi dispiacciono. La cosa più facile da fare, per un appassionato sarebbe quella di considerarla a livello narrativo un continuo della serie, ma differente nelle modalità. Del resto anche la saga Fallout ha avuto un decorso (a mio avviso positivo) simile. 

Il vero punto di forza è presentato dalla modalità esplorazione, novità del capitolo, che, almeno per quanto riguarda me, tiene più attento a nomi, eventi e quant'altro. Sarò forse sciocco io, ma nel capitolo precedente mi limitavo a sentire quello che dicevano e completare gli obiettivi che mi comparivano in alto a sinistra, stringendo i miei compiti ad andare verso il rombo dorato. Non che ora la storia sia differente, ma il dover "ragionare" un minimo sul da farsi è una cosa che ho apprezzato molto. Tendo a precisare che tutto cià è possibile disattivarlo, ma personalmente lo scoansiglio! 

Non voglio fare eccessivi pipponi perchè ho poche ore di gioco e vorrei prima approfondire meglio il gioco e poi scrivere, magari modificando questo post...

Per quanto riguarda il comparto grafico, l'adattamento di ubisoft è sempre qualcosa di spettacolare. Su un Full HD, con 1060 3 Gb e un I5 non ho il benchè minimo problema a giocare tutto a dettagli alti con una fluidità perfetta, il che per me è più che sufficiente. 

Visto il tipo di gioco ho preferito affrontarlo con il controller; avendo giocato i precedenti con tastiera, forse si è rivelata un idea vincente, soprattutto a fronte della totale compatibilità delle perficeriche Microsoft. 

Per quanto riguarda bug e similari non ho ancora riscontrato nulla, non nulla di rilevante, proprio nulla: forse un paio di volte mi si è imbambolato in una scalata perchè non trovava l'appiglio successivo risolvendo dopo pochi secondi e un altra in una schivata si è bellamente lanciato a rotolare in mezzo ad una cassa come se non esistesse: piccolezze. 


In definitiva, ad oggi posso solo dire: [b]"THIS IS SPARTA!"[/b]

Si, lo consiglio eccome!

说实话，这个游戏相比之前系列的游戏最大的进步就是我看不出来它的进步。

但是为啥我还玩呢，可能是因为我比较讨厌邪教吧.

Definitivamente uno de los mejores juegos, a pesar de que muchos se quejan de que este nuevo juego a perdido la esencia de lo que "era" un assassin's creed. Tengo que decirles que siempre hay que probar algo nuevo y sin duda este es un claro ejemplo de evolucion, nunca se habia visto un AC como este. Perfectamente equilibrado en el aspecto RPG, una historia envolvente, paisajes que destacan por su belleza, jugabilidad envolvente, la opcion de poder elegir que decir ah hecho un cambio muy notorio y que se agradece. Sin enbargo es cierto que es repetitivo hasta cierto punto y trae una dinamica de misiones parecida a la del juego anterior(Assassin's Creed Origins) pero eso no le quita las horas de entretenimiento que ofrece. SIMPLEMENTE UN JUEGO QUE VALE LA PENA JUGAR.

Le doy un 9 de 10.

土豆快去赶紧马上迅速立刻熬夜加班做《奥德赛》的优化，1066+i7 7700《起源》中等偏上特效可以稳定60帧，但是《奥德赛》中等特效平均50+，干架或者有些地方经常掉帧，很影响体验；《奥德赛》相较于《起源》，感觉是换汤不换药（要不是看到各种希腊石像和宫殿，感觉就是《起源》二周目，这是我刚开始玩的直观感受，目前《奥德赛》11小时），当然《奥德赛》也有改变的地方：NPC对话可以多选项，而且每个选项会影响故事发展；新的技能天赋系统，感觉比《起源》简单粗暴，可以当个莽夫，玩成砍杀游戏；船只系统也得到了升级拓展，可以招募你中意的队长来当你的副手，海战个人感觉比《起源》好玩了好多；

If you liked ANY of the older ASSASSIN's CREED games.... Well, I'll just say, this one is COMPLETELY DIFFERENT!!! The gameplay itself feels RUSHED, the character movement sucks, the controls feel too complex and unresponsive, as well as the in game MAP, Weapons, Armor, and Character cusomization is all something that feels fimilar from a 1999 era game, not something made 20years later... If it wasn't for the beefy graphics of the game, and it's size, I would've NEVER believed it was released this year...  After playing for about 5hrs, too long to return it, I was able to get a good enough feel for the game that I'm really really let down... 
It's hard to tell by the graphics that the overall gameplay is changed from say ASSASSIN's CREED UNITY.. At least in previous games, I actually had the feeling that choosing a different weapon actually meant something... In this game, it seems like a really basic "all weapons are based on a DPS rating" type of calculation and weather you choose a dagger, sword, or Anything else, they all swing the same speed, and do the same EXACT damage. (Assuming you're comparing lvl 10 to lvl 10 weapons)  There are no smoke bombs, or coins to throw, You can't pick someone's pocket, and there is LITERALLY NO BACK STORY!!!! You're just tossed right into some greek gameplay without any idea why...
All in all, If you're a big fan of the previous games, then I wouldn't recommend this one for you, at NEW RELEASE PRICE!!! I feel EXTREMELY CHEATED paying $60 for this poorly constructed game... It feels like something You'd pickup out of the $9.99 discounted 5 years and older games bin at the local Game Stop...  And really I feel like thats all its worth...

Серия AC заиграла новыми красками. Перелет из Египта в Грецию заняло ровно год, при том что Одиссею разрабатывали целых три. За это время движок у игры остался без изменений, а вот начинка оказалась куда слаще и вкуснее, чем в Истоках. Мир игры стал куда больше, красивнее, проработаннее и интереснее. Хочется через каждые пять минут ходить и фотографировать велиполепные пейзажи благодаря фото-режиму в игре. Очень много интересных мест на карте. Мир попросту нельзя назвать мертвым. Юбисофт отлично проработали мир игры и отлично перенесли атмосферу древней Греции, напичкав игру контентом и квестами, пусть и не настолько качественными и доведенными до совершенства, как в том же Ведьмаке, но главное что они есть и это не дает миру казаться безжизненным и неинтересным, как это бывает в некоторых играх. Также стоит акцентировать внимание на захватывающие морские сражения под песни экипажа для поднятия боевого духа и даже сюжет в игре оказался на мой взгляд неплохим.  
 
К сожалению есть и определенные недостатки в игре, за которые хочется ругаться на нее, такие как например плохая техническая составляющая. Для комфортной игры на ультра нужен действительно неслабый компьютер. Также существует и проблема с процессорами. На моем i7-8700k игра идет без проблем, что нельзя сказать про других игроков с другими процессорами, у которых игра просто отказывается работать. Возможно в дело вмешаются патчи, но об этом Юбисофту нужно было заботиться заблаговременно, а не изменять системные требования игры уже после релиза, дабы хоть как-то затереть это грязное пятно дешевым пятновыводителем. Помимо всего этого у игры есть явные проблемы с диалогами, которые на мой взгляд не продумали до конца, т.к некоторые фразы для ответа бывают абсолютно бесполезными и кажутся попросту лишними. Система прокачки также вызывает вопросы. Она попросту нелогична.  Есть имбовая "хилка", а есть некоторые, которые добавили просто для галочки. Можно было сделать и поинтереснее. Также очень странным является и тот факт, что игрок не может экипировать на себя доспех или оружие, которое имеет лвл как минимум на единицу выше, чем у персонажа. Глядя на это ты просто в гневе можешь задасться вопросом, " Блять, да какого хуя я не могу использовать этот доспех/оружие на персонаже, когда он у меня уже в инвентаре? Что за бредятина?".    

Можно при желании еще найти определенные недостатки, но в остальном Одиссея остается по прежнему одной из лучших частей в серии и той игрой, которая "съест" у вас как минимум сотню часов вашей жизни, погрузив вас в эпоху Античности. Французы развивают серию в верном направлении,  но до шедевральной RPG есть очень много, над чем еще нужно работать. Лучше Истоков? Определенно, Да. Ждем третье приключение в эпоху Античности, где, я надеюсь, разработчики сделают игру еще лучше, учтя проблемы предыдущей игры. 
8.5/10

Odyssey in allot of ways is several steps ahead of Origins, but somehow took more steps backwards.

The plot and story are tenfold better than Origins, even if they're strikingly similar - a family focused story and you oppose a mysterious organisation that are trying to kill you and you're family.

the ship gameplay is super lackluster and downright infuriating, despite Black Flag coming out 5 years ago Ubisoft has not been capable of getting it right since (expect the super short Rouge which is just a Black Flag expansion). Unlike Black Flag where your ship progressed powerfully alongside your character in this game its secondary, so you have no incentive to put any upgrades into it. And you would be an idiot to do so, every level you gain is way too significant a jump in damage and health and if you have no materials to upgrade your legendary weapons as you level you'll be at a massive disadvantage.

Because you put no active effort into your ship and a single level means a significant jump in difficutly it becomes unfair very, very quickly. You're ship will be ganked by groups of 3 or more pirates at every turn of the ocean and you will die very fast.

But all in all the ship gameplay is a very miniscule part of Odyssey and isn't what annoys me the most. The actual story grinds to a total halt once you reach level 13 for a short time. Then it REALLY grinds to a halt in the early 20's.

Their aren't enough story missions to get you to a high enough level to continue the story, once you finish a mission you'll find yourself grinding 3-4 levels to reach the new zone or start the next mission. It's the most insane thing I've ever witnessed in an Assassins Creed game before in its history.

And that's the catch - you literally have to pay money to get boosters to progress the story at a reasonable rate. My god. It can easily cost $20 to finish the story as it is told, otherwise head to grind town.

85小时应该有写评测的资格了...（要不是这是AC系列的话这游戏应该叫做“神话时代：奥德赛”）
  奥德赛果然是AC系列最被人低估的一代吧，由于我是从AC黑旗才开始了解的AC系列所以我对这类像是佣兵海盗战士之类的主角很是感兴趣，3代的康纳，4代的爱德华，枭雄的弗莱姐弟以及现在的斯巴达之王的后代，反倒是像是艾吉奥这样很有风度的倒不是很吸引我。（我们斯巴达人不玩刺杀这种阴的，我们是战士，就要上去跟人砍！）
  下面就说说优缺点：
优点
1.更加完善的RPG系统，结合之前几代的装备等级品质，这代加入了比起起源更加详细的武器数据（有的武器会有刺杀，战士以及猎人伤害加成）以及套装系统，有不同的套装会给你不同的加成，更是加入了类似附魔的铭刻系统，让你在装备的基础上使得战士，刺客，猎人更加分明。

2.由于此代更加完善的装备系统使得在剧情中你可以自由的选择是刺杀还是正面突击，技能树也是更加干净利落的三条独立的技能树，可以花“德拉克马”进行洗点，所以也不必担心技能点错，可以随时进行更换。玩家也可以装备八个技能，远程四个近程四个，技能消耗的则是起源过来的“肾上腺素”，相当于你的蓝条。更自由的技能搭配让你有了很多不同的玩法。

3.有趣以及重要的对话系统，看似不重要的对话是会影响你最终结局的。还有的角色对话会不经意间的跟你开车。。。

4.这代的正面冲突应该是最爽的一代了，搭配合适的装备以及技能能打出无双的感觉。（我就是从头正面冲突到结尾，看情况切装备刺杀，我打的是困难不是噩梦）

5.刺杀在本代显得更需要计划，穿上正确的装备带上正确的技能，削弱头目的周边防御，然后在晚上出去刺杀吧。（我才不会告诉你有一个技能点满了会增加你在夜晚的除战士以外的所有伤害）

6.引入了黑旗的海战系统，海战相比黑旗来说更难。

缺点
1.偶尔会有一些小BUG，碰到过一次BUG卡住了任务所以重新读了档，玩到现在只出现过一次闪退，但是总体来说不耽误体验可以忽略。

2.不知道为啥感觉这代的鹰眼就算是瞭望点开满了也没有起源开满了那么灵敏。

3.有的支线任务还是重复度过高，但是这个无所谓啦。我就是喜欢打架的感觉，所以我的支线任务没有一个潜入的。

小贴士
1.材料以升级船的属性为主，弓手投矛手以及生命值尽量最快升满。

2.装备不需要着急升级，角色等级越高越费材料，传奇套装更不需要着急，传奇套装在你凑齐一套的瞬间所有部件会自动提升至你目前角色的等级。装备跟等级走，尽量用跟角色等级相同的装备，前期不用在乎装备的品质。

3.前期神技斯巴达踢，但是这个技能到后期用处不大，因为好多人你都踢不动了，悬崖边上你也踢不下去，只能踢出一个小硬直。卸盾牌以及加血则是全程神技，绝对从头用到尾。

最后说一句：This is SPARTA！！！
Просто обалденнейшая игра!!! Графика, сюжет, геймплей, все на высшем уровне! Разрабы молодцы! Вообще, далеко не фанат серии assassin's, но, от этой игры за уши не оттащишь :D в общем, 10/10

因為當初起源改為沙盒式獲得一致好評
所以這次直接加入預訂玩玩看
可玩到現在覺得城鎮系統根本沒有當初宣傳的那麼優
還有很多的BUG
明明砍死平民其他人卻還能像沒事一樣走過去
而且劇情自由度也很低
可以說實在根本算不上沙盒

而每種任務又大同小異

也沒辦法確定加入雅典或斯巴達的某一方

自由度大探索的地圖更大更美很難相信是十幾年前的遊戲

好久沒有玩到會讓人感到讚嘆興奮的遊戲
大陸自詡為經濟的領頭羊說穿了仍然只會山寨
我真心希望遊戲創作能回到正軌

Assassin’s Creed Odyssey is the second opus happening in ancient history. You will be able to play as [b]Alexios[/b] or [b]Kassandra[/b] with for the very first time in the history of the franchise, the opportunity to decide your characters actions and fate through the troubled times of the Peloponnesian war and play a significant role in the fight for the domination of either Sparta or Athens.

Developed and published by [url=https://store.steampowered.com/search/?publisher=Ubisoft]Ubisoft[/url], Odyssey, with the marvelous environment, scenery, gameplay, and spotless mechanics sets an entirely new level for Assassin’s Creed and is probably one of the best RPG we got since the Witcher III.

[table]
[tr]
[th]+ Pros[/th]
[th] - Cons[/th][/tr]
[td]
Graphics
Story arclines 
Lots of content
Exploration
Complete immersion[/td]
[td]Camera issues
Collision issues
Can't easily switch skills[/td][/table]

9.5/10 
[h1]Life's necessity[/h1]


[h1] Let's connect [/h1]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/UNSKILLEDTRASH/discussions/1/3338745825892569393/] Twitch[/url] •[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/UNSKILLEDTRASH/discussions/1/3338745825892569393/] Discord[/url]  •[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33562948/] Reviews[/url]•[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/UNSKILLEDTRASH] Steam group[/url]•[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/UNSKILLEDTRASH/discussions/1/3338745825892568680//] Giveaways [/url]

[h1]Immersion & Questing[/h1]

Assassin’s Creed Odyssey is taking us through a war-torn Greece as a misthios, a man-for-hire, who is searching for answers (cue family drama) and adventures. Through multiple story arcs, each more interesting than the other is added a spectacular amount of side quests that are intricated somehow in the decisions you made.

Indeed, Odyssey emphasized dialogues and choices. Some of them can have a drastic impact on the story, others quest and how people react around you. Based on your previous decisions, NPCs are going to be referencing your previous actions and can potentially cut some quests from your storylines.

The results of this are two folds: with so many different endings and choices, there is a replayability value rarely seen in an Assassin’s Creed game and it all manages to intricate your actions into the different story arcs and create an incredibly immersive universe based around your vision of your character.

Overall, Odyssey is extremely rich in content. The integration of the side quests within the main story makes it so that you will want to do more of them! We calculated that a good 60 to 70 hours can be put in the game without finishing it. You will still have plenty of work to do.

[h1]Graphics & Exploration[/h1]

We played the game on Nightmare difficulty with exploration mode, the latter is a nice touch by Ubisoft because you must search for the objectives and use the skill set Ikaros, your eagle possesses to locate them and not just mindlessly go after them. These two elements together made it so that some fights and activities had to be planned in order not to die a stupid death.

Exploring the game in this beautiful reconstruction of ancient Greece unlocks little excerpts of the history behind buildings, characters and other historical elements in this country that breathe and bleeds history. A real plus for any history nerds.

Let’s also mention the fact that there are no loading times between the different maps, sea, mountains or anything at all. It’s a feat considering the graphics and the fact that Greece is exceptionally vast in this game.

Indeed, through exploration, you can easily witness how everything is wonderfully tied up together. Graphically, the game is terrific, with spectacular scenery and a great photo mode, mechanics are fluid, it is the kind of technical prowess that we would expect from Ubisoft.

The scenery is just utterly gorgeous from the open sea to the beautiful forests, islands, cities and their decorations, Odyssey is a treat for the eye. Animations are superb, you can easily sense how everyone feels about whatever they are saying and how they are feeling.

[h1]Gameplay & Combat[/h1]

The game is dependent to your level, you can’t just wander (you can) into a zone and expect to be just fine. A few level differences mean death most of the time. Leveling is fair, it will get slower the higher your level is, but I never felt like I had to grind for levels or anything. It all happened as I was playing.

Drawing inspirations from quite a few RPGs, the skill tree is built around your game style. You have the freedom to develop it the way you want to through three main choices: Hunter (ranged), Warrior (melee) and Assassin (stealth). You can most probably mix ‘em up as I did with a Warrior-Assassin build.

Your equipment needs to be carefully thought out and the same goes out for the bonus you are engraving within your weapons and armors. Also, fashion hunters: five pieces of equipment are going to change your in-game appearance.

Fighting in this game revolves around dodging and counter-attacking with light and heavy attacks (at least in nightmare difficulty). Mechanics are fluid, fights are challenging, but the biggest down part is that you are limited to 4 active skills from the three treelines available. This is extremely limiting, and I stopped counting the times I had to press start mid-fight to change the bounded skills to something that could be useful in this specific fight and adapt the strategy Alexios (or Kassandra) was doing to sometimes, survive. This specific issue was for me game-breaking, immersion-breaking and plain annoying.

Odyssey gives the player a vast array of choices as of which weapons they are going to use, axes, bows, daggers, maces, staves, spears and swords all have their pros and cons and are just different enough to be meaningful and give a different in-game experience.

Assassin’s Creed Odyssey is also bringing back naval fights and navigation from the depths of Black flag and Rogue. While not a lot of things changed besides making your ship upgradeable, is the fact that you can now have lieutenants on your ship that gives a passive bonus. While it is not innovative, it is the best Naval fights we’ve ever seen in an Assassin’s Creed.

Finally, a system of mercenaries very similar to what we can find in Shadow of War is proposed, based on the illegal actions you do throughout the game, your bounty will raise, said mercenaries will then hunt for you and try to kill you. Killing them instead, induce a fun leaderboard of mercenaries, that you can climb for rewards. This is entirely optional, you can ignore this and while it is just a plus to the game, it adds a great atmosphere around it, with more immersion and some more challenging fights.

There is also an entire pan of gameplay revolving around conquering a region. Just like Shadow of War once again, you will need to conquer or defend a plot of land for either Sparta or Athens by killing local leaders, pillaging and lowering the enemy presence in the area.

[h1]Very few bugs[/h1]

While everything in the game seems to be working flawlessly, the lock-on system can give you some trouble maneuvering the camera when fighting enemies in a small space. Finally, the game didn’t have a game breaking bug once during my run and for such a game it is quite incredible. Odyssey suffers from a lot of collision issues though.

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]

Odyssey’s world is by far the biggest, most gorgeous and with the most content of the franchise. It feels like Ubisoft took what was best in recent gaming, made it their own and delivered the best Assassin’s Creed of the franchise history. With marvelous environment, scenery, gameplay and spotless mechanics, Odyssey sets an entirely new level for Assassin’s Creed and is probably one of the best RPG we got since the Witcher III.

刺客信条到现在为止剧情上算是相当出色的一作了，说起源换皮的歇歇吧。
主要有几点不满 1.佐伊斯每这种卡关的bug过了一周都没修复是在搞什么？正常来说难道不应该是day0就hotfix掉吗？
2.装备升级系统极不合理，除了正常清图不应该有需要额外刷的材料，你总不能说我一地图的问号都清完了还差个好几千的皮毛才能升得起装备吧？
3.传奇防具强度过低，每件装备只有两条普通属性+1/5个传奇属性，然而等你传奇属性触发了铭刻也就解锁了，那我不如找个3条普通属性的装备再单独铭刻传奇属性。
4.敌人的属性成长对刺客风格的玩法在中期极度不友好，一个致命刺杀+英雄一击甚至可能都秒不掉一个队长，这个阶段打堡垒简直就是灾难，因为没秒掉导致大规模公开冲突导致赏金等级上升导致两个雇佣兵加入战斗，这样的话以刺客伤害为主要选择的装备几乎没的打。
5.部分剧情选择产生的效应非常长远而又无提示。关于主角家庭的选择显然处于重要地位，所有rpg玩家都会懂得留个心眼，这种的可以不算。但是从最开始的序列2里选择怎么杀死“贩夫”居然会直接影响到序列7里能否成功揭发伯罗奔尼撒联盟智者的身份就有点过度伏笔了吧？

Vorsichtige Kaufempfehlung.

[h1]Einleitung:[/h1]
Das man die Jahrezahlen in "vor unserer Zeit" angibt liegt daran das SJW auf twitter und Facebook dislikes geben und man Angst hat das Muslime das nicht spielen. psst... die nutzen auch den gregorianischen Kalender... Aber immerhin wurden wir informiert das das Spiel von unterschiedlichen Leuten unterschiedlicher Ethnien und Religionen gemacht wurde... Bitte liebe Developer, lernt das SJW keine Games kaufen, sondern nur auf Twitter laut sind. Gamer interessiert es einen Dreck welche Religion der Programmer hat, solange das Spiel gut ist.

Musste nur kurz dazu etwas loswerden. 

Was hier mit dem Intelsupport passiert ist eine Schande. Da ist nicht nur ein Patch fällig, der kommt, sondern auch kostenloses DLC. Die Systemvorraussetzungen wurden in einer Nacht und Nebel Aktion geändert. Das ist EA Level von bösartig. den Leuten die das Spiel schon als Preorder bezahlt haben sollte man etwas Geld zurückerstatten oder kostenloses DLC anbieten. 

[h1]Der Shop, die Editionen und die Preise:[/h1]
Microtransaction, die Seuche der AAA Spiele. es gibt eine Studentische Hilfskraft die unter allen negativen Reviews Marketing Textbausteine kopiert. Natürlich sind alle Editionen gerechtfertigt blah. Ist es nicht, das ist reines Marketing mehr nicht. Und ganz ehrlich, aufgrund der Bösartigkeit werde ich wenn überhaupt DLC nur im Sale kaufen. 

[h1]Das Spiel selber:[/H1]
Vorweg, ich bin total begeistert das Kassandra aussieht wie eine Amazone. Definierte Muskeln, und warum sie kämpfen kann wird erklärt. Dadurch wirkt der Charackter sehr glaubhaft. Sie ist keine Star Wars Ma-Rey-Sue die ohne training das stärkste Wesen in der galaxie ist nur aufgrund von Ovulation. Sehr gut gemacht, dickes plus. 

in den vier Stunden habe ich die Anfangsinsel erkundet und dabei viel Spaß gehabt. Auch wenn es ein (halb)fiktives Setting ist gefällt mir das Design und der Style unglaublich gut. Das Kampf ist flüssig und wenn man mal drin ist und die Moves kennt ist es ziemlich unterhaltsam.

Story ist eher nebensache bei Open World und AAA Teilen. ist zumindest nicht schlecht. Ob es in die Grundsätzliche Storyline von Assasins Creed passt ist mir egal. Die Story im Hintergrund war schon immer albern. Die Story ingame ist zumindest ok für mich. Das ist sehr subjektiv daher kann ich nicht für alle sprechen. 

Die Spielwelt reagiert auf einen. Ich habe, aus versehen, ein Kind getreten und eine alte Frau hat einen Besen geholt und mich angegriffen. Ich war so begeistert das ich alle am leben gelassen habe und einfach geflüchtet bin. Sowas ist toll und hilft in der Welt anzukommen. 

[h1]Technische Aspekte:[/h1]
Das spiel bietet eine menge Einstellungsmöglichkeiten. Was gut ist und auch leider notwendig. Die Performance ist mindestens fragwürdig. hier wird die Studentische Hilfskraft ebenfalls nicht müde um auf ein Dokument zu verinken. Ich erspare euch die Mühe und erkläre euch wie es einnigermaßen funktioniert.

Das Spiel kommt mit benchmark Test. bevor man anfängt sollte man diesen ausführen und dann mittels den Einstellungen finetuning machen. Zum Beispiel schattenqualität runtersetzen, Tiefe ect. Dann wieder den benchmark ausführen und solange wiederholen bis man auf mindestens 30FPS bleibt. Um 60 FPS zu erreichen braucht man einen Supercomputer. 

Hier sind meine Stats und ich spiele auf Qualität "Hoch" mit leichten Einschränkungen bei Details (Schatten, Wasser, Wolken):

Ich habe stabil 30FPS. Da sollte mehr gehen. Das liegt wohl an Marketing Entscheidungen, da die Programmierer oft mehr Zeit brauchen/wollen um Performance zu verbessern aber die Company will die leckeren moneys haben. Da unterscheidet sich die Gaming Industrie nicht von sonstigen Software Herstellern (habe viel mit ERP Systemen zu tun und kenne mich daher etwas aus)

Man braucht kein Fan der Reihe zu sein um das Spiel zu mögen, ein fan(boy) der Reihe wird sogar enttäuscht weil es keine (sonderlich überzeugende) Verbindung zu den vorherigen Teilen gibt.

Eine überzeugende offene welt mit guten Characktern, ok Story und schöner wenn auch Performance lastiger Grafik. Allerdings ist aufgrund der Bösartigkeit vorsicht geboten. Solange es keine öffentliche Entschuldigung gibt und es keine Kompensation gibt wegen des Intel Supports, über Nacht die Anforderungen zu ändern ist ein NO GO, dann nur die Standard Version kaufen. Solches Verhalten NICHT mit übermäßig viel Geld zu belohnen ist kontraproduktiv. Ich werde auch nicht den Ingame Shop nutzen. Es ist kein MMO.

Отличная игра с хорошим сюжетом и отличной составляющей, типа войн за доминированием, наемниками, культистами, морскими битвами (то, что не хватало другим AC). Прокачкой перса доволен, и да стоит потратить несколько часов, чтобы самому прокачаться. Одно пока не понятно зачем помогать Афинам или Спарте завоевывать территории - все равно они их рано или поздно сдают. Если был бы критиком поставил 9 из 10, конечно, исключая оптимизацию (есть некоторые баги и недочеты).

This game is BEAUTIFUL. The world, the character models (I love Greek period being a Rome Total War fan myself), the environment, the lighting and shadows, small details in animation, the crew singing on the boat. Acting is great. Combat animations and executions look fluid. 

But it's just a very pretty thing masking a very shallow, repetitive, and grindey game.

In short, this is why this game is shallow:
1. You have MAPHACK with the bird. Tracks everyone without an expiration timer. There's nothing in the story that explains why the bird gives you telepathy. Makes sneak playstyle TOO EASY

2. Enemies can be cheesed. NO ONE can catch you if you climb shit and GTFO. Literally 15 seconds later they'll forget about you, then you can go use your maphack to pick them off again

3. Combat is boring and RPG-like. It's all in parry timing and dodge timing, but not fun like Dark Souls because enemies are hit sponges. Strong attacks always result in you getting hit, so it's just button mashing the light attack. You have these abilities like in an MMORPG game like "spartan kick" or this weird dash thing 

4. The pacing is like that latest game of thrones season. The next destination can be reached in 20 seconds top by horse. Major plot developments occur in 5 minutes. If you've played GTA, that's an example of good story+story pacing. 

5. A little grindey - if you're under-leveled, you'll do like 2% damage per hit to enemies 2-3 levels higher than you. 

This game is good for relaxing after a long day of work or school. Hop on, do the next quest, admire the beautiful atmosphere. But don't expect anything challenging and fun like Dark Souls, and don't expect the story immersiveness of Witcher. VERY good game acting though.

Game feels like it's designed for Call of Duty players looking for a Dark Souls + Witcher experience that's extremely convenient - I stress the word convenient. If you accidentally fall off a high cliff, you're left with 1 hp. Everything seemed to have been designed to be as convenient as possible... except needing to grind or pay money to be able to level up.
Pleasantly surprised.

its up there with the likes of AC II, Black Flag, Origins
