Most of the complaints for this game have been due to bugs and questionable performance, apart from that however, this game is a must have. 

The game is beautiful, no question about that, although you may want to double check the requirements. Characters and story are fantastic, I love every interaction I can find on this absoloute monolith of a map. I've laughed out loud a few times and there are some cool easter eggs all over the game and I'm not even halfway finished yet.

But you don't want to hear about that, you want to know if the core gameplay is fun. And yes, yes it is. 

Combat and stealth have all been improved on since Origins, which was already pretty good. Controls are refined and polished to the point where I am no longer yelling at an imaginary assassin to get off a rock when I wanted them to run along a path.  Every time I make a mistake I know its my fault and not due to some iffy controls, which is rare from a traditional Assassin's Creed game.

And to those who say it's not an Assassin's Creed game, shame on you. You haven't even played the dame game! Story is more compelling than ever and this time I can actually sympathise more with the protagonist as I get to choose what they say now. 

My advice? Listen to all the reviewers when they say this is the best RPG open world game since the Witcher 3. It really is. I actually prefer this one...

TLDR: Just buy the game.

Without the microtransactions and really annoying in-game grind, I would consider this around Witcher 3 level (which is the only game I've given an 11/10). However, Ubisoft is full of greedy bastards who want to squeeze every cent of money out of their dwindling fanbase. They made purposely made this game really grindy just so they could add "xp boosts" for REAL LIFE MONEY to speed up the grinding process. It's pretty pathetic honestly. I paid $120 for the game, and I would still have to pay with more money for xp boosts if I want to skip the grind. I am honestly sick of games doing this, especially SINGLE PLAYER GAMES! THERE'S NOT EVEN ANY POINT!!!

Aside from that, this is still a VERY good game underneath those cons. Much better than Origins and probably the best AC game since Black Flag. Gameplay = good, combat = awesome, graphics = stunning, story = captivating. And naval battles are more fun than ever before. All in all great game, and I would have considered it even better had Ubisoft not added bullshit microtransactions.

8.7/10

个人感觉奥德赛是继刺客信条2后最优秀的一款佳作，它根据起源的基础上加入更多RPG元素，游戏内容更为丰富，更肝。加入了大量的选择对话，而你的选择会影响一整件事件甚至影响整个游戏结局，这使那些多周目强迫症玩家有了入坑的理由，让游戏的故事体验拥有了更高的自由度和完整性。 
  本作继承了黑旗的航海系统，所以地图面积和黑旗的面积差不多，但可探索区域比黑旗高出了不止几倍（黑旗很多地方都有空气墙，奥德赛是可以探索整个希腊世界包括水下），陆地面积更多。
  本作在起源的基础上加以改进和增加新东西。支线任务非常多（那种真正意义的支线任务），装备系统和断矛系统的增加，包括这一作等级压制非常厉害，敌人都比历代强很多虽然聋但不瞎了[spoiler]  我甚至被一只大野猪虐到怀疑人生  [/spoiler]，技能不好你甚至刺杀不了和你同等级的敌人，而面对多个同等级的敌人打斗起来更不容易，还有船只升级与佣兵阶级的加入，使得这游戏突然变得非常肝，全100%变得更难。而它还有史诗般的剧情与特色鲜明的角色，所以这代不存在内容空洞与剧情匮乏。
----PS----：玩着玩着就闪退的同学请把画面设置成无边框，打不开游戏的同学是N卡的话把显卡驱动换成411之前的版本就好了。
Although some game settings really annoyed me, the story itself's damn fun.

这游戏，是我买的游戏中第一个给差评的，，首先。言而无信。，上面图片说了10月2号能玩。不说凌晨0点就玩，中午下午也行。谁知道拖到3号零点。然后还把发售时间改了。改成6号，WHAT FUCK。  然后bug。。进去游戏上下黑边。没法调。。分辨率是1080p，而且也不是我一个人出现这个问题。  还有全屏模式崩溃。。。难受的一批。接下来。。这个问题没前面那么大，，有些时候刺杀判定有问题。至于那些说我咋没有这些问题的护主boy，那我想说每年出门被车撞死的那么多。你不是也没遇上。难道说你没遇见的等于没有？要不等你被撞死以后。咱们再说好么？

奥德赛相比起源，是全方位的进步。第一，战斗的流畅度和手感有了巨大提升，闪避动作更加自然流畅，另外溅血效果比起源好太多太多了。第二，刺杀动作真的帅到爆炸，比起源那个单调的单一刺杀动作不知道好了多少倍，尤其是终于又可以一边跑动一边刺杀了，爽到！第三，对话系统让整个游戏充满选择性，剧情依托于这一机制的加入，可以多向发展，同时具有深度，最典型的便是新手村的瘟疫任务，非常令人感慨，在这一点上，阿育做得非常好。第四，海战系统很不错，享受在海上沐浴阳光的感觉吧！
当然，缺点也有，最明显的就是优化啊！！！现在一进城就卡的要死，野外倒没什么问题就是偶尔掉帧，希望之后的更新赶紧吧优化搞上来吧！

오디세이 로고 나오는 부분 까지만 해보고 적는다.
사람들 반응이 오리진때랑 많이 다르길래 오리진에서 엄청 많이 달라진줄 알았다.
하지만 그정도로 달라지진 않았고 오리진에 요소들을 더 정리 했다는 느낌이다.
제일 많이 달라진건 전투 시스템인데 적이 때려도 경직을 안받고 반격하는 타이밍이 있다
무적타이밍도 추가 되었다. 그런데 여기다가 난 2방만 맞으면 죽는다. 첨 만나는 돌주먹은 
안세 봤지만 한 백방은 때린듯 하다. 난 2방 적은 백방 맞아야 죽는다. 엄청난 차이다.
돌주먹 잡을때까지는 차이를 꼭 이렇게 까지 두어야 했었나 생각이 들었다. 
하지만 스킬이 점점 쌓이고 전투에 적응이 되니까 그 이후로는 생각보다 금방 전투가 끝난다.
전투가 오래 걸리니까 쎈놈들은 일단 암살스킬을 쓰고 시작하는게 좋다. 
스트리머들은 고생 엄청 하면서 전투를 하는것 같은데 있는퀘 다하고 무기 좋은거 들면 
쉽게쉽게 전투를 이길수 있다. 퀘스트 건너 뛰고 그러니 레벨 모자르고 그래서 전투가 힘들어진다.
이겜은 오리진에서도 그랬는데 1렙 무시 못한다. 
아 그리고 내가 적을 때리려고 칼을 휘두르면 그냥 지나가는 놈이 맞고 날 때린다.
지나가던 닭도 맞고 날 때린다. 닭도 레벨이 높더라 닭 무시 못한다.
적에게 포인트 찍을땐 NPC는 그냥좀 넘어갔으면 좋겠다. 

오리진때 전투가 쉬우니 약간 질린다는 느낌을 받았는데 이번작에서 전투 난이도를 대폭 상향했다. 
오리진보다 많이 달라졌다고 생각하진 않는다.  하지만 역시 작은 차이가 명품을 만든다.

steam版解锁晚于U版超过24小时(重点超过，U版应该是10.1晚上8点解锁)，一开始发售时间为10.5在10.2早临时更改为10.6发售，而且我作为中国玩家，没有在任何我方便的地方看到公告，微博，育碧中国的网站，甚至是奥德赛的讨论，新闻这些地方没有看到任何公告steam延后发售。
作为购买终极版的玩家来说，我10.1晚上一直等到10.2早才发现育碧已经悄悄改了发售时间，这时候我才恍然大悟，之前还觉得可能是按太平洋时间算，要下午3点才解锁，结果，呵呵。。。
自家平台给福利，优先解锁我可以理解，但是你不应该欺骗消费者，预购的时候写好10.5发售10.2终极版抢先游玩，到了10.2不解锁，而且悄悄改发售时间。不过育碧倒是不傻，不写明按照什么时间，呵呵。。。
游戏是好游戏，但是这次的预购体验太差，我想要给差评。
我的差评仅为我的预购体验评测，想要玩的可以购买。

I really wish I could reccomend this game. Its a solid sandbox with a likeable protagonist and some really gorgeous scenery... but the microtransactions are so utterly shameless, disgusting and unnecessary that I just can't. They really are revoliting, pages and pages of additional purchases in a product that they're happily selling for up to $120. Now, if it were a cosmetic or two I might not be so irritated, but its in game items and xp boosters, and I in no way believe that they haven't balanced the game to pressure the audience into making those purchases.

Ubisoft is not the worst company in gaming, but they're still scumming.

对不起，作为一个购买并游玩了历代刺客信条的育碧老粉，对于这款我毫不犹豫预购了终极版的奥德赛，我得给差评。
原因无他，作为一个本应3号就能玩到的终极版玩家，我到现在连游戏的主界面都进不去。
而这一切仅仅是因为我的CPU缺少AVX指令集，这甚至没有出现在该游戏的推荐配置栏目里。
更让人恼火的是，截止目前标准版也解锁，育碧依然没有针对此类玩家发表任何意见。
如果你不更新解决这个问题的补丁，我想我还是会选择去花上一笔说多不多说少不少的钱，换一块有AVX指令集的CPU来玩上奥德赛。但是，这个差评我并不会撤，道理很简单，我的配置足够高特效40帧畅玩上一作的起源，却连这一作奥德赛的主界面都见不到，这个与电脑性能几乎无多大关联的缺少AVX指令集的锅，绝不应该由玩家来背。

还有奥德赛版EZIO FAMILY真好听~现在都快成刺客信条系列主题曲了！

【预购感言】-长篇大论的废腐之言，建议跳过

首先说一下游戏整体的初步体验，原谅我词穷，只能说在好评与差评之间，对于本作初步印象分在7/10附近。即好评。可以说，对比其前作而言，本作可以说把我惊艳到了。而前作由于操作原因则是把我惊吓到了。

出现这个分数的原因，大部分是个人对于前作“起源”的不满延续下来的，最主要的扣分点还是在于动作操作上。当然，前作起源对于动作系统和角色扮演系统上的体验对我个人而言从头到尾一直无法适应，因此通关了阿育版本后steam版本迟迟没能二次通关，可能也陷入了厌倦状态，就直接放弃了，然后留了个差评在steam上。而本作，我是明知阿育的心思已经敲定了要把系列改革做成RPG一般的动作游戏，所以这会儿我也不跟他们一般见识了，就当买了个AC3重置版吧！抱着这样的心态入手了Steam平台上的这款游戏（PLAY U  U PLAY平台的不再信仰。 钱包见底了），可能是已经逐渐习惯了还是根本不抱希望的原因，这作反而让我感到了舒适与怀念，没有太高的期望，就没有太大的失望。平心而论，从起源这部彻底改革的作品开始，质量都可以说是上乘的，只是我个人想要其实从大革命时期我就看出来阿育心思了，可是在起源那的大刀阔斧那么一改，瞬间把我想用以前的操作系统游玩沙盒的梦给打了个粉碎。我好恨呐~~~~~

好吧，以上不知道算哪门子的预购感言，说真的，本作处于保险起见，我入手了黄金版本，虽然只是差了50+，但是这50+比起信仰充值，我决定还是拿去购买其他游戏要比附赠的什么外观什么武器点数要好得多，我不忠诚！我不忠诚！（发出了谢伊‧帕特里克‧寇马可的声音）

总之个人觉得终极版是不值得，除非是育碧商城的其它版本，但是我没有了解所以不作讨论。反正黄金版入手，机票，盲王任务，船员外观，提前游玩，坐等AC3重置版，完事儿。

顺便一提，船员的船歌声线是随外观改变的呐！www

还有标题音乐突然间听到EZIO FAMILY的奥德赛版本我能不给好评么！？阿育你真懂我！

【游戏体验】

1-系统设置

1.1-按键设置-说道这方面，按键问题不得不说，这个是首要问题，当然，这次的按键设计对比上一作有所简化，至少第一观感上是这样的，各位可以参考一下我个人的一个按键设置，做好以下心理准备。具体项目影响还请各位进入游戏后自行体会。至少上一作会出现一大堆莫名其妙的红色以及绑定按键，在本作已经得到了玩去的自定义支持，这样能让玩家更有效的根据自身的操作习惯于需求，进行设置。换句话说，便是更人性化了。

1.2-游戏难度-如果你喜欢受苦的话，你可以选择噩梦，怎么说呢，过高的难度容易影响刺杀体验，请各位自行理解便好，总之我是老老实实玩普通了，有了上一作的经验我才不想受苦呐！

1.3-游戏模式-说真的，强烈安利探索模式，探索一个地点发现一个任务，要比全程指定跟着走的要有代入感，总要比看任务栏里一堆待办事项要来的舒服，也有一点探索与发现的乐趣。至于有玩家可能觉得浪费时间，请容我吐槽一句：那你玩游戏干嘛。


2-动作系统及能力系统

2.1-移动操作-上下攀爬有点呆滞，攀爬位置与个人所设想位置有误。甚至有时候会莫名其妙地跳落。当然，这种情况我承认是我自己的操作失误，但同时也是因为攀爬键位被简化的原因，从前作开始我就攀爬改动比较不满意，甚至单独出来两个攀爬键的时候我个人也花了不少时间去习惯。当然，本作的攀爬系统是延续起源的，如果有起源玩家比较适应这样的操作，这个问题并不会困扰到你们。

请各位玩家注意，本作的人物移动静止后会有后退或前进一下帧，是属于模型动作导致的现象，影响不大，对我个人而言还是有点别扭。只不过这个问题和上述的攀爬问题都属于老毛病系列。

2.2-有一个问题是不可忽视的，目标锁定-这次目标锁定判定非常迷，无锁定状态下你的攻击偶尔会打在反方向，即你按着前进键并且人物向前，但是你的未固定瞄准点（非固定状态下会出现一个小黄点在敌人身上，指你的人物目前以该对象为互动目标，一般状态下自动选择最近距离目标）在你身后的小兵，那就出事了；好不容易你固定了目标开始揍人，但是切换目标又需要另外的一组按键（默认滚轮上下，设计师给我出来！）虽然锁定功能的精准得到了加强，但是非锁定状态却显得生硬，该系统直接导致无锁定状态下出现人物攻击方向与移动方向不符的情况，请各位玩家注意。

2.3-防御/闪避这两操作并没有太大的问题，重攻击依旧是组合键，而这次的作战技能，变成了技能搭配，人物将会有4个近战技能+4个远程技能的槽位，至于技能嘛就像WARFRAME那样默认是1/2/3/4，倒也没什么大问题，主要还是部分指定技能和锁定搭配受到上述问题的影响导致战斗体验不佳；另外，技能槽上放什么技能如何组合操作主要视玩家能力树怎么点，怎么点就怎么用，感觉某个技能不顺手？那就洗点吧！由于游戏关卡复杂多变，偶尔潜入偶尔刺杀偶尔又要打仗，因此阿育贴心准备了随时重置能力的功能在技能数页面上，这意味着你没被发现的时候随时远程随时暗杀，被发现了又跑不掉？重置技能直接战士然后无双你的敌人吧！！虽然麻烦得我不得不吐槽“既然你都有重置功能了你干嘛不多弄两个天赋页战斗中随时切换呢！？”在这个系统上我已经看到了阿育把刺客信条的IP搞成RPG的决心了，当然，既然说到角色扮演，当然不仅仅是技能定制的程度，不少的游戏元素也体现出阿育的决心。

另外，本作的被动技能升级全由角色等级和地图探索决定，信仰之跃也是被动之一。

二阶信仰之跃技能效果能让杰洛克哭死在悬崖缝里。还真的是向巫师致敬啊！巫师4-奥德赛？

3-装备与等级-说完技能，自然会联想到影响点数的等级，说到等级，熟悉前作的玩家肯定又会想到装备等级限定，这块儿就干脆一起聊吧。

3.1-装备，等级不足，自然无法装备，废腐之言。然后，随着进程深入，你得到了一把传说级别的装备，等级却低，没关系！花点材料去铁匠铺升级，传说级别的武器自然白值也会比低质量武器要来的更高一些。铭刻系统，即你可以为你的武器定制一条特殊字段，比如加暴击加爆伤的。这方面玩家们各自摸索便好，字段自然是影响玩家游玩风格，建议保留两套装备，一套战场用一套暗杀用，所以说育碧你这么麻烦还不是因为部分技能是使用条件限定的问题吗！？就不能一键切换？反正也没限制更换时机，这方面果然还是不大方便啊。

3.2-等级，除去装备的影响，等级是个很关键的问题，本作相差3级以上战斗难度激增（我是指普通难度）相差五级就是骷髅头了，换而言之，前作的等级限制依旧存在，甚至由于航海系统回归可以说是变本加厉地限制了行动自由（你不会想被高你四五个等级的佣兵船追杀的）所以，想自由探索，先把附近的任务做完了再说吧，一如既往的变相限制章节行动。

4-物资材料

4.1-物资收集-在本作难度不算太高，装备建议没用的全拆，资金够用就好了，卖武器并不能比当海盗高出多少。由于你是佣兵，因此基本上全程无阵营状态，见谁抢谁随便你，做好应对佣兵团的追杀便好。至于你喜欢历史上的斯巴达还是雅典军团，不想抢劫友方什么的，你都可以给自己加戏，当然，如果你不小心碰到了军团战舰，那么祝你好好体验一下友军之围吧！

4.2-稀有资源-物资方面也没什么可以说的，这个算是顺便一提，流浪商人会收取一种特殊的金属石头作为开箱子用的物资，因此想靠刷钱开箱子的前作玩家请放弃思考老老实实刷刷刷就好了。掉落来源可能是追杀的佣兵，墓穴里的宝箱，或者是限时赏金任务。

5-对话系统及世界系统-说到致敬巫师，而且还划分到角色扮演的大类中，肯定不仅仅是装备驱动，本作的对话系统将会影响部分事件最终的结局，甚至会导致世界环境的变化。另外，和巫师一样，如果你在某个时间段错过了某个势力级别的任务，诸如雅典人让你击杀斯巴达军人等，将会由于征服导致的势力变动而导致任务自动取消这种程度，剩下的，留个各位玩家自行探索便好。



6-战争势力变动与佣兵系统

6.1-势力-地图右下角会显示该区域的势力，而势力则会影响上述的颁发的任务，以及各种守备状态等等，想要根除一个势力，可以通过完成地图上的驻扎地点任务（刺杀，搜刮物资，烧毁资源等）来削弱影响力，最终刺杀领袖

6.2-战场-当区域势力影响力减弱后，会导致敌对阵营的入侵，此时，选择防御或者进攻方将能获取相应奖励，这方面请各位玩家游戏中自行体验即可，总之难度越高奖励也是越高。如果有玩过魔多的最新作战争之影，那么我可以告诉你们这就是刺客信条版本的简化版征服模式，没有摩多那么多复杂的战斗阶段，挑重要目标砍就是了。

6.3-势力变动-战场的结果将导致势力的变更，势力变更后会出现新的领袖，如果想要更换势力可以重复以上步骤即可。可以用于刷物资和武器。另外，部分悬赏任务会由于变动势力而强制取消，请注意。
6.4-佣兵

前前后后好几次提到佣兵，那佣兵到底是什么呢？佣兵的身份在这个世界中与主角可以说密切相关。佣兵系统如下图所示，榜单上存在的佣兵可能会对你造成一定的威胁，击败后你可以取代其地位，通过提升自身地位可以获得相应的回报与加成。
佣兵对你造成的威胁大部分来自于赏金，如果有佣兵接受了赏金，则会对你穷追不舍。赏金等级分为五段，等级越高，承接契约并追杀你的佣兵会更多且更强，如果你足够强大，完全可以一口气吞掉他们以获得更多的奖励和资源。
PS

6.1-1：领袖大部分都有非常好的船员适性，用你的伊卡洛斯（宠物鹰）观察后从右上角的信息取得判断，看到有合适的就想办法削弱血量并用击倒来进行招募吧！别直接杀了！
6.4-1：想要消除佣兵赏金有两种方式，其一，地图右下角会提醒你支付赏金来减少警戒等级；其二，通过寻找地图上的赏金发起人如下图所示，直接贿赂或击杀来大幅度减少通缉。

6.4-2：佣兵在悬赏期间可能会乱入战场对你造成直接威胁，提升战斗难度，请开战前根据各位玩家自身的需求决定是否解决完赏金问题再进入战场。当然，低难度或者对技术自信的玩家自然无视便好。

7-海战系统体验

7.1-海战-一如既往的有趣，本作中海战极其有代入感！船体设计没有舵（废话+1）用指挥台作为发号施令，复古的人力划桨，炮弹被弓箭手替代，霰弹被标枪替代，然后能上火油增加杀伤力，没了，海战还是那一套，摧毁对手军舰，登船/进一步摧毁-搜刮物资。但是却提高了观赏性，非常浪漫。

7.2-奖励-资源奖励极其丰厚，你缺什么材料，去海上抢是最实际的玩法，尤其是军舰，100%一个大箱子，大军舰x2，佣兵舰x3，奖励丰厚，刷资源最佳去处，而且本身海战系统很容易吸引玩家花费大量时间去体验，因此本作刷物资各位不会感到太过无聊了。

7.3-观赏性-加入了船战攻击处决动画，没啥用，看着爽快；还有就是7.1提到的那些元素，复古而浪漫，让我游玩体验极其舒适。

PS-1：登船后默认为冲突状态，此时刺客流玩家可以躲在指挥台背面，等到判断为非冲突状态后再使用刺杀技能突入，有效针对佣兵船只的追杀。

PS-2：佣兵船实在太高级的情况下，登船，然后随意搞两下，跑回来，放弃登船，回头一头扎进去摧毁，不知道是不是BUG，有时候可以捡到宝箱。

8-更多的细节探索与更开放的世界

水面碰撞面积更加明显，可以通过下图镜头的远近距离看出海水托起角色身体时明显的浮动变化。
鲨鱼也有碰撞面积，包括海面的尸体也是，甚至是船只碎裂后掉落的货物你可能会被漂浮在海面的物体挡住你导致无法及时出水呼吸。
沉船更不用说，自然是带有碰撞体积的，这会儿沉船不再是直接把人摔下去了，而是还能在未沉默的部分行走，并且残骸会以不同状态逐渐沉入海底，在你探索期间会保留一段时间后才会消失。

火把的互动有前作经验的玩家其实大部分都知道的，靠近墓穴的火炬台人物会主动拿手中火炬去点亮它；本作中需要摧毁的物资箱也可以用火把一棍子下去烧掉；以及火把在人物手中蜻蜓点水般碰一下水面也会导致其熄灭。当然，火把落到地上照明效果依旧www

【BUG清单】

1-千万不要作死在海上跳到资源箱上，如果刚好跳上去时箱子在侧翻状态，会导致你人物卡死并且一段时间后失去同步。

2-待补充



【体验总结】

1-24h体验，没有太大问题的恶性BUG，也就被地形卡死过一两次。

2-角色扮演系统好评，阿育终于放弃了思考把刺客信条做成了RPG。

3-各种细节好评，提升了代入感。

4-就当能爬墙的巫师玩吧，不要太过执着于刺客信条的IP了。

5-总之本作我个人已经习惯这个系统了，由于海战回归，所以绝对推荐。

以上，如有错漏或疑问，欢迎留言指出和讨论。

上一次玩這系列已經是黑旗，這次新作品打擊感十足，探索也不覺得無聊

始まりの島を出て海を渡り、ギリシア半島で主人公の父親と再会したのでレビューします。


良い点

　世界が美しい。（地中海だから前作の使いまわしも多そう）

　主人公に選択権がある。（気絶させると暗殺対象の敵の指導者も勧誘できた）

　主人公側の登場人物が明るい性格が多い。（深刻すぎてもね、オリジンのあやおばさんは死ね）

　傭兵に命を狙われるのは主人公の犯罪レベルが上がってから。（お金で下げられる）



悪い点

　詰め込みすぎ。
　（狼が多すぎて民家を襲撃してるし、移動中は鬱陶しいぐらい）
　（敵対勢力のスパルタ軍、アテナイ軍、盗賊、野生動物が目と鼻の先で散歩したり、野営してる）

　明るいところから暗い所に入ると目がなれないので真っ黒。

　軍同士の戦闘は戦術や隊列もくそもなく、近くの敵をぶん殴るだけ。（total warとは違う、近所の公園ぐらいの広さ）

　補給物資をたいまつで燃やすときは慎重にしないと自分も火だるまになる。

　レベル補正が厳しい。
　　（刃物や鈍器で何十回も攻撃を当てないと死なない雑魚）
　　（主人公のほうがレベルが高かったのでレベルの高い雑魚より弱いストリー上印象深いボス）
　　（せっかくレベルを上げたのに敵のレベルも上がるシステム）



個人的感想

　無理やりギリシア全域をオープンワールドに封じ込めたのでスケールダウン感がすごい。

　基本的に人間と野生動物しかいないので戦闘は単調であきる。（ファンタジー化してほしい）

　アサシンクリードシリーズは侵入と暗殺の繰り返しであきる。

　イージーモードが一番バランスが取れてると思う。

　UBIのゲームはPCの熱がすごい。（i7-8700k gtx1080ti x2）
　　（ふたを開けて直接扇風機を当てている。夏には怖くて動かせない）
　　（前作はベンチマークで性能を段階評価してくれたが、今回は数値だけになった）



最後にバグ報告
　海上で船の操船チュートリアルクエスト終了→その場でセーブロード→海賊船数隻に囲まれててフルボッコ。

　島で船の副官拉致チュートリアルクエストで何回もロードを繰り返したら、拉致ボタンが反応しない。
　　（副官が振り向いて戦闘モード→殺す→副官拉致に失敗しましたとの報告）

PSA: If you don't already know, make sure that the game is on the same drive as steam and uplay to work.

游戏绝对是好游戏，想买的不用犹豫。但是，说好的5号发售，黄金以上版本2号可玩，结果我们steam玩家就比全球多等了一天，天知道那一天怎么过的，起床等12点，12点等晚八点，一直到夜里0点。我这人很简单，你欺骗我，把做不到的事情拿出来宣传，耍我们消费者的猴，我就给你差评！

好多人说现在的刺客信条已经变味了，成了狂战士信条，这个系列已经毁了，已经死了。哇，云玩家是真的可怕，全靠一张嘴指点江山。我可以明确的说，这个系列发展了近十年走到现在，不转型才是真的死了好吧！就像艾吉奥三部曲虽然经典，但里面蹩脚的操作系统和战斗方式要是还放到现在的游戏里不知要被多少人喷死。真的不知道高贵的云玩家眼中的刺客信条应该是什么样子，你不喜欢那只是你不喜欢而已，并不是说这游戏就从此毁了。
而奥德赛，不吹不黑，这可能应该是有史以来最棒的一部刺客信条，从可玩性，剧情，战斗手感，各方面来说都是。那么又有人说了，这游戏各方面都是仿的，任务系统仿巫师，战斗系统仿黑魂，征服战系统又是类似中土世界，可是，这又何尝不可呢？至少证明了育碧努力和学习的决心。向他人请教学习不可耻，故步自封才是真正的可悲。如果说起源是这个系列走向RPG化的一次摸底试水，那么奥德赛就是育碧在游戏玩法系统成熟后在本世代交出的终极答卷，并不是网上云玩家们看看演示视频就得出结论所说的“起源大型dlc”。

闪退！！！黄金版提前三天玩，到正式版出了我还没玩上。

关键是黄金版先玩也是一个卖点，不然为什么我买黄金版？结果连普通版都不如，真是服了！！

我配置也没问题，驱动更新换了4次，也升级过411，也回退过388，游戏完整性我也验证了，游戏我也重新下载了，就连WIN10系统我也重启了。

4天了，就连正式版都发售了，我都还是进不去，育碧你既然要卖黄金版先玩的噱头，就应该把这些问题解决好，不然真的是招人黑。

而且这次闪退或者连游戏都进不去的玩家真的是超级多，就跟起源一样垃圾，起源一个女主角的主线BUG卡了我几个月，游戏根本都进行不下去了，直接弃坑了，育碧你好好想想怎么办吧。这个差评我给定了！！！

这是我第一次玩刺客信条系列游戏。玩了8个多小时 ，刚刚走出新手村2333，但是在这8个小时的体验中，剧情与画面绝对很赞，尤其是在人物对话中，不同的抉择决定了不同的剧情走向。有时候在你抉择之后，顺着剧情发展。突然之间回头发现，我擦。还可以这么玩。剧情也可以这么发展。也许这就是多结局的好处。
如果你用心看每个人的对话，这是一个很好了解古希腊风土人情的一部游戏，并且游戏的画质没得说。当你咱在雕像最上方俯视的时候。画面绝对很赞。
不要跳过对话，用心观看，你会发现游戏中每一个人物不单单是一个NPC  他们也有自己的故事。每一个人物都有自己的往事。用心去玩。


注：这是一篇不专业的评论   233333

我想说的是，一款单机游戏，又不是竞技类游戏需要你不断磨炼熟练度，也不像WoW那种MMORPG一样需要你争分夺秒、上班打卡一样的刷刷刷来在同一时期同一版本拉开自己和别的所谓“休闲”、“低端”玩家之间的差距。这篇测评明显主观色彩过于浓厚！我觉得肝不肝对于一款单机3A作品来说完全取决于玩家自己对于游戏的态度和理解。的确同质化严重，体量过大是育碧罐头式沙盒的一个弱项。测平完全可以把这个作为此游戏不好玩的因素之一。但你可以不用一天7 、8个小时的时间都耗在一个游戏里面吧？可能测平人只是单纯的为了玩游戏而玩游戏，这毕竟是份工作。但是如果你只是为了完成游戏，体验最后结局而去玩一个游戏，那么设计再好的游戏，内涵再丰富的游戏到了手里都会变的毫无意义。 我承认我刺客信条系列接触的晚也比较少，只认真玩过起源，大革命实在是因为优化太差而中途放弃。这个系列让我折服的原因是它结合史诗的严谨性和环境刻画的真实性。很少有一款游戏能让我边玩边百度查当地历史史时、文化传说和宗教信仰的。起源让我知道了埃及艳后和凯撒的传奇，亚历山大大帝的丰功伟绩，罗马“前三头同盟”和“后三头同盟”的来龙去脉，埃及神话传说中“拉”、“阿蒙”、“阿努比斯”、“欧西里斯”等神的作用和象征......... 其他游戏很难勾起我主动学习的“欲望” 可能我比较喜欢游戏能带给我精神上的充足感与丰富感。对于游戏动作是否劲爆，操作流程是否流畅是排第二的，第一应当是玩完之后这款游戏能在我心中留下的。《刺客信条：奥德赛》不说别的，光是伯罗奔尼撒战争的刻画就相当让人有代入感。起源里能够帮助“维特鲁威”大建筑师找零件，奥德赛里能和大思想家苏格拉底探讨哲学，和伯利克里挥斥方遒。这可能是我这个比较奇葩的人比较在意游戏的一些内核元素，所以不喜欢我的评论的还请大家见谅～

今天刚刚解锁 ，可以确定会补上季票了 。作为一个刺客信条的老玩家 ， 前几作都是在主机上玩的 。 这次的奥德赛惊艳到了我！
本来对奥德赛没有报太大期望， 预告里看上去和 起源 类似的UI和战斗系统 ，公式化的开放世界，  实在是让人提不起胃口。抱着随便玩玩的心态打开游戏，结果序章里 斯巴达三百勇士的场景就吸引到了我。其实这一作的RPG化我觉得是成功的，我再也不用因为剧情而杀死我不想杀死的人，而是多了更多的选择。场景里的路人不在只是无聊的布景，而是让你能感觉到的活生生的人。 游玩时间还不长，看后续吧。

Que jogo senhores, que jogo!

A Ubisoft reuniu todos os seus recursos de jogos em um, fora a pegada de rpg voltada a diálogo como The Witcher 3, porém achei muito mais superior. 

O jogo tem uma história incrível e vale cada segundo navegar pelo mar.

Eu já fechei um dos finais e já estou para começar um novo save com novo personagem, só de ter batalhas nesse jogo tanto no mar quanto na terra, já garante boas horas de diversão. 

Joguei o jogo diretão e mesmo ter terminado a história, eu não abri nem 30% do mapa, logo da para ter uma ideia do tamanho do mesmo. 

Comprem e se divirtam, porque estamos diante do melhor jogo de 2018, na minha singela opinião..

Early Review (22.6 hrs on record, 06 Oct 2018)
This iteration of AC is amazing. Direction towards RPG is good, but still not in the level of Witcher 3, though the branching dialogue and gear and skill customization are very much welcome. Losing the shield in exchange for active parrying and dodging makes combat more alive than ever. Environment, as usual is captivating. Mercenaries are welcome improvement over the Phylakes system of Origins, but needs more tweaks.

Performance is almost the same with Origins, dropping a bit below 30fps but still very playable.

P.S.
Dynamic weather system adds more beauty to this game. Looks even better if you experienced storm while at sea.
Microtransactions are not required. You will only need it if you do not have enough time to play this huge game, or too impatient and want to uncover that region blocked by level wall.

So many reviews in the negative in regards to performance.

I have a 1070 ASUS STRIX and an i7 5820k, I also run a HEAVY reshade from Origins on top of it and I run a smooth / locked 50 fps (I can't play without the reshade, I'm a total GFX wh*re).

The game is nothing short of amazing, I thought Origins was great but this one takes the cake thus far, I don't even feel like I've got started, the scope and size of this world is insane. The combat is expanded on from Origins and is hella fresh, very visually pleasing and gratifying. Choice of Dialogue for hardcore oldschool RPG fans and the exploration game mode is 10/10, bringing back an old gem.

To those moaning about performance, you're trying to run (to date) one of the most demanding / best looking AAA titles that's in a GIANT open world sandbox, making bad reviews when it's not actually the fault of the game but rather yours as  a consumer expecting your less than stellar rig to make magic happen. I stated my specs above, I do not have an enthusiast build and I run a heavy reshade, without the reshade I lock at 60 fps and never dip below fully maxed out.

If you want to PC game, tweak your settings if your PC is trash, have a marginly decent PC or go and join the Console noobs and play 30fps.

Realmente o jogo não tem muito haver com assassin's creed. Por vezes eu esqueço que estou jogando um jogo dessa franquia quando fico imerso no game. Apesar disso, o jogo é extremamente bom e, mesmo sendo completamente diferente pelas mecânicas em si e pelo credo não estar presente no jogo (sim, não existem assassinos), o jogo é extremamente bom, tanto graficamente, quanto no áudio, história e jogabilidade. A dublagem também voltou a ser caprichada como era do Rogue até o Syndicate. O sistema de RPG e combate foram aprimorados desde o Origins e ficou muito bom! Eu arriscaria dizer que foi o jogo que mais está me prendendo com o seu carisma desde a saga Ezio. Não me arrependo de ter comprado em pre-order, valeu super a pena. Recomendo muito!

Esse Assassin's Creed: Odyssey está muito bom, tão bom quanto o Origins, eu posso dizer isso por que estou jogando desde o dia 2 quando liberou, porem a otimização está um pouco pesada, estou praticamente jogando o jogo no low de 60 fps com quedas para 28, chegou na cidade então? Deitei, cai para 25 fps, está tudo no baixo, menos a textura que está no médio e não tenho um PC tão ruim, FX-8350, 8GB, EVGA GTX 960 4GB SSC. Sendo que o Origins roda no alto 45~55 fps, e uso a resolução UltraWide "2560x1080" que a propósito, obrigado Ubisoft por colocar suporte nessa resolução. História do jogo está boa, esse jogo vai me render horas de gameplay e não estou nenhum pouco apressado para chegar no final. Quero aproveitar o máximo dele, pois quando lançou o Origins, tive que fazer outro save por que nem aproveitei ele, estava com 65 horas de AC Origins e já tinha o platinado no Steam e feito tudo no jogo. Em Odyssey, chego no mapa, abro todos os (?) e limpo a area, ai vou fazer a missões segundarias e posteriormente as primarias. Tem missões infinitas (temporárias) isso mantem o jogo vivo e por algumas ser repetitivas, não deixa de ser legal. Tem missão de conquista, você derruba o poder de certa facção local e inicia um certo "Battle Hoyale" por assim dizer, que é muito bom, ganha itens bons até e tudo mais, é legal de ser fazer, ainda mais se você segue o estilo mercenário(a), ajuda Esparta, ajude Atenas, não importa quem tome no ***, quem sai ganhando é sempre você não é? Hahahaha. Esse não, esse Assassin's além de estar interessante, tem um mundo muito vivo e repleto de novidades. Animais, lugares interessantes entre outros, tem lugares submersos, bem legal de explorar se não vier um tubarão nível alto te encher o saco, da raiva na floresta, estava pegando minérios (já comento sobre isso) e me aparece um grupo de 7 javalis me atacando, nem preciso falar que morri né? E as galinhas então? No começo do jogo estava atrás de um enigma e um grupo de 5 ou 6 galinhas me atacou do nada, morri. HUEUEHUHEUH Não tive nem chance e também posterior mente passei dor de cabeça em uma missão de caça, tinha que caçar um javali gigante, bagulho não era desse mundo, sabe aquela tia gorda, que parece um mamute? Era esse javali e ainda gritava chamando os filhos para te atropelar e ficar roçando focinho em você, essa missão libera level 13, faça no level 15 ok?  sofri no nível 13. UEHUEHUHEUHU, depois que caçei eles fiz aquele churrasco. O jogo precisa de loots, matériais para você melhorar armaduras para seu level e armas, assim como Origins, porém no Odyssey está mais fácil de achar, pelo mapa você acha ferro, madeira e entre outros. O combate por ser mesmo do Origins teve muitas melhorias, sem falar que habilidades, se você escolher mal, vai se dar mal assim como todo RPG, mas tem como redefinir elas, pagando com seus Dracmas (moeda do jogo) então isso é de menos. Sem falar que no Origins, fechei o jogo e tive que usar um hack de grana, por que pelo amor, era impossível arrumar verba naquela coisa. Nesse daqui? Estou com 100.000 ouro, fácil, fácil. Agora tem missão navais e por sua vez assim como Black Flag e Rogue... batalhas navais, são bem legais, realmente curti, não tenho muito a dizer pois não passei muito tempo no mar, ainda. As escolhas realmente afetam seu jogo, no começo você tem chance de salvar uma família doente ou não. Salvei, depois mais para frente no jogo deu ruim na ilha inteira (do começo) HUHEUHUEUHUHE, fiz um novo save e deixei eles para morrer, a ilha não fica doente futuramente e ninguém morre. Incrível isso, não? Mas continuei com o save que ajudei a família, mesmo tendo condenado ilha toda praticamente, só tacar fogo neles que tudo fica bem. Já explorei uma local, do qual não vou falar nem spoilar mas tomei um susto com um bagulho de um bicho cabaço bate na parede, em uma ilha. Sai de lá correndo. (Era nível baixo, 10) hUHUEUHEHUE enfim. A medida que for jogando, vou editando a análise. Mas pergunta é, vale a pena o valor atual? Se você é fã da série assim como eu, olha paguei a versão ultimate, 230 e vi que vou receber outro AC Remaster e tals, curti. Acho que vale sim o valor. Esse jogo vai me render boas horas de gameplay, isso pois escolhi jogar com a Kassandra, futuramente vou jogar com o Alexios.

Assassin's Creed serisinin ilk oyunundan Syndicate'e kadar serüveninde beni her zaman seriye çeken oyunların taşıdığı tarihi içerikler ve o döneme ait karakterler, olaylar ve nihayetinde de atmosferi olmuştur. Assassin's Creed'le başlayan Orta Çağ, Templar ve Haşhaşi birliğinin savaşı, Rönesans dönemi İtalya'sından, Kolonileşme savaşlarına kadar sürerek tarihin birçok önemli bireyini bizlere sunmuştu. Kimi zaman Adem ve Havva'nın Cennet'ten kaçışını ve Barbaros Hayrettin Paşa'nın Dünya haritasını Apple of Eden ile çizdiği gibi tarihi olayları bünyesine ustaca yediren Assassin's Creed, çoğu zaman oynanışı ve konseptiyle de beni ve daha birçok serinin hayranını kaybetmişti. Bir zamanlar tarihi içeriklerine değer verdiğim seri, artık benim için 'tarihten bir dönemi ele alan, açık dünya aksiyon RPG' oyununa dönüştü ve Odyssey'i 'eskisi gibi bir Assassin's Creed oyunu değil' diyerek kötülemeyeceğim, zira zaman gibi Assassin's Creed serisi de değişiyor ve fikrimce oldukça başarılı bir şekilde.

The Witcher 3'ün oyunculara sunduğu açık dünya, dövüş mekanikleri ve atmosferden oldukça etkilenen Ubisoft'un Assassin's Creed Origins'le yeni bir formülü kabullendiği aşikar ve şahsen ben bu işlenişten oldukça memnunum. Origins'in mısır konsepti ve ana karakteri Bayek her ne kadar beni pek tatmin etmese de, Odyssey daha ilk tanıtıldığı andan itibaren beni Antik Yunan konseptiyle çekmiş ve heves/ilgi uyandırmıştı. Ubisoft'un artık planı oldukça basitti aslında. Tarihten bir dönemi al ve bunu yeni açık dünya, aksiyon RPG formülüyle yedir, ve dediğim gibi ben bu olaya oldukça tavım. Hatta sıradaki oyunun Sengoku Dönemi Japonya'sı olmasını can-ı gönülden istiyorum.

Origins'in oluşturduğu formülü 2-3 adım ileriye taşıyan Assassin's Creed Odyssey, bizleri aslında Origins'den yaklaşık 400 sene gerisine götürüyor, anlayacağınız aslında hem Templarlar'ın, hem de Assassin'lerin kökenine iniyoruz. Sparta Kralı Leonidas'ın Pers Kralı Xerxes'e karşı savaştığı ve 300 Spartalı olarak bilinen destanla başlayan Odyssey, seçtiğimiz Alexios veya Kassandra adlı karakterle başlıyor. Leonidas'ın soyundan gelen bu 2 kardeş, seçimlerimizde şekillenen, hatta tüm Yunanistan'ı şekillendirebilecek güce ve potansiyele sahip. Leonidas'ın mızrağının bir parçasını her daim taşıyan ve Spartalı olarak da içindeki savaş yetisiyle her daim hazır olan karakterimiz, Origins'in aksine bu sefer özel yeteneklere de sahip.

Hunter, Warrior ve Assassin olarak 3 ayrı yetenek ağacını sunan Odyssey, bu 3 farklı yetenek ağacından 4 farklı uzak mesafe yeteneğini ve 4 yakın mesafe yeteğini dövüş esnasında kullanmamıza imkan tanıyor. Leonidas'ın ünlü Sparta Tekmesinden tutun, silahlarınızı ateş veya zehire bulamaya kadar birçok farklı yetenek kullanabileceğiniz silah ile başarılı bir şekilde harmanlanabiliyor. Origins'in sunduğu mızrak, kılıç, çifte bıçak, sopa veya balta gibi silahlar aynı şekilde Odyssey'de de yer alıyor. Okların sahip olduğu özellikler ise bahsettiğim yetenekler ile oyuncuya sunuluyor.

Güney Yunanistan'dan Selanik'e kadar olan bir haritayı ve birçok Yunan Adası'nı oyunculara sunan Odyssey'in atmosferi ve bu doğayı süsleyen, yaşayan müzikleri ise gerçekten kusursuz. Şahsen Origins'in Mısır ve sarı renk paletinden sıkılmış birisi olarak, Odyssey'in rengarenk dünyası gerçekten sizi daha ilk dakikasından içine çekiyor ve haritadaki soru işaretlerini keşfetmeye itiyor. Hele bir de benim gibi oyunu en zorda oynuyorsanız kendinizi kurtlardan kaçarken, saldırılarınızı planlarken ve birçok kez photo mode'u açıp fotoğraf çekerken bulabiliyorsunuz. Genelde bu tür oyunları bir an önce bitirip sıradaki oyuna geçmeyi amaçlasam da Odyssey gerçekten The Witcher 3'ü oynadığım şekilde bir tat veriyor. Oyunu yavaş yavaş oynuyor, suyunu çıkartıyor, istediğim zaman Antik Yunanistan'ın eşsiz havasını ciğerlerime çekiyorum. Ama en zorda oynadığımdan bol bol ölüp, tekrar deneyip oyunda ustalaşmaya çalışıyorum.

Assassin ve Templar hikayesinin en temelini ele alan Odyssey'in yaptığı en büyük yenilik ise oyunun birçok sona sahip olması. Verdiğiniz kararlar, yaptığınız şeyler, öldürdüğünüz kişiler ile ulaştığınız son değişirken, oyunun sadece bir adet 'gerçek sonu' bulunuyor ve bu sona ulaşmanız için de yan içerikleri temizlemeniz gerekebiliyor. Bu açıdan hiçbir rehbere bakmadan, kendi kararlarınızla hangi sona ulaşacağınızın merakı ayrı bir hevesi uyandırıyor.

Origins'in aksine çok daha detaylı bir ekipman sistemine sahip olan Odyssey, baş, göğüs, el, bel ve ayak parçalarını özelleştirmenize imkan tanırken, karakterinizi tam da aradığınız Antik Yunan askerine dönüştürüyor. Üstelik Alexios ve Kassandra'nın giyebileceği zırhlar tamamen aynı, bu zırhlarda bir cinsiyet ayrımı da bulunmuyor.

Benim için Assassin's Creed Odyssey'i en özel yapan şey, aslında benim bu oyuna '3rd person aksiyon RPG Age of Mythology' olarak bakmam. Çocukluğumda, saatlerce, günlerce hatta aylarca oynadığım ve 'prostagma, hesvolit!' diye dolaştığım günleri, Arkantos ve Ajax ile savaştığım günleri anımsatan ve o havayı, heyecanı bir kez daha yaşayan bir deneyimi sunması. Eğer Age of Mythology ile büyüdüyseniz, siz de Arkantos gibi elinize mızrağı alıp, savaşa atılmak isteyeceksiniz kesinlikle.

Savaş demişken, Antik Yunan'da bulunduğumuz bu çağ Sparta ve Atina'nın içerisinde bulunduğu ve tüm Yunanistan'ı etkileyen bir savaşı ele alıyor ve elbette Alexios/Kassandra'da bu savaşın tam kalbinde yer alıyor. İsterseniz oluşturduğunuz ordunuzla veya sahip olduğunuz filolarla Atina ordusuna karşı savaşabiliyor ve yavaş yavaş kaybettiğiniz toprakları geri alabiliyorsunuz. Vereceğiniz bu kararlar, yapacağınız bu savaşlar da doğrudan oyunun sonunu etkileyebiliyor.

The Witcher 3'ü baz alarak Assassin's Creed serisine yeni bir tat katan Ubisoft'un bu seçimini onaylıyor ve serinin gidişatından memnun olduğumu da belirtmek istiyorum. Assassin's Creed serisi suikast temelleriyle oldukça başarılı, kimi zaman iyi, kimi zaman da kötü kararlarıyla da iyi bir yol kat ederek bugünlere geldi. Bu açıdan, yapımı eski oyunlarla kıyaslamaktan ziyade önceki oyunu Origins ile kıyaslamak çok daha doğru olacaktır. Bunu yaptığımız zamanda da Origins'i sevmeyenlere dahi hitap edebilecek bir yapım bizleri karşılıyor.

Origins demişken, Assassin's Creed Odyssey'in performans olarak Odyssey'den çok daha iyi bir performans sergilediğini belirtmem gerek, ancak Ubisoft'un optimizasyon yetersizliği zaman zaman devam ediyor. Çoğu zaman 55-60fps arası oyun giderken, yer yer 45-55 arası değişiklik gösterdiği de olabiliyor. Buna sebep olarak Denuvo da olunca, zaman zaman can sıkıcı oluyor elbette ama Origins'in performans rezaleti yanında Odyssey bir nebze daha iyi.

Antik Yunan konseptini, özellikle de Age of Mythology'i seviyorsanız Assassin's Creed Odyssey kesinlikle deneyimlemeniz gereken bir yapım. Hem zaten Origins'den memnun kaldıysanız da Odyssey'i seveceğinize inanıyorum. Assassin's Creed 2'yi seven ve o tür bir yapımı arayan birisiyseniz de artık o defteri kapamanız gerektiğini, Ubisoft'un farklı bir yolda ilerlediğini belirtmek isterim. The Witcher 3'ü temel alan Assassin's Creed'in, artık 'tarihten bir dönemi ele alan açık dünya, aksiyon RPG' türünde bir yapım olduğunu kabullenmek gerekiyor. Hatta, kendimi yenileyeceğim ama, dilerim sıradaki oyun Iga topraklarında başlayan ve Hattori klanına bağlı olarak başladığımız bir Sengoku Dönemi Assassin's Creed'i olur da, kendimi kaybederim.

比uplay版晚28小时就已经很让人冒火了，好不容易进入游戏看看终极版能送什么东西...一套紫色的垃圾装备？拜托，终极版458，难道我花458就是来给你当免费测试员的吗？不对，付费测试员的吗？一个金的都不愿意给，点数还得做任务送200，干脆你连着200也别送了好吗？看着实在难受！起源好歹送套金装，送的点数还能买点东西...你现在最便宜的就是250？吃相真TM 难看！邪教成员能卡在地下，怎么玩？这么多天了还不修复？开箱子还得联网，你自己什么服务器你心里没点B数？刺客信条一直作为单机剧情游戏中的精品，为什么你要搞个开箱还要联网？是不是不联网，你怎么吃钱？比起源贵了90块钱，给的东西却还不如起源...你叫我今后还怎么无脑预购你们育碧的最高版本？真的让人寒心！肝了34个小时才打出阿喀琉斯和斯巴达套装，还不是不氪金就不能变强的问题，是不氪金连变帅都做不到！

游戏虽然不错，但是这次育碧的做法真的让我无法给出好评！这个卡死，闪退，BUG，让我现在对这个游戏失去了好感，所以赶在发售第一天就来给差评！

----10.7更新-------

主线在昨天全通，今天清了一下预购任务和DLC任务，另外利用修改器功能完成了卡地下的土行孙...

但是这都不是关键，关键的是，两个传奇品质头盔，除了第二属性不一样意外，其他一模一样，就是换个名字，连头部模型都没变，好歹变个颜色也行啊！育碧，你现在是真的会偷懒，现在更让我说不出话来...作为一部以古希腊为题材的游戏，武器中矛的数量是出奇的少，算上氪金矛，传奇品质一共就8把，而且属性各种搞笑...阿基里斯之矛加的是猎人伤害属性...我想知道你们法国文化中阿基里斯是猎人吗？一把矛，一把弓全是猎人伤害...

另外整个游戏的简体汉化虽然说延续了育碧一贯的冷幽默风格，但是请尊重一下普遍翻译好吗？一部分历史古迹，地名不是按照普遍翻译写的，十分伤脑袋啊！

----10.8更新-------

除了神教佐伊斯梅会卡在地下，今天的每日佣兵任务，佣兵点刷在了海平面以下293米，也就是海底下...真的厉害！

游戏值得入手，刚开始玩感觉和起源差不多，但是玩一段时后确实感觉在前作的基础上改进了不少：
1.游戏风景确实不错。
2.敌人等级是动态的，想压等级是不可能了。
3.玩之前感觉是狂战士无双，可以直接冲进去，玩了之后感觉刺客真香。
4.时刻注意右下角的悬赏，千万注意，特别是你准备大开杀戒的时候，不然会死的很难看，别问我怎么知道的。
5.男主挺帅的。
6.装备搭配很重要，看你走的路线穿适当的装备，而不是那个稀有穿那个。
缺点：
1.部分bug需要修复。
2.鹰眼的观察有时方向判断有点迷。
暂时发现的就这些，先不说了，我又呗悬赏了......

Review after 2 hours of gameplay (will edit later on)

Pros:
Astonishing graphics.
Catchy story.
Beautifully designed world.
You can play as male or female.
More dialogue options than Fallout 4.
2 difficult levels for exploring, the hard one, how it is supposed to be played, doesn't treat you like if you were brainless as 99% of games do.

You can climb Zeus penis and the character will interact with it.
OMG THE WAVES.
Your decisions actually AFFECT and CHANGE the world.


Cons:
Crashed 2 times in 30 first minutes leading to a blue screen and another time at 115 minutes. Seems that running uPlay as  admin helps but does not fix it.
uPlay, actually it is the only con I have found.
(Seems that the crashes are fixed, not sure yet tho)

这是我期待了两个月的游戏啊

The best AC game so far imo. I liked origins but this is actually way more fleshed out and polished. The choices actually feel impactful and not a gimmick also. Read someone elses review for more information though.

Performance from my perspective:

I actually don't hate the performance. It isn't ideal but with a few tweaks to settings that should NOT be in the default presets you can gain massive amounts of performance for little to no visual downgrade.

Anti aliasing in this game isn't great and can look worse than turning it off altogether. 
Volumetric clouds are barely noticeable most of the time but tank frame rates by up to 45%! Set this setting to medium for best performance.
Most of the other settings for me had little to no impact on performance (1-2%) Obviously a combination of turning all of them down would be beneficial depending on your hardware. 

This game looks amazing on high+ settings and pretty garbage on anything lower, it does not scale well on low end systems so it is something to keep in mind. If you have a high end system (GTX 1070 for 1080p and GTX 1080 for 1440p with a good CPU for 60fps high settings) then you should be fine.

I run this game at a 99% average 60 FPS with 4K and the only settings below maximum are the ones I mentioned (AA, Clouds). 

Specs: 
RTX 2080
i7 6700K
16GB RAM
Game installed to SSD.

I also did want to mention that I have encountered very few bugs in this AC title, and I have only crashed once in 16 hours of gameplay. This is definitely just my experience and yours may vary as there are reports of people crashing frequently and experiencing more performance issues.

Playing 4K @ 60Hz with an i7 8700k, ASUS GTX 1080Ti, average FPS of 48Hz on full ultra. I have been playing on nightmare difficulty, with exploration mode enabled.

While I’m only a few hours into this game, there are definitely a number of things I can say about it. Firstly, this is not an “Assassin’s Creed” game, similar to how Origins wasn’t, but this time even it’s more detached in my opinion. I don’t necessarily see this to be a bad thing, the old mould was getting tiresome, and this detachment allows for drastically different stories to be accommodated for.

To start the game you are asked to choose a number of things; difficulty, exploration mode, and who you’re going to play as. The latter is definitely interesting…you cannot change your choice once made, so I spent some time making this relatively simple and binary decision. At first I went with Kassandra, but something didn’t feel right playing as her, the voice acting didn’t match what I expected, among other issues I had. After a short time playing as Kassandra I completely deleted my save, went through the prologue again and switched to Alexios, I’m enjoying him much more.

Graphically, the game simply looks stunning, the first thing I did was climb to a high place and just observe. I seriously can’t wait to explore the rest of what this map has to offer (which by the way is considerably larger than that of Egypt, and consisting of a lot of water…)

Completely unable to comment on the story thus far, but it was definitely a welcome sight seeing more RPG elements making it into this installation.

I will update this as I progress.

Amazingly enough, on an i7-6700k, I get 45 frames of gameplay. Even when I turn it down I only cap at 60 on a 144hz limiter.

I want to love Assassin's Creed, but I can't give any real reason to continue when they keep making these dumpster fire framerate games. Nobody want's to buy a brand new motherboard and expensive CPU just to play a $60 dollar game.

I haven't gotten too far into the story, and I'm only level 17 or so, but in such a short amount of time AC Odyssey has easily become one of my favourite games. Most RPG's I play, like skyrim or TW3, I enjoy the exploration and side quests/activities for a short while and then get bored and just follow the main quests. In most other games, I skip dialogue because I'm too impatient. In AC Odyssey, I find myself exploring every nook and cranny, listening to the dialogue, taking on every mission and contract I can because I want to experience it all. I love how the story is unfolding so far, and I really do like the ability to fight for either faction or both. Really fun combat (Best combat in the entire series IMO), stealth works the same as in the older games, ship battles have never been faster or smoother, and the story is superb. Honestly haven't found anything to dislike! I love this game. Also, you can ride a super macho sparkly unicorn into battle.

Graphics and World: A game that trumps most open world games with its quality and quantity. 

Optimization/Bugs/Issues: The game runs beautifully with minor bugs and no crashes, the only real problem I've had is frame drops in Athens and Sparta. I've had however more problems on the PS4 version than the PC. Still no major problems at all. 

Difficulty: Easy to learn. Just pay attention and you'll pick it up quick. 

Story: Be prepared, it gets wild and is so fun. 

Is it worth it? YES!!!

Are they taking your money? You don't NEED to spend money to progress! If a comment says that its false. I have the game on my PS4 and PC, I paid for the XP boost on my PS4 and got to level 24, while on my PC I got to level 22 without spending a dime stopping at the same point with the same missions. In reality spending money is kind of pointless as there are many ways to level gear, toon, to make the monies, and materials.  Plus you get Helix credits as you advance anyway, people probably didn't mention that. 

Final Verdict: 8.2/10, Look if you're looking to get into the AC franchise this is the game to do it! The game will get more updates and optimization as time goes on. An overall fun experience unless you're not a fan of these types of RPG Open World games. I've bought the game for three friends and they've all loved it as well.

相较于起源，此作是全面的进化。
更加丰富的系统造就了可玩性的提升。
在全新的技能系统的加持下，战斗变的更加富有深度，再配合上完全RPG化装备系统，可以玩出许多不同的套路。
刺杀依旧刺杀，狂战依然狂战，看玩家自行选择。
较为优秀的剧情，有了对话分支系统更是如虎添翼。
支线的质量明显提升。
探索模式下游玩本作将获得更好的体验。
更加优秀的风景。
虽然仍有淡淡的育碧开放世界的味道。
依然强烈推荐，或为刺客信条系列最优秀的一作。

To me this Assassins Creed Game is going on my top favorites for the games since Assassins creed 1 2 and 3 I loved Black flag as well but it was to simular to the assassination repetitive role of the other games . I love this game  out of them all for the reason listed . 
Pros :
1. This Game feels like a total roleplaying game of playing how you want to play it . +1
2. The fact they put both genders as selective choice as well the effort to involve them equally in the story . +1
3. The protagonist is not silent ! +1
4. The size of the world is amazing ! I have not had this much open world exploration since Elderscolls Oblivion . +1
5.Navel combat is a upscale to me at lest from black flag which is very nice ! +1
6. Able to dive anywhere in the water and explore limitless under water ! One thing that was limited on black flag .+1
7. The fact you can  play in 3 different combat skill trees which allows players to play how they want . +1
8. The choice to make a differnce in your choice of words when talking to some npc as well have consequence's +1
9. Able to tame a animal to fight along side you .+1
10. Great deal on weapon selection Swords, Daggers, Warmaces, Spears, Warsythes, Staves, Bows, Selection is nice ! +1
11. A decent variety of armor sets , Head , torso, Greaves , footwear and gloves which allows uniqness ! +1
12. The fact there is a bounty system that can be put on your head really ups the challenge and choices you make . +1
13. 99% of the games landscape is climbable without needing to follow a specific climb point .+1

Cons :
 1.Would be perfect it it had co op ! But beggers cant be choosers .
2. Many towns looks very simular to the last almost as if it were copy and pasted in a spot at a different angle .
3. Very rare encounter that i get a pause moment while sailing the sea which i am sure its just a bug or slow rendering however not too much of a bother.

Overall I just plain enjoy this game so much . Bought before the 2nd and been playing it since the 2nd of early access and I have had no regrets. Worth every Penny if you want a very open game to explore , cause mischeif or just plain admire the beauty of the game !

我爱育碧

9.5/10
闪退的人更新到416驱动。这是老黄的锅不要给育碧。

首先，我极度不推荐这一部的终极版，相对于又有季票又送金装的起源黄金版，这款内容和价格双亏的终极版性价比简直低到了极点。
这一部有一个比较无厘头的设定，就是有武装的平民只要处于你与敌人战斗的范围内都会一致的掏出刀子上来淦你，于是某些日常的保护任务就会出现前一秒你还在为了保护目标跟强盗肉搏，后一秒金主掏出刀来上来朝着你就是一刀的情景，情急之下失手砍死金主任务失败。
游戏方面本作几乎毫无新意，在减少据点的情况下如何延长游戏时间？育碧的答案是提高据点难度和升级装备肝度。本作的刺杀系统已经到了只要装备落后等级1-2级你甚至无法用普通刺杀秒掉一个平级小兵的地步，恼羞成怒的你掏出刀子就要开干，却不料敌人一边喊人一边给你挂了个两星悬赏，下一秒就会天降两个不知道哪里来的佣兵boss过来砍你。你打开地图选择消除赏金然后继续跟雅典人开打，结果……没错！佣兵boss一边表示我是路过的组装平民一边掏出刀子加入了战斗。无奈之下你只能花费若干分钟跑路躲猫猫，然后还要花费十几分钟或者几十分钟刷材料升级装备，最后穿着一身升级完毕的蓝装或者紫装的你会发现普通刺杀还是无法秒掉一些普通的强壮兵，能拯救你的只有金装！于是问题来了，到底如何获得金装呢？育碧的答案是要稳只有氪，开瓶子的奥利哈钢甚至连保底都没有，而且数量跟uplay联网，在离线的情况下我都不知道能不能开瓶子，甚至你氪金开了的奥利哈钢地图也需要联网，离线下你根本无法使用。
这就是育碧号称超越了起源及前代作品的一坨光鲜亮丽的巧克力味的屎。
满分是10分，我给这游戏打4分，美工9分剧情1分，游戏性和令人发指的设定bug-6分。
本作最强技能——脚踢

奥德赛虽然保证了质量，但它并没有带给我们足够的惊艳
相比于起源，流程变得丰满许多，体验也变得更好，也没有丢失“刺客”这一玩法。
“我其实一直不理解那些说＇刺客只要完成目的，方式不重要，你们知道什么是刺客吗＇的人。”
刺客就是刺杀，虽然可以不择手段，但要求代价最小。
说实话，不是因为黄金版有刺客3的高清重制送，这一代我是不会买的。
这一代是美了不止一点半点，鸟瞰点的选取也比以前更为有新意。
但是我还是想说，刺客信条已经开始缺味道了。
我觉得起源与奥德赛并无法比上你们所“褒贬不一”的大革命。
但是这也不是育碧的错，毕竟不可能每部作品都让我们去进一步了解刺客组织与他们的教条，对于玩家来说，吸引他们喜欢这个IP的，不是育碧讲的家族情仇，而是刺客组织本身这个东西，能在枪车球中脱颖而出。
从2-4到大革命，1 叛变和兄弟会还没有玩过，我觉得随时随地都涉及到了刺客组织本身这个问题。
艾吉奥了解自己的家族，康纳从对刺客有些许怀疑到接受，爱德华爷爷(这里记不清剧情了)，亚诺对于教条的理解，都涉及到刺客组织本身这个严肃的问题。
然后就是枭雄，我觉得枭雄也不错，虽然它对于刺客组织的描写非常薄弱，但是他服装帅啊，伦敦美啊，锁链袖剑酷啊，一战(还是二战来着)爽啊，已经足够带来我们所需要的惊艳，刺杀的各种黑技巧也足够让人感受到刺杀这华美的艺术。
而相比之下，奥德赛已经渐渐脱离刺客组织这个话题，而且惊艳程度也不够，也许它是在叙事前世，补充完整的世界观，但不能掩盖它前大部分都脱离刺客组织的事实。
当我下海的那一刻，我就知道这钱没白花

[h1] Красота которая не всем по душе,но радует геймера. [/h1]
                     [h1] Хорошая вмеру графика ,приятный геймплей. [h1]
                            [h1]   Много миссий,сложные,и простые,это радует. [h1]
                                   [h1] То что нужно убить время,и посмотреть на красоту Греции. [h1]

Ассасин мне не когда не нравился,первый раз я услышал о первой части от друга. И приходил к нему смотреть ка кон играет . Но как оказалось меня затянет ещё год назад вышедшая игра Assasins creed:Origin ,наконец то они ,отошли от темы нудной Италии,прыгание по крышам ,и однообразный геймплей . Да я могу сказать что первая часть ,вторая часть,и Чёрный Флаг,Одни из тех частей в которые можно поиграть,и они сделаны хорошо.
Но тут Ubisoft решила сделать про Египет ,и пойти уже по истокам. Но а сейчас вышла довольно неплохая игра Одиссея . Да многие скажут ,ну да ну древняя Греция,ну опять одно и тоже,графика не меняется . Но Это лучше чем бегать ,и прыгать,по сидениям в первых частях.
Да как я понял ,они будут делать конвейер ,теперь про страны ,потом будет Испания,или Британия,Может Бразилия даже. Но конечно не радует одно но,очень длинный сюжетный расклад,вам придется часов 50 наиграть ,и более что бы пройти игру. Для кого то это будет только в кайф придя с работы,или института,школы,сесть и поиграть в Одиссея. Для кого то будет нужным всё это. Скажу сразу Если вы надумаете, брать всё таки Assasins Creed :Odyssey ?,то приготовьтесь к множеству диалогов в игре,их там просто много.Как буд то вы смотрите фильм,для какого диалоги будут просто очень нужными,кто то их не любит. Но Ещё раз Графика в игре не плохая,я не сказал хорошая,не плохая ,в основном она не поменялась с Истоков . 
Ну что тянуть знаете сами кого за одно место. Скажу сразу игра вдохновляет,немножко нудная ,но вот главное долгая,многие жалуются,что игры короткие ,а зря ! я сам купил игру и сезонный пропуск . Так что советую и вам! Если вы готовы посмотреть на красивые пейзажи Греции ,побывать в морских сражениях,а так же почувствовать себя покорителем морских глубин, который ищет золото ,и разное в глубинах морских.
И кто что не писал,это Ассасин,давайте уважать,если кому не нравится ,в стиме отзывов гневных не мало,но или вы фанаты первых частей скучных,бегайте дальше ,или вы просто школьники,я всё сказал .

Общая Оценка игры 7.8

因为用了D加密所以吃CPU。结合了RPG元素，对话可以选择，在起源的基础上改变了战斗系统，奥德赛和起源是一起做的，可玩性比起源高多了，加入了海战系统，地图海域面积大大增加，萝卜青菜各有所爱，有人喜欢潜入刺杀，有人就喜欢无双，在我眼里，这一作和起源一样，都很棒

It just takes everything from AC Origins and makes it better. The game also takes some mechanics from other games and throws those in as well. I have no complaints so far. A couple things to note:

1. If you have passed any intro level computer science class then you won't have any performance issues in this game. Only 12-year olds who made their parents buy them an Alienware computer seem to have issues with performance. 

2. If someone gives the game a bad review and then blocks comments on their review do not trust them. 

3. If the Spartan kick is not the first ability you learn when you hit level 2 then you might as well not play this game. It's just not for you chief.

4. Anybody claiming you need to pay micro-transactions to "make the game playable" is a sheep that just listens to Jim Sterling and only contributes to the increasing plague of group-think. Not a single micro-transaction needs to be purchased to enjoy this game. I bought the $60 normal edition of the game and am perfectly happy with it.

While its a good action rpg and surely an improvement over Origins in many ways at this point it's a joke to the original fans to even call Origins and this Assassin's Creed though. While It may be good as a standalone title and RPG and does improve on some of the issues with origins it also still continues others too. It's still insulting to call this an Assassin's Creed title at this point as they have continued to not follow the franchise's original story, break Ac lore, become more and more commercial, less and less historically accurate too something franchise once prided itself on, and it appears to be done either because of trying to cater to politics or just plain greed bottomline. Lastly the game is also poorly optimized for pc, you sometimes get the feeling alot of this game was recycled and rushed, and you're only Greek in game who some crazy reason can't uequip and use a shield period but If you could care less about all that and fact it's not a true AC title then you may still enjoy it but i simply can't ignore it same way I couldn't with Origins.

24 hours in and I feel confident in saying that this is a great game, I'm enjoying it a lot. I get the exact same performance in Origins as I am in Odyssey, which is a stable 60FPS max settings on an ultrawide 1440p monitor.

Pretty good so far,  probably better than Origins. I haven't had any crashes or technical problems, but it is a bit harder to run than Origins. With 8700k @ 5GHz and 1080TI running at 1440p I get 85 fps in the in-game benchmarking tool with DOF, Shadows, AO, and AA turned down a notch. Doesn't feel grindly at all as some others have said.  There are more than enough quests and sidequests to level up at pace with your main quests.  I guess if you are trying to upgrade your ship right away it will take a lot of grind, but that's really not necessary and you will get enough materials as you quest and play to keep getting upgrades gradually.

很棒！我玩的是困难难度。这作在我看来其实很刺客信条：同级敌人点了暗杀技能基本上刺杀都可以秒杀（包括黄色的精英甚至神教成员），反而去开无双会被打爆。而且我经常刺杀完关键人物或者偷到东西就跑，无比快乐~ 另外剧情非常棒，玩得完全停不下来。希腊风景很美丽，海战我挺喜欢的（我觉得单纯地在美妙的海面上航行就很棒，海面和光影都很美）。玩了二十几个小时目前没遇到过什么bug（除了一次奥德赛任务消失，读个档就好了），也没有黑屏闪退什么的。而且石板的探索解密非常有趣。探索模式也很棒。

我是以卡珊德拉作为角色玩的游戏，奥德赛有对话选项所以我也不知道官方正统结局是啥所以就不说了。 

-装备/等级-
奥德赛的等级压制和装备系统再提升一个级别，开普通难度拿蓝装跟你相同等级的人打甚至能打上很久，
后期可进行征服的时候推荐选斯巴达，难度可能有点大不过给的东西比雅典好太多了。

-主线/支线-
奥德赛的支线和以往的ac完全不一样特别是开了探索模式的奥德赛，npc只告诉玩家大概位置让玩家自己用鹰眼去找，
这次的主线分为三支，1.卡珊德拉/阿列西欧斯的故事 2.宇宙神教的故事 3.亚特兰提斯/现代的故事（这个我吹爆！）

-雇佣兵/海战-
想狂战士？可以啊，兵营点了烽火三个雇佣兵追在你屁股后面，想跑到海上抢劫？好啊，
雇佣兵的船带着两个小弟过来，不过雇佣兵也有好处有些杀死了还会给你好装备。

-起源换皮/狂战士-
跟风黑的云玩家喷的换皮起源，从单个截图看说起源换皮我也不说什么，如果玩了后
还说是起源换皮那真的得去看眼科。
我前面也说了狂战士会引来雇佣兵的追杀，一些云玩家一直抓着狂战士的把柄却忽略潜行这个要素
这也太酷了8 见不得ac好？

-机票内容-
第一部资料片是《第一把袖剑的继承》以我的推测是希罗多德造了第一把袖剑然后给主角？
第二部资料片谁《亚特兰提斯的命运》看这感觉应该跟去年的起源dlc《法老的诅咒》差不多，
一个新的地方去探索。 ****《第一把袖剑的继承》和《亚特兰提斯的命运》各分为三个章节，
每六周一章节。****
买黄金版，终极版或单独买机票在2019年育碧都会送刺客信条3重置版和刺客信条解放重置版。
9.3/10
（我再吹一下亚特兰提斯和现代的主线，好到爆炸！[spoiler]小声bb[/spoiler]）

癫痫警告

Its really good. Ubisofts renewed commitment to quality has been a refreshing change. The previous Assassins Creed took the series out of the rut it had been in for years, and merely a year after Origins theyve outdone themselves yet again.

Odyssey is a truly great game, it has a beautiful world with a rich historical backround of Greece. Conflict between ancient Sparta and Athens works well into the civil war theme. Its the same engine as Origins but it still looks and performs better. This is no mere recycle of assets.

There are tons of quests and loot, heavy RPG mechanics, and a great story. The boring and chaotic skill tree from Origins is gone, thank god. Theyve overhauled the progression system and added new, awesome skills like the legendary Spartan kick. The this is sparta kick is the most satisfying gameplay mechanic Ive used since Kratos' leviathan axe throw.

The player character is infinitely better than Origins. Bayek had two speeds, screaming and howling about the korny "Order of Ancients", or just generally boring and monotone. Alexius/Kassandra has swagger, charisma, and great voice acting.

There are dialogue options for the first time, romance options, theyve gone and turned the series into an RPG. And its had excellent results. Naval combat is back and as fun as ever. Ive missed the sea battles since Black Flag, and sea combat has been made more nuanced with tons of upgrades and abilities.

9.5/10

非常值得一玩，是刺客信条的粉丝千万不要错过的一部作品，海战，陆战，各种炫酷，无人机也比上一代做的更好了，基本达到95的侦查率，反正我买的是终极版可以提前玩，但是发售了建议买黄金版就好，好啦！我还要继续去征服我的希腊和斯巴达了！

目前只打到雅典，可以说这部刺客信条完全超过预期，剧情方面进步极大，战斗也比前作舒服。
但最吸引我的是一些细节，独眼人的眼睛被塞羊屁眼的时候的表情，事后还可以把羊杀了拿回眼睛，能买不少钱。再说几个，每次使用伊卡洛斯的时候它的定位就是它当前的位置，更以前一样；动态等级好评，虐菜没意思，需要靠等级压制的关和地点等级不会涨，好评；不仅有天气变化，还有季节变化，虽然目前只看到秋季。
缺点也有，比如海战，虽说迫于时代限制，不能让海战像黑旗一样丰富，但是没有望远镜真tmd难受，还有就是登船，这作战斗本来就难，登船后敌人还是满血，登船难度极大，不如直接撞沉

Odyssey, piyasadaki en iyi açık dünya oyunu olabilir şu an. Witcher'ı saymıyorum tabiki bu dünyadan değil o oyun. Size şöyle diyeyim, oyunun başındaki ufacık adayı 7 saatte temizledim. Görevler, toplanabilirler falan. Haritaya bakınca aklım çıkıyor rahat +100 saati var oyunun.

Grafikler de çok iyi olmuş tatmin ediyor insanı. Yalnız bir sıkıntı var, ''muhteşem bir bilgisayarım var yine de 40-50 fps alıyom baba'' diyorsanız ayarlarda Volumetric Clouds'u low'a getirin. VOLUMETRIC CLOUDS kesinlikle low'da olmalı. Abartmıyorum +25 fps yükseliyor low'a getirince. Bulut lan bu, gökyüzüne bakmıyorsunuz bile oyunun %90'ında. Kafayı yemişler. Alın, indirin, oynayın. Denemeniz gerekli.

Overall Odyssey is a great game and has surprised me in so many ways. Odyssey has taken some of the best aspects of previous titles and paired them with rpg story elements which combined make Odyssey a really fun and enjoyable game. I havent had this much fun playing a Assassin's creed game since AC2.

Story: The story is really good compared to other AC games and in my opinion rivals AC2's story. It manages to really make the setting come to life and also does a very good job at keeping you interested. The game allows if you to make a choices that impact the story which is new to AC. Overall it isn't Witcher 3 or anything, but the game gives you enough meaningful choices that you won't feel disappointed.

Graphics: Basically what you would expect out of a AAA game. Graphics are great and have high quality textures.

Combat: Still has the normal AC stealth combat system that you would expect, but also has kept the combat from origins. Overall I would say that the combat is pretty good and has a lot of different abilites which you can unlock and use throughout the game.

World and Setting: The game does a good job of selling the setting which it is trying to portray. For the most part much of the animous shit has been left out of greece and instead takes a much more believeable tone that actually manages to make sense within the context of the story.

Performance: I have a GTX 1080, I7-8700k and 16gbs of ram and didn't drop below 60fps at max settings. If you have a less powerfull system or have a amd card sorry, but i'm not sure how you're experience will be. From what I experienced the game didn't feel like it was badly optimized or anything, but I simply can't successfully perdict the experienceyou will have if you have worse or different hardware.

Overall Odyssey in my opinion is a must buy. This is easily the best AC game I have played and in my opinion is even better than AC2. The way Odyssey pairs AC with rpg elements and story choices makes the game a lot of fun to play.

刺客信条每一部都玩过，奥德赛是最让我眼前一亮的。因为是预购用户能提前几天接触。
说下优点：
1.风景确实非常优美，就算开低画质也很惊艳。育碧终于下功夫了。
2.这游戏用探索模式玩是最好的，各种巧遇，各种惊喜。
3.战斗模式相比起源有了很大改进，顺畅了许多。
4.剧情不用说，就像看电影。不过对话的分支选项可要选择好，会产生永久影响的。要是你没存档就GG。
5.我大海盗又回来了！！找回了黑旗的海战！
6.最终BOSS不再是以前那个你知我长短，我知你深浅的模式了，像幽灵行动一样的树状图，一步一步的引出最终BOSS。
当然还有缺点：
1.游泳的速度太慢了吧，不符合实际。主角跑路的时候身姿有点丑，育碧这方面下功夫了没？（不要和我说斯巴达比较野蛮）
2.大晚上的月光怎么这么亮，我还以为是阴天！能不能再黑一点！
3.野生动物好像并不能驯服。
4.最重要的BUG闪退！

Sadly I had to refund this game.  Ubisoft changed the requirements making 3.0 ghz and AVX instruction sets mandatory. Won't affect most people with newer computers and processors, but older ones that otherwise meet the requirements won't have AVX. Very annoyed at Ubisoft. The requirements changed AFTER I prepurchased.

I only can't recommend the game because I can't play it.  I'm sure it is of high quality and a fantastic story, just as all the others have been.

Note: I appreciate the developer feedback and wish them luck on removing whatever is requiring AVX. If that drops the requirements back to where I purchased the game and can play without upgrading, I will reevaluate. I want to like it. I am predispoosed to like it. Give me the chance to do so.

Estou adorando o jogo, o mapa esta enorme e com 22.5 horas de jogo mal comecei a historia. O sistema de escolhas ficou bem legal, com algumas escolhas que apesar de nao influenciarem muito a historia (até onde estou) algumas tiveram peso para mim na hora de decidir qual tomar. Além disso com o modo exploraçao onde na maioria das vezes o jogo apenas diz para onde temos que ir, a opçao de perguntar mais informações do local/pessoa é muito boa e caso nao esteja com isso ativado, nao é necessario ouvir a descrição do local pois ja estara marcado para você. O sistema de mercenarios junto do nivel de procurado tambem ficou muito bom e varias vezes caço os mercenarios para itens ou para enfrentear oponentes mais fortes e algumas vezes sou obrigado a fugir quando muitos deles me veem, deixando o jogo bem dificil e tornando necessario assassinar alvos separadamente ao inves de sair atacando todos.
Falando do assassinato, estou usando ele muito mais que no origins, onde praticamente nunca usava, 

Uma das unicas coisas que nao gostei é que foi mantido o sistema dos niveis onde enfrentar um oponente 3 niveis acima do seu se torna impossivel, porem estou no nivel 20 e até agora nao tive problema com ele por estar achando divertido explorar o mapa e caçar mercenarios e membros do culto.

Me anima muito a volta dos navios e das batalhas navais que estou achando muito boa tambem, uma coisa que me incomoda um pouco é que as melhorias requerem tabuletas que sao encontradas na maioria explorando locais, tanto da historia quanto do mapa e entao se nao quiser explorar e procura-las pode ser dificil melhorar o navio (Não me incomodou até agora pois estou explorando muito)

A mecanica do combate está parecida com a do origins, com a remoção do escudo e a mudança da barra de foco, que agora é mais interressante e te da acesso a diversas habilidades muito boas e ao lonog do jogo, deixaram seu personagem com a sua cara e com pontos investidos em areas que você se deu melhor ( no meu caso, muitas habilidade de arco e flecha e poucas de combate)

Até agora tive poucos problemas com o jogo, sendo apenas um serio onde o jogo crashou. Os problemas menores foram:
 Falta de espaço para habilidades que eu queria (Mas depois é liberado uma segunda barra),
 Não acho que ficou muito claro quais habilidades ficam na barra de habilidades e quais ficam e botes como manter F pressionado ou apertar R (jogo no teclado e alterei alguns botoes para ficar mais parecido com o mapeamento do origins, achei melhor)
 Assassinato nao consegue matar os inimigos diversas vezes mesmo com habilidade que dobra o dano (gasta 1 barra). Apesar disso ainda causa muito dano e da para matar o alvo sem que ele chama atenção dos outros em muitos casos

Novidade que gostei: 
 Adição dos navios
 Habilidades boas e bem uteis, dando um toque unico no personagem
 Estou gostanto bastante da historia e de como encontrar os membros do culto
 Mudança nos desafios de caçar animais chefes que no origins eram apenas elefantes de guerra e todos no nivel maximo, nesse temos varios animais diferentes e em niveis mais baixos até os mais altos permitindo esses desafios mesmo antes de atingir o nivel maximo
 Sistema de escolhas está melhor do que o que eu esperava
 O cavalo ter um nome (me incomodava nao ter um nome a montaria no origins porque ficava lembrando no the wither 3 que quando chama o cavalo ele falava seu nome e no origins toda vez sentia falta de ter um nome para lembrar dele)

Informacja o wydaniu już teraz nowego Assassin’s Creed spadła na mnie jak grom z jasnego nieba. Dodatkowo ciśnienie podniosły pierwsze informacje jakie się pojawiły : Odysseya będzie wykonana tak jak Origins, nowa przygoda będzie rozgrywać się w czasach antycznej Grecji, premiera w tym roku. Pierwsze co zrobiłem to zaznaczyłem sobie na kalendarzu datę i policzyłem ile zostało dni do premiery. W głowie pojawiła się też myśl : „tak dużego zaufania żadna produkcja od Ubisoftu dawno u mnie nie miała” Teraz po spędzeniu z grą kilkudziesięciu godzin (licznik steam przekłamuje bo mam grubo ponad 60) postanowiłem podzielić się wrażeniami. Ale zacznę może tym razem od końca 

Assassin’s Creed Odyssey dalece przeskoczył poprzednika i jest to najlepsza gra sygnowana tą marką ! Tak, spodziewałem się że gorzej raczej nie będzie, ale żeby było tak dobrze ?! Co się więc zmieniło, a zmieniło się bardzo, bardzo dużo (tak samo jak rok wcześniej :)

[b]Po pierwsze[/b] : gra tym razem stała się prawdziwym sandboxowym rpgiem, oczywiście nadal jest to gra akcji, ale tym razem nie oglądamy wyreżyserowanych scenek ale mamy wprowadzone dialogi, wybory, oraz przede wszystkim wybór pomiędzy dwoma świetnymi bohaterami. Bayek z Siwy był bohaterem którego naprawdę polubiłem, ale nowy duet w postaci Kassandry lub Alexiosa to wręcz klasa sama w sobie. Stworzyli postacie którymi chcemy grać i które polubimy (i to się nie zmieni aż do końca gry)

[b]Po drugie[/b] : poprawiono znacząco questy poboczne które są lepiej poprowadzone i o wiele ciekawsze, praktycznie nie odbiegają obecnie od poziomu questów głównych (mówi wam to coś ?), tak, Ubisoft maksymalnie wzoruje się na najlepszych czyli na grach od CDProjekt. Nadal nie udało się dogonić Wiedźmina, ale są na dobrej drodze aby w następnym roku to zrobić. Dodatkowo w grze mamy sporo wyborów, niektóre są iluzoryczne, ale część faktycznie ma swoje konsekwencje które zobaczymy.  

[b]Po trzecie[/b] : gra jest gigantyczna, nie tylko mapa która jest większa od Origin, ale tym razem dodano tyle zawartości że jak ktoś będzie chciał wykonać wszystko (wszystkiego się nie da bo są questy dzienne, tablice itc) to pochłonie mu to kilka razy więcej czasu niż skończenie Origin. Wprowadzając dodatkowo tryb eksploracji wszystko co odkrywamy na mapie jest naszym odkryciem (wykonane zostało to wspaniale bo człowiek ma poczucie uczestniczenia w wielkiej przygodzie). Oczywiście dostępny jest też tryb normalny ale gra od początku nas informuje że to tryb eksploracyjny jest tym domyślnym. 

[b]Po czwarte[/b] : wzbogacono, usprawniono mechanikę gry, system walki, system rozwoju względem Origin. Ma się nieodparte wrażenie że Ubisoft poprawił w Odyssey wszystko to co można było jeszcze poprawić, dorzucając od siebie wiele nowości.  Tym razem umiera się dużo częściej, szczególnie grając na koszmarze trzeba dwa razy się rozejrzeć i przemyśleć schemat naszych dalszych poczynań. Dodatkowo wprowadzono uproszczony system łowców (wzorowany na tym z Shadow of Mordor), gdzie wraz z naszym złym zachowaniem wyznaczane są nagrody za naszą głowę. Jest to o tyle ciekawe że dodaje nowy element przeciwnika. 

[b]Po piąte[/b]: rozwinięto system operowania statkiem, jest to może element który nie został jakoś szczególnie rozbudowany, ale tym razem możemy rekrutować naszych oficerów, rozwijać nasz statek bazę, oraz pływać po wodach gdzie tylko chcemy. W końcu gra dostała fajnie wykonane sztormy, oraz piękny ruch fal. 

[b]Po szóste[/b] : nie ma obecnie gry RPG na rynku w której został tak świetnie przedstawiony i zaanimowany sposób konwersacji pomiędzy postaciami. Gestykulują, mają różne stany emocjonalne podczas rozmów, nadają żywego elementu. Jest to poziom absolutnie abstrakcyjny dla innych tego typu produkcji. Dzięki temu uzyskano jeszcze większą immersje.
 
[b]Po siódme[/b]: od dawna w serii nie udało się dzieląc grę na rozdziały przedstawić tak ciekawie opowiedzianą historie. Oczywiście nie jest może ona wybitna, ale praktycznie co moment czymś zaskakuje. Dlatego udało się jak nigdy wcześniej spowodować zaciekawienie i chęć jej poznania. Strzałem w dziesiątek było wprowadzenie retrospekcji oraz ograniczenie do absolutnego minimum wątku współczesnego oraz animusa. Mam nadzieję że w końcu marka zostanie przemodelowana na podtytuł Historie. 

[b]Po ósme[/b]: zmieniono system ekwipunku, oraz crafting. Tym razem naprawdę brakuje surowców i nie da się ich (od tak) kupić w wystarczającej ilości. Dodatkowo dostaliśmy podział na elementy naszego uzbrojenia (jak w klasycznych grach RPG). Nadal jest za dużo wypadających elementów zbroi i mieczy, ale jest to poziom widocznie ograniczony względem Origin. W grze widziałem tylko kilka setów legendarnych. 

[b]Po dziewiąte[/b] : nie ma ukrytego ostrza ;) Dostaliśmy złamany fragment włócznik który możemy ulepszać w antycznej kuźni, a templariusze zostali zastąpienie bractwem cosmo (które działa dla własnych celów politycznych i militarnych). Widać że twórcy chcieliby się w końcu urwać z niewygodnego ograniczonego settingu. 

[b]Po dziesiąte[/b] : architektura i detale na mapie. Jeśli uważacie że Ubisoft wykonał tytaniczną prawce przy Origin, to tutaj złapiecie się za głowę. To jak wykonana jest mapa, jak miasta, architektura, detale, to po prostu komputerowy cud świata. Na ten moment nie ma żadnej gry w której zagospodarowano tak przestrzeń.

[b]Po jedenaste[/b]: Graficznie w HDR gra dosłownie urywa głowę, jest to po Shadow of the Tomb Raider najładniejsza prezentacja HDR w grach wydanych w tym roku. Absolutny pure tech tej technologii. Dodając do tego niesamowite wykonanie graficzne i można grać dla samego podziwiania. Co więcej oprawa muzyczna dostosowała się poziomem i gra zawiera jedną z najlepszych ścieżek dźwiękowych i voice acting w grach wydanych na przestrzeni lat. Ubisoft na stojąco bije wam brawo. 

Dwa zdania na koniec : Poprawiono bardzo dużo względem poprzedniej odsłony, gra dostała mnóstwo większych i mniejszych ulepszeń. Jeśli Origin sprawił wam radość, to tym razem dostajecie grę do kwadratu.  [b] 9.8/10[/b]

If you're having issue with cursor flickering/resetting on main menu try manually turn on the Keyboard and Mouse in the ACO.ini file in C:\Users\.....\Documents\Assassin's Creed Origins. Look for this setting:

KeyboardMouseEnabled=1
AutoSwitchEnabled=0

전작인 오리진보다는 훨씬 나은거 같습니다 

오리진은 게임에 집중할수 있게 하는 마력이 별로 없어서 조금 하다 끄고 조금하다 끄고 

그러다가 후반부 가니 전체적으로 반복적인 느낌이 나고  질리게 되서 설렁설렁했었는데 


오딧세이는 전반적으로 이전작들의 단점을 완벽할만큼 많이 보완해서 게임을 끊고 나오지를 못하게 됩니다 

몰입감이 엄청나요 정말로 


스토리부분을 일신해서 텔링이 너무 좋아졌고 주인공 케릭터도 엄청 맘에 듭니다 


기존 어쌔신 시리즈는 스토리때문에라도 엔딩봐야지 하는 그런 느낌은 안들었는데 

오딧세이는 스토리가 궁금해서 계속 하게 돼요  스토리연출부분도 매우 좋구요 

하다보면 점점 카산드로 혹은 알렉시오스의 매력에 빠지실겁니다 

거기다가 메인퀘 하다보면 자연스레 사이드퀘를 할수 있게 연계 시켜 놨고 사이드퀘도 각각 사연이 있고 재밌어요 

복붙 사이드퀘도 여전히 있긴합니다만   메인퀘랑 연관 되어있는 서브퀘도 많고   


단일 서브퀘라도 내러티브를 충분히 잘 살린 훌륭한 사이드킥으로서 완성되어있어요 


정말 다시 한번 말합니다 


꼭 하세요 


이전 어쌔신크리드 시리즈를 별로 안좋아하셨다면 더더욱  오딧세이를 추천합니다 


이전작들 생각하시면 안돼요

最后，一直很喜欢希腊神话和古希腊的历史，这一部里见到了雷神宙斯，智慧女神雅典娜，完好无损的帕特农神庙以及无数历史名胜。真是不愧为3A大作。

（能和苏格拉底探讨哲学是我个人最喜欢的部分哈哈哈）

So... I bought this game. I'm quite disappointed to be honest. Having played AC Origins I feel AC Odyssey is a copy/paste of AC origins: the maps are quite the same as AC origins (of course they removed the pyramids, the sphinxes and added some grasses and greek Gods to fool the user but yet it's very similar to AC origin maps...) Cassandra's accent is really awful and a torture for my ears... I feel the maps are dead: in AC origins I used to enjoy seeing the civilians on their daily lives. On Odyssey they seems to have removed a lot of civilians.. The colors ingame are so vivid and unrealistic, looks like I am playing Fortnite. Lot of fps drops (on a 1080 GTX 8Gb and 16Gb Ram I get fps drops to 9FPS on a 1920x1080 resolution and ultra high) to end. At the end I feel I bought a witcher game and not an assassin creed franchise.. This RPG style was ok on AC origins but it really disappoint me on Odyssey. Odyssey is not an assassin creed at all.. Yet I will complete the game because I paid £49 for it but I am really disappointed

[h1]If the game was able to run, I could have left an unbiased review... [/h1]

Up until now, I've never had an excuse to downvote a game.  However, due to a critical feature that was left absent from the minimum hardware specs, that would otherwise force me to upgrade my CPU in order to [i]run[/i] the game, it's left me more than a little upset.  My hardware specs are far from the best, but they're still more than capable of running almost any game today at High settings.

Pentium G4560 @ 3.5 Mhz
GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB
16 GB DDR4 RAM
Windows 10

Ubisoft failed to update the specifications prior to AC: Odyssey's release, which essentially says that if anyone wanting to run this game has below a certain level of i5 processor, you're out of luck.  This has left many people hanging out in the wind and without any recourse.  If Ubisoft is forcing people into upgrading their hardware, because of a feature that [i]they[/i] left absent from the minimum specs and failed to notify anyone of the updated requirements until AFTER a game's release, then they just lost a customer.

Story line is very engaging, side characters and quests do not feel like a chore. You don't feel railroaded at all, spent 20minutes helping a lovely couple out who hated vegetables, I hate veg too 10/10 would waste that time again. Combat is solid, graphics are beautiful, though those rope textures at the stables look like they got an apprentices toddler to do them...other than that scenery is stunning and the high spots really make the most of them. 

Just as a disclaimer, I have not progressed very far down the main story line (keep getting distracted by the side stuff) so I have no yet encountered an issues which make me feel like spending money. So far everything has been nice and balanced and skill can overcome tougher oponents. level 5 bounty hunter at level 2? no problem oil pots and arrows through a burning braizer really pile on the damage.
A lot of improvments in mechanics and glictches reduced unlike Origins. Story is great. Nice Game. Must be Played.

起動しても注意画面やスプラッシュ画面ですぐにクラッシュする

正確なところは分かりませんが、どうもCPUがAVXに対応していないと起動出来ないという噂が出ています
それが事実ならSandy Bridge以降でないと恐らくまともに動きません
システム要件を見てもそれは読み取れないので注意してください
パッチが来れば起動出来るかもしれないそうですがいつになるやら…

ちなみに当方の環境を簡単に書くと
Win7 64
i7 970
RAM12GB
GTX1080
こんな感じで明らかに古いCPUがついに足切りにあったようです


追記：
AVXに対応していない一部のXeonですら動作しないという報告があったと思ったら、やはりAVXへの対応が必要であることをUBIがTwitter上で認めていました
(https://twitter.com/UbisoftSupport/status/1047918273826889730)
酷いことに公式フォーラムで見られる詳細なシステム要件に「SSE4.1を要求」と書いてある点について実際はAVXが必要だったことに対する抗議は無視されています
今作はリリース二日前にCPUのサポートリストをこっそり更新するなど不手際が目立ちましたね
しかしパッチで解決したSTEEP他と似たような原因であるということなら同じくパッチで解決する可能性もあるかもしれません

追記2：
Great News!　古いCPUを積んでる諸兄に朗報！
UbisoftはAVX非対応プロセッサでは当ゲームが動作しないことを認知していると公表
更に、それら第一世代CPU等でもゲームを実行出来るようにサポートCPUを拡張するプロセスが最優先事項として進行中であることも発表
なお実際に対応される時期については未定
(https://forums.ubi.com/showthread.php/1941337)

TL;DR 10/10 Το παιχνίδι ειναι το καλύτερο Assassins Creed που έτυχε να παίξω μετά το Assassins Creed Origins και το Black flag.

Η παρακάτω κρητική θα ενημερώνεται ως θα μπάινω περισσότερο στο παιχνίδι.

Βελτιώσεις: 
Χαρακτήρες: Οι διάλοιγοι και τα animations των χαρακτήρων ειναι πολύ καλύτερα με καλύτερο scripting.  Τα cutscenes μοιάζουν λες και βλέπω ταινία με πολύ καλό σενάριο, χαρακτήρες με βάθος, πολυμορφία στους χαρακτήρες, διάλογοι που βγάζουν το αντίστοιχο συναίσθημα που προορίζονται να βγάλουν και άλλα πολλά, Μπράβο Ubisoft! 

Performance: Τρέχει σαφώς καλύτερα απο οτι το Origins και σε αυτό φταίει οτι πιθανώς εχουν κάνει βελτιώσεις, έχω 60fps με όλα στα Ultra, με μόνο μειωμένο το depth of field. Μερικές φορές και κυρίως οταν υπάρχουν πολλές σκιές τα FPS πέφτουν εως τα 40 αλλα αυτό δεν ειναι κάτι το ενοχλητικό αφου συμβαίνει που και που.

Gameplay: Η Ubisoft πρόσθεσε μεγάλο βάθος στο παιχνίδι σε παρα πολλούς τομείς. Ο χάρτης ειναι ΤΕΡΑΣΤΙΟΣ, και εκτός αυτου... ΕΛΛΑΔΑΡΑ ΡΕ! Λεπτομέρειες θα προσθέσω σε αργότερο edit. 

Γραφικά: Ειναι ίδια και λιγο παραπάνω βελτιωμένα απο το Origins. 


Αν δεν το έχετε αγοράσει ακομη, ΑΓΟΡΑΣΤΕ ΤΟ ΤΩΡΑ!

Absolute garbage that Ubisoft CHANGED the requirements 2 days before release because they forgot to tell us that the game requires AVX capable processors. Origins had no such requirement, and ran fine on non-AVX processors. 2 of their previous games also had this issue, and it was fixed with a patch. This time? Ubi says they have no plans to patch. 100% refund.

EDIT: Leaving original review as is so you can see it. Ubisoft has suggested that they are working to posibly patch AVX support. I would like them to explain why their official response on release was "we are not planning any patch for AVX". Did they really think people would not be angry? Anyways, if they patch AVX i will change the review.

For those who say its my fault for having an old computer, you are right, i cant afford to upgrade. Realize that upgrading a 1st gen i5 means a new mobo, ram, and probably case. Ive looked into it its about $500 CAN. My comp ran Origins and many other recent games perfectly fine, so I am right to assume that it will run Odyssey fine. Its still on Ubi for not telling us when they ran into the same issue on release of  Crew 2.

The only thing, that's still Assassin's Creed about this, is the name.

Oh and expect treatment with an all new cash shop, that will render any F2P MMO envious:

- Fantasy Mounts
- Armor Skins
- Ship Skins
- Weapon Skins
- Temporary Resource & XP Boosts
- And most certainly more bs still to come.

The menus look copy pasted from No Man's Sky, which were copy pasted from Destiny, if you didn't know.
The dialogue interfaces look copy pasted from The Witcher 3.
Movement and fighting feel so Dragon Age: Inquisition, that Bioware would have sued Ubisoft, were they not on the edge of extinction, right now.

The characters and story seem uninspired and boring. The main thing that kept me interested in the series, were the parts that played during our present time, yes i said it, now flail me alive. Unfortunately, this part seems to grow ever lacking for each consecutive title that's thrown out of this machinery. Exploration of the second side quest, cave, or outpost felt more like a drag, than climbing the 500th tower in AC2, despite the 'new' movement and combat system.

If you want to focus on the story, or free adventuring, expect to be kept on a tight leash, named level, that limits your progression speed so drastically, that you will lose all excitement, eventually.

Really disappointed with this one and seriously doubt, that i will finish this game anytime soon, until then, stay away from it, unless you're a die-hard 300 fan, cause that seems to be the audience, this generic hack'n'slash title seems to be catered towards.

At the start when i heard that there is a new AC so soon I was afraid it would be quite boring and raw project. To be honest Origins kinda of dissappointed me as I only enjoyed the graphic there but the rest of the game was pretty boring, boring side quests and storyline made me pretty soon play only main storyline and quit. 
I play every AC so i gave a try to this one and omg i dont regret at all. I played only 3 hours but can already confirm this game worth its money. Its origins with cut bad sides. The game is improved so much. Like the really decided to pay attention to what ppl wanted and didnt like in the prev game

+fighting feels way more nice, not that annoyingly slow like in origins with more options like new abilities u chose from talents
+shooting with the bow feels amazing in this game
+dialogues make even side quests be way more intresting coz now their have soul and side quest's stories are  more intresting and not typical like in Origins where each quest was askin u to find lost son or kill bandits because they are bad
+not annoying or boring main characters, i love cassandra already
+extremely beautiful setting and sound
+more new options in the game, from abilities and headhunters to explorer mode 
+ huge pro: unlike origins, in this game u dont have to battle enemies only face to face, u finally can clear the camp by simply hiding in the bushes and not alarming anyone
+enemies wont stop looking for u, they finally feel not like utterly stupid mobs
+ even tho some ppl call it a con, it is a pro to me : there is also some unreal stuff in the game connected to the ancient mythology and i believe it is awesome, as i was disappointed that in origins, was no mummies. I know that ppl complain the game should position itsel as a historical game, but come on its a game afterall, purely for fun and it wont replace historical books.
+ u can see blood now!

Assassin's Creed Odyssey brings new life to the series.

I personally started the series with AC3. Played Black Flag and then Unity. Didn't play again till Origins but only played like an hour of it... where Origins lacked, Odyssey has picked up. The game is beautiful, the map huge, the story intriguing. I am emotionally invested in the story of Kassandra (the character I picked). It runs beautifully for me, there is so much to see and do, and every quest doesn't feel as though you're just fetching and doing boring stuff. They all feel grand and the main story has a lot of twists thus far for me. I am 21 hours in (had early play with the gold edition) and I am not even close to being done. 

The game is MEANT to be played in Exploration Mode. Doing so insures you have a magical experience. 

10/10 Assassin's Creed game in my opinion.
Having a blast playing this one. Runs fine on my high end Alien desktop computer, no crashes.  Looks beautiful, plays great. Thumbs up!

Après l'excellent Origins, Ubisoft remet le couvert avec Odyssey avec tous les ingrédients réunis pour une superbe expérience. 

Même si la ressemblance est assez frappante entre les deux opus, les développeurs ont su peaufiner ce qui avait fonctionné avec Origins. La liberté est au centre de l'expérience de jeu : assassin, chasseur ou bagarreur, choisissez votre voie pour mieux massacrer à tour de bras. Soyez un mercenaire cupide ou bien un bon samaritain à l'écoute de la population. Les missions s'enchaînent et ne se ressemblent pas, tout est scénarisé avec moult cinématiques de qualité (enfin des animations faciales expressives et détaillées !). Ubisoft nous a habitués à de beaux graphismes, et une fois de plus, on n'est pas déçu, et l'optimisation semble être au rendez-vous, même si quelques bugs viennent ternir le tableau. 

J'ai passé mes trois premières heures de jeu à explorer l'île de départ sans pouvoir venir à bout de toutes les activités tellement celles-ci sont nombreuses et variées. L'île regorge de détails, de lieux à explorer, de personnes à aider... Si le reste de la carte est dans la même veine, la durée de vie ne sera clairement pas un problème. Le mode Exploration qui pousse le joueur à se balader davantage pour obtenir des informations sur les missions à effectuer augmente l'immersion et permet vraiment de se prendre pour un mercenaire en plein travail.

Le système de prime, nouvel ajout de cet opus, semble intéressant au premier abord : en cas de mauvaises actions, des primes seront mises sur votre tête et des mercenaires partiront à votre recherche (amélioration de ce qui existait déjà dans Origins). Ces gaillards ont leur spécificités et sont bien plus costauds que les soldats lambdas, avec une belle récompense à la clé. Le premier fut assez simple à vaincre, mais il faut être bien préparé pour espérer s'en sortir dans les modes de difficulté élevée. 

Seule la gestion d'inventaire me pose souci à l'heure actuelle : on récupère de très nombreux objets au fur et à mesure de l'exploration et il faut constamment comparer les nouveaux équipements acquis et les changer.  Je chipote, mais la microgestion est un poil trop présent à mon goût à ce stade du jeu. 

En conclusion, un jeu qui semble très prometteur dans ces premières heures, un plaisir de maniabilité, un terrain de jeu gigantesque et digne d'une carte postale et un scénario qui semble tenir ses promesses. Bref, un régal à tester d'emblée !
